hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great contral location accommodation
desc: W stayed at the Rendezvous Singapore for three nights in August 2019. The hotel was very clean, the service was fine and friendly and the room excellent. Very clean, comfortable and reasonably priced. It is in an excellent central location within walking distance of most city attractions and shopping.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: EXCELLENT HOTEL AND FABULOUS STAFF
desc: After much research we chose the Rendezvous and a Club Room. Wow! We were not disappointed! From the moment we stepped in to the hotel we felt at home! We were welcomed at the club check in by the truly wonderful Sofia! She took us into the lounge and got us a drink whilst she did the paperwork. Our room was huge, comfortable and very clean. The bed was so comfortable that we didn’t want to get out it in the morning! The club lounge is must definitely worth every penny. It’s peaceful and there’s a good selection of drinks and snacks and breakfast can be taken there or you can opt for the main restaurant. The staff are all wonderful but in particular Sofia and Kiki! They really go out of their way to please you! The hotel is in a fabulous central location. The MTR and bus stops

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Services
desc: Made a business trip, 2nd time staying here in 1 month. Great location, super awesome and friendly staff. Flexible with check-out so I can work my check-out around my meetings. Great staff, especially Sofia from Club floor

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Aug2019
desc: Rendezvous is a nice hotel but windows are not sound-proof; hence we heard the noise outside the hotel during the night event. We had difficulty sleeping because of the loud sound from the event. The lavatory sink drainage was not so efficient.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Centric hotel
desc: We spent four days at this hotel, staff very friendly, perfect location to go everywhere. Small pool but it did the job, breakfast was just ok, clean rooms. We asked for a take away breakfast as we had an early departure and I am afraid was not good enough, we had to throw them away, dried cheese sandwich with small pastries from the previous day, bearing in mind the restaurant was opened for breakfast at 6:30 and we left at 6:45 they should have provided better food

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My Experience
desc: The hotel has good services but needs to improve on the customer services especially on the arrival day by showing the guests to their rooms and provide some general orientation. Otherwise it was a pleasant experience for me.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Sanctuary in Singapore
desc: Our first visit to Singapore and I can highly recommend the Rendezvous after spending 4 nights in a Junior Suite. Room was spacious, clean and really quiet. Service was fantastic, in particular, Sofia, who could not do enough for us whilst in the Clubroom. Would recommend taking the Club package which gives you access to food/refreshments morning and night. Located close to Orchard Rd and a short walk to Raffles and the other main attractions. Plenty of eateries plus a rail station right outside the door means you have plenty of options. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Banquet wedding
desc: we love rendezvous. all the staffs,service,facilities and coordinator are so nice! glad we choose rendezvous❤️ Highly recommended! You wont regret!! But get feedback from my mother in law’s friend,they were still drinking and chit chat but got one lady parttimer is so rude just take away their drink and chase them to leave the banquet which is not even 4pm,the banquet officially ends at 4:30pm.the parttimer didnt even wear tag name and keep Black Face since banquet started.pls train and educate ur parttimer,DONT LET SUCH PPL SPOIL RENDEZVOUS REPUTATION!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Central hotel
desc: We booked into a Junior suite with access to the Club Room. In the club room you can enjoy breakfast and Sophia does a wonderful job of helping guests in anyway she can. The hotel is showing its age in places but the staff more than make up for that. It is close to two train lines and is nice and central to a lot of things.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: a quiet room, close to everything
desc: Great location. Quiet Hotel. Clean and spotless pool. The rooms need to improve their ventilation. Very good breakfast in a extended time. Great welcoming and departing. House keeping need to improve.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location but tired
desc: This hotel is in a great location in central Singapore. Many shopping and eating locations are within walking distance. The buffet breakfast was good. The rooms are a bit dated and have minimal amenities but clean and comfortable. The tv didn’t work and it needed a room change on day 2. Staff were friendly and helpful. Overall not great value for money if you shop around on line.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money in an excellent location.
desc: The facilities are well maintained, the location is extremely convenient. Entrance and public areas very nicely decorated, calm. The rooms were comfortable, clean and quiet. Bathroom nicely decorated, furniture and caulking a little tired. Although we only had the breakfast buffet, the food was good and the selection standard. We received complimentary late check out. The staff were exemplary, could not be faulted.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Warm, Friendly and Homely
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at the Rendezvous Hotel for 3 nights. From check-in to check-out, I was blessed with excellent service by warm, friendly and genuine staff in all areas - the bellman, reception, club level, house keeping and in the restaurant. I felt very much at home, especially with the genuine warm service delivered by Sofia (club level) and by Christine in the restaurant. They addressed me by name upon every interaction and made every possible effort to ensure I was comfortable and that my needs were met. The facilities and location of Rendezvous Hotel are fantastic. However, what makes this hotel stand out is the wonderful service and care shown by their staff. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Limited Service - Club Room Poor
desc: Stayed for Business not good for Business. Poor service in the Club Room and poor service all round. The bedrooms are of a good size, pool and fitness areas are good. Staff let this hotel down and not up to Singapore Standards.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location
desc: The Rendezvous is in an ideal location adjacent to the Bencoolen MRT, with many buses stopping outside. I booked a club lounge room, which was quite small, but adequate, with an extremely comfortable king sized bed, and quality linen and pillow choices. Lighting was good, the TV was large (with many channel options), and storage space was excellent. Wifi was very fast. The bathroom had a large shower recess with stunning water pressure, thick fluffy towels, and decent amenities. The advantages of a club room are numerous: - a quiet lounge space to utilise at any time of the day, with snacks and non-alcoholic beverages (hot and cold) - breakfast, while limited, was quieter than the Straits Cafe - cocktails, spirits, wine, beer and food from 6-8 pm each evening in a

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding Lunch Banquet
desc: My husband and I enjoyed the whole process from our first contact with sales to the actual day of our wedding celebration. Our salesperson (Ainni) accommodated our many requests and were with us at every step. We received a lot of positive feedback from our guests that the food served at the lunch banquet was good, for Chinese, Vegetarian and Halal cuisines. The banquet staff (Mei and her team) are very familiar with the execution of the wedding celebration activities, which gave us peace of mind on the actual day. Our wedding celebration went very smoothly. We also loved the artworks in the hotel, many of which were created by local artists. We stayed at a junior suite room, which was large, well furnished and had an unobstructed view of the cityscape. During our stay we

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The service was fantastic
desc: My stay at the hotel was fantastic due to the good personnel and management. The rooms are clean, the service is fast and sufficient. Special thanks to Sofia, Daniel and Shafiq for the hospitality. Will be coming back soon

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location for sightseeing in Singapore
desc: We arrived at the Rendezvous Hotel after a long flight from the UK. We got there about 9.30 and our room was ready for us! Check in was easy and our room was spacious, clean and very easy access to the swimming pool. Pool towels were supplied. Breakfasts were lovely with so many choices, hot and cold, western and Asian, all delicious. Staff were very helpful and friendly and the hotel bar served amazing Singapore Slings. The hotel is very central to the many wonderful sights and there was a bus stop outside for local buses as well as the Hop on Hop Off tourist bus.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: So very happy with our stay
desc: A big thank you to the manager and the staff at Rendezvous hotel so very accommodating and friendly when I have had customers stay at this hotel! When having health problems the hotel really went above and beyond to help us out!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic!
desc: Location is perfect. Service is fantastic. The room is pretty huge! Everything is clean. Near the train station! Walking distance to a lot of places like museums, malls and restaurants. Highly recommend this place.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent staycation
desc: We took advantage of the birthday treat by Far East, and this is the second year my partner and I have decided to spend my birthday at. It was truly a relaxing and pampering experience, with the free upgrade and lounge access. We planned to stay during the sg night fest too, which was super convenient for visiting all the attractions and installations. Kudos to the Rendezvous Club team, they made our stay special with a personalized card and complimentary birthday slice too. Would definitely recommend!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: National day weekend Staycation
desc: Missed your nice laksa at Straits Cafe. Like to location as it is 5 - 10 mins walk from many places of interests... examples of places visited were the National Museum, Centerpoint, Funan Centre, Marina Square... good staycation time with my family

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Welcome back, Rendezvous!
desc: I've been pretty inactive in TripAdvisor these past months but my recent stay at Rendezvous Hotel (at Bras Basah) prompted me to login to my account and start writing a review. The experience was too good not to be shared. My last stay at Rendezvous was in 2017 and it was not a pleasant one. Had some issues and decided to stay away from this property. Fast forward to 2019, I was looking for a place to stay (4 nights) in Singapore before embarking to a new journey and for some reason, Rendezvous became part of my choices. Until I kept on coming back to their site and start reading recent reviews of the property here in TripAdvisor. I was really hesitant to book a room with them but stars aligned and I finally sealed the deal and decided to stay with them again. When I arrived,

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hospitality!
desc: The staff at the hotel were warm, friendly and very helpful - from the front office, coffee house, housekeeping and especially at the Club Lounge. It made all the difference to having a thoroughly enjoyable stay. Thank you!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and service.
desc: The hotel is just < 1 min walk from Bencoolen MRT station and 6 minutes from Orchard Road. Very convenient location. Reasonable price (for Singapore). Very warm and attentive services. My baby daughter got a nice box of color pens as welcome gift ! The room is also big and comfortable. The ventilation in the bathroom could be improved.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location with everything you need
desc: Great location. warm and friendly staff. Pool has a Jacuzzi which was pleasant. Clean rooms. Television had youtube streaming and a variety of channels. Pricey but affordable when booked during promotion. The pillows are extremely soft which may be a concern for some. Personally, I had a shoulder ache in the morning.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good experience
desc: Good service attitude with good location. Breakfast with quite numbers of choices. Near MRT station and Orchard Road, walk about 1 min to Bencoolen MRT, 3 mins to Dhoby Ghaut and 10 mins walk to Orchard Road. Many good food around, Ding Tai Fung Xiao Long Bao is super nice!!!! Food Republic also many local food can try.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic club room experience
desc: Was welcomed by the assistant manager Kathleen at the Club Lounge when we checked-in. Loved the junior suite which was spacious. The location of the hotel was fantastic and the service provided by Kathleen and her colleague at the lounge was impeccable!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Hotel Rocks!
desc: From the second I walked in, I could feel the warmth and hospitality of the staff. Check-in was a breeze. While I was away exploring the city and environs most of the time, the hotel offered a comfortable refuge from the scorching heat and humidity. The room and bed were very comfortable, and always in tip-top shape. I would definitely pick Rendezvous Hotel the next time I’m in town, or when I find myself in any location with a Rendezvous Hotel. I love this hotel!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Looking forward to return
desc: Yes, I liked the location; and yes I liked the comfortableness and aesthetics of the room and amenities. Above all, the key thing that makes me wanting to come back is the high level of customer service, attentiveness and excellence, AND the people who provide them. As I believe that people make the difference, I want to focus on my observation of the service-orientation of the staff. There are numerous employees and managers, to name a few, Pushpa, Manoharan, Kathleen, Daniel, Sofia, Dayang, Kiki and Qiao Liang who were simply awesome. Ms. Pushpa handled my request for accommodation exceptionally well. I must say that the credit for acquiring me as a new customer goes solely to her. She was prompt, courteous and result oriented in getting the job done. Mr. Manoharan

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The hotel is great but Ms Huda was very rude during check-in
desc: The hotel was good but Ms Huda was very rude during check-in. She had an uppity air about her and did not care that her nonchallant attitude was inconveniencing her guests. Huda learn some manners and don't lose your patience so quickly! Then a gentleman took over and he was much better.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location
desc: This was our second stay here in a deluxe room. Great location just down the start of Orchard Road. Very friendly staff. The buffett breakfast is good. Large rooms with very comfortable beds. MRT right outside. Would highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Two day stop over
desc: Excellent location near 2 MRT stations making transport various locations easy Went to Sentosa Island, Chinatown and Marina Sands Clean hotel with helpful and friendly staff Easy walk to close by restaurants and shopping Good buffet breakfast

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Location
desc: This hotel was referred to us by our Travel Agent and she was bang on the money. The hotel was very conveniently located to everything! The staff were amazing and friendly and the rooms were roomy and very clean. My only thing was that the bed was too hard for me but other than that everything was spot on. I will definitely be staying here again

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business Trip to Singapore
desc: I’ve been staying in this hotel for the last 8 years and the service has been excellent every time!! Nothing is too much to ask and they are very courteous, friendly and professional. Over the years i got to know a few staff (Daniel, Andrew, Evelyn from reception; Kiki, Dayang, Sofia, Kathleen - from the Club Rendevouz) and they are great!! You will notice that the hotel is an Art inspired hotel and it has some beautiful paintings!! The Front Office Manager, Ms. Pushpalatha offered me a tour of the beautiful painting upstairs in the club. She has so much passion for her job and loves art!! It was really nice to connect with staff. Highly recommended, excellent prices, good location and great overall standard.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: Good place and location, transportation both MRT and bus Good service Good room and facility ทำเลของโรงแรมดี สะดวกในการเดินทาง ทั้ง mrt และรถบัส พนักงานบริการดี ห้องสะอาด อุปกรณ์ต่างๆพร้อม แต่ปลั๊กไฟน้อย

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice hotel
desc: Rendezvous is located near Bencoolen MRT station. There is a bus stop outside hotel entrance. We can go to many places by MRT. We went to the airport by taking the route no. 36 at the bus stop. We took a tour bus to the singapore zoo and the bus was outside the hotel entrance. Location of the hotel was very convenient.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: Good location , overall is a best, have many activity to do sush as drawing for children, libery Conner , near food republic, near mrt, bus stop in front of the hotel, staff is good , room cleaness, I love here , 'll back again

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 2 nights stay
desc: Decent luxury hotel. For the price, it's quite a steal. Nevertheless, I felt the room carpet feels old and dusty. The toiletries and coffee/tea amenities were also basic. However, the service, bed and location is great.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: FANTASTIC HOTEL & STAFF
desc: My husband and I chose to stay at the Rendezvous Hotel on our recent trip to Singapore. We chose the Club Room which came with all the perks you could ask for whilst on holiday - daily deluxe buffet breakfast, complimentary mini bar and refreshments daily and evening complimentary cocktails or drinks. The service we received throughout our stay was impeccable. The staff should be highly commended for their attentiveness to hotel guests. The room was clean, a good size and serviced daily. Location is great and there are plenty of great options for shopping, food and sight seeing within walking distance. We will definitely stay here again on our return to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location, location, location!
desc: Excellent location. Perfect place to visit lots of things either by bus or underground train or walking. Staff were very helpful especially about transport options. Buffer breakfast was ok with a variety of different foods

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Our wedding dinner
desc: With just 6 months leading up to our wedding on 28 September, we shortlisted Rendezvous and immediately launched into a series of questions for hotel manager Yan. Yan was very friendly and helpful, answering all our queries really quickly even though we sometimes texted het even at night. On Saturday, even though it was her day off, she even came to say hi to us and offer us her well wishes as it was our big day. Thanks to Yan, and Rendezvous' professional team of staff, our wedding dinner went off without a hitch. Special thanks to her, and to our banquet manager who was an assuring presence during the tech run, dry run, and throughout the dinner itself, such that even the little details like where to turn during the march in were laid out very clearly for us. The food

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service but mediocre rooms!
desc: I stayed at their Orchard one too just a week back so can compare them- + Staff is very friendly, easy check-in and warm welcome + Convenient location with food options nearby Now lets see the concerns- - Room quite small as compared to the Orchard one - Air conditioning extremely cold, and even though I tried to move to 30 in the in-room control, the room temperature remained the same freezing - Carpet, tiles and bathroom facilities looked quite old - Bed had hair on my checkin and pillows not comfortable

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Hotel
desc: I just checked out yesterday morning after my usual 1 night layover in Singapore. This was I think my 4th visit to this particular hotel in Singapore. I would have rated this visit higher because this hotel has a great location and by far the best chicken strips buffalo style I have tried anywhere in the world. You have to get them from room service. They are that good and reasonably priced. The only small snags that brought the rating down were the fact that I was given the room furthest from the elevator. I couldn’t believe the hike. Then also when going for a shower before heading out for my nearly 24 hour flight I noticed that the faucet was leaking really bad leaving a big puddle on the bathroom floor. Not what you expect in Singapore. Please see attached photos. Apart from

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fave hotel in Singapore!
desc: Absolutely lovely morningbuffet! Lots to choose from, and tasted delicious. Clean and comfy rooms, + friendly staff. Very helpful with taxa-ordering and other needs. Pool was wellkept and lovely. Will visit again for sure.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect location for exploring Singapore
desc: The staff were friendly and helpful. Location really good next to MRT. International breakfast buffet good quality and lots of choice. However restaurant in the evening does not serve alcohol whilst not a big issue would have preferred to know. As previous reviewers has stated rooms are a little tired, there is hardly any storage for clothes but room was clean and bed very comfortable. Swimming pool a lovely haven but pool side food and drink service was poor.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Place to stay
desc: The Rendezvous is a fabulous hotel centrally located. You can easily walk to Orchard or there are 3 MRT stations (5 lines) within 5 min walk. Club rooms are lovely and having the lounge to sit and rest and have a cup of tea when you get back is great. I have stayed here before and I will stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Another visit and i wasn't disappointed
desc: I had two nights here again staying in a Club room. This was really helpful as it gave me a 6pm check out - really helpful if you're on a late flight out. This also gives you a light breakfast, and free drinks and nibbles/light meal between 6 and 8 pm. i used the pool. a feature of this hotel is the artwork which is quite outstanding.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Precise & Professional in Lovely settings
desc: Couldn’t ask for more for every details setting in the room. Feel very professional staffs whose assist to contact taxi to have my camera safely return. Lobby is spacious and with 7eleven next to it. Concierge team has done their perfect job at all time. Highly recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing stay
desc: Stayed at Rendezvous Hotel on Bras Basah road for 4 weeks. Had experienced first a Deluxe room for the first 3 weeks and then got upgraded for a Club member room with access to the lounge on the top floor. The location is great, within walking distance to the Marina, Chinatown, Little India, Orchard Road, Chinatown, and located right next to three MRT (metro) stations: Bencoolen for the Downtown line, Dhoby Ghaut being the central station and Bras Basah for the circle line. Overall I had a great stay, all staff member was very friendly, smiling and helpful. Many got to know me and my habits after such a long stay. Big thanks to Sofia and Daniel on the top floor who did a great job by making my stay as easy as possible. I recommend and will clearly return on my next trip to

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: clean quiet central
desc: We found the hotel to be clean quiet. The staff were friendly and helpful. Breakfast is very Asian so be prepared for noodles and curries. The coffee not so great. The mrt is right next door, the buses stop at the front of the hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay and service
desc: Kathleen, Sophia, Dayang from The Club and Kiki from Front Office had provided great hospitality throughout our stay. Had been staying with the hotel several times and always would prefer staying at the club rooms. Location of the hotel is good and rooms are clean. Just something to note on the downside: Although minibars in our Suite room are complimentary, each rooms are only provided with 2 small bottles of water, the rest are sugary soft drinks. Any additional bottle of water will be charged $0.95. Not something that I would expect from a 4-star hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service!
desc: We were well taken care of by Sofia who was very friendly and welcoming. Staying at the hotel itself was a great experience but her level of professionalism and attention given to us made it all the more enjoyable. Thank you Sofia!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My second stay at this hotel
desc: Couldn't fault anything. Club room on the tenth floor for six nights with the most comfortable of king size beds. I was a little disappointed when I found out I couldn't buy the bed in Australia but this means I will have to return again soon for a great night's sleep. All staff were super helpful and and a special thank you to Kathleen in Club who made us feel most welcome. Front desk and the concierge were always on the ball and all staff were always smiling.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding Dinner
desc: Mei and her team assisted us in our wedding. I need to specifically thank Mei as our banquet manager who really help us alot so that our wedding can go smoothly for that night. Even our dinner is over, Mei will still continue to assist us. This is definitely the best hotel for holding wedding.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: dimness
desc: this hotel had insufficient lighting everywhere. The breakfast was poor so we did not eat any other meals there. Staff friendly and helpful and location central but not particularly close to shopping. Taxis were readily available.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Return visit to Rendezvous.
desc: We upgraded to a club room, which was our second visit to the hotel. Did not disppoint. Comfortable beds. Service from staff is excellent. Tiffany and her co workers looked after us very well. Nice setting around the pool area to relax. Buffet breakfast are outstanding with plenty of choice. Hotel offered complimentary hop on hop off bus service, which came as a benefit by upgrading.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great hotel to stay when in Singapore
desc: Have stayed here many times and will stay here again when in Singapore.Great and convenient location with transport and restaurants within easy walking distance. Room is clean and comfortable. Staff friendly.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A very helpful and friendly hotel
desc: The chief Concierge Azali and the hotel manager Douglas were very helpful with our questions especially with respect to where the best murtabak was and other focal singapore food and directions. Azali even remembered our names after only a day. We had not been back for almost 30 years and Singapore was clearly much more developed, so we were a little lost. In fact Douglas personally escorted me and my wife to a nearby hawker center in the morning to make sure that we got to eat what we wanted. Douglas loves tennis as we do so our casual stroll turned into an interesting and captivating chat about our favorite players and the US open final. Cant get more personable service then that 10 out of 10. Location is great, local bus stop and MRT right outside and its away from the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Under-staffed, under-trained, underwhelmed
desc: Stayed one night. Outdated rooms with lobby full of low quality pop art. Some form of mites could be seen on the table in room under the light from the table lamp. Bathrooms are tiny. Worst part was check out. At 7.15am (approaching regular peak check out for business guests) had to queue 15 mins to check out as only one member of staff. Regardless of queue, he still held things up by selling upgrades to those checking in. Won’t return. Many better options available.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very average
desc: This was our ninth time stopping in SIngapore and our fist time at this hotel. We only stayed here because our travel agent got us a good deal for four nights. Location is good in walking distance to most places if you like walking. The room is clean and bed comfortable, bathroom very small for two people at the same time. We found the breakfast not on par with other hotels we have stayed at in Singapore. Breakfast Seems more Asian than European. No cups or saucers for coffee or tea only Mugs, no bacon served while we were there to bad if you like bacon for breakfast. Selection of food pretty poor, also no pepper or salt shakers on tables. A lot of the food just warm, fried eggs all placed on top of one another had the impression they just wanted to get breakfast over and done

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hospitality
desc: Great service at the hotel from the moment I stepped into the hotel. Even though check in staff seemed new, he tried his best to answer my enquiry and assisted with my request. I had the Club upgrade (highly recommended if you are not upgraded) and the Lounge access. Food variety was great and food was nice. Special appreciation to Sophia who was on duty during my stay. She was very sensitive to guest's needs and willing to go the extra mile to assist guest. She was very friendly and personal in her service and made it feel like having a friend attending to your needs, which made the stay extremely pleasant. Would definitely recommend this hotel for the great and personal service that made it very comfortable, apart from the great amenities.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good room and staff but bad breakfast
desc: The room was well furnished and comfortable. Service staff were also efficient. Check-in was a breeze, and the staff recommended me a room upgrade that included breakfast for 2 and late check-out. The breakfast was terrible. I would not have upgraded if I knew this was the type of breakfast served. Most of the food was deep fried or cheap/processed junk food (extra salty corned beef and sausage). The cereal choices did not have oats, granola or muesli, only basic corn flakes and coco crunch. The bread choices limited to 2 types. The croissant was soggy and greasy. The brew coffee was diluted, but machine espresso was decent. There was a cajun drumlet that I tried, which turned out tasteless and dry. I would have expected higher standards considering that the same amount of

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, great service and stunning view
desc: Stayed at Rendezvous hotel, on the 11th floor Club lever, for a three week business trip. The room was large and very clean. The staff on the 11th floor were wonderful. Friendly, helpful, and always ready to make my stay as comfortable as possible. Sophie made it feel like a home away from home. It is definitely worth going for the Club room. The breakfast and bar area was small, calm and quiet. I will definitely stay at Rendezvous again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Bras Basah
desc: We stayed in the Club room here for the second time as it is still as good as the first time we stayed. The staff are so friendly and helpful and let us have a 4 pm checkout as we had an evening flight Rooms are comfortable and well appointed and having the breakfast restaurant on the same floor is a bonus

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Strategically Placed Hotel
desc: Great location Mrt station is just round the corner. Staff was friendly and plenty of dining options around the area. got a good deal we booked deluxe plus room which include minibar/ breakfast and late check out. only downside breakfast spread could be better.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Best things about this hotel are the friendly staff and location. Between 3 MTR stations and bus stop outside door. We paid extra on check in for upgrade, rooms average run of mill 4* standard not huge but clean and bed comfy. Upgrade included hop on off bus trip which was a bonus to get bearings. Also breakfast which was reasonable something to suit all tastes and means you can get out early to sightsee. Free mini bar a let down as just 2 beers and soft drinks guess this is because drinks are so expensive here. Hotel good but little dated but other things certainly make up for that

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best service everrrrr
desc: We held our wedding here the services and ballroom is simply amazing! Special thanks to ms Huang Yan, a very nice and sweet lady, great coordination! Also, very nice banquet manager and supervisor, special thanks to Chi Chuan, for making it easier and possible for us too! Many many thanks!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value, location and staff
desc: I stayed there for over three weeks using a corporate rate. I found it good value, at a central location and they had pleasant staff. There are three MRT stations within one block, 20 min walk from Clarke Quay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Unexpected luxury experience
desc: Definitely worth the upgrade to a club room. The benefits are well worth the money. Great location, within walking distance to a lot of things, and the mrt is right out front as well as bus stop. Lovely hotel with very comfortable rooms. Breakfast is great, good choice of foods, and all staff were extremely nice and helpful

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: We stayed a couple of nights in the hotel. The lobby is nice and quite modern. The rooms are a little bit dated but function well. They have a jacuzzi and normal pool (small). Location is good on the East side of Orchard road. We used a lot of Grab and taxis and it worked well

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent hotel in excellent location
desc: As a family of 3, we spent 4 nights at this hotel. The location was excellent and very close to the MRT (subway). The breakfast choices were good and the service was attentive. Not a luxury hotel by any means but decent enough with a small pool and jacuzzi.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel and perfect location
desc: We were one block from the fabulous subway system. We were just down the street from the wonderful restaurants and bars at Raffles and Chijmes. The National Museum, and its wonderful restaurant, Flutes, were two blocks away. Inside the hotel we had attentive front desk, club and housekeeping staffs. The pool was peaceful and beautiful. The gym was a welcome way to work off a few of the fabulous meals we had. We added a couple of tourist days to our work schedule and there couldn’t have been a better hub than the Rendezvous Hotel. If your get a chance to work or play in Singapore, make your HQ the Rendezvous.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Besides the check-in process, everything was great!
desc: We loved the location of the Rendezvous. It was walking distance to Orchard Road, many museums, Fort Canning Park, the historic Raffles Hotel, Bugis, and many other sites. Public transportation options were also plentiful, being well-served by air-conditioned buses and 3 MRT stations nearby. We used Google Maps to help navigate our way all around Singapore via bus and MRT, and found the system to be easy to use and organized. We were also very pleased with our room. It was comfortable and very quiet, and housekeeping was good. The only complaint was the check-in process. My husband and I had booked a room with a king-sized bed via the hotel's own website weeks in advance. We arrived mid-afternoon, and after the front desk staff spent a while searching for a room for

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: If you are looking for a conveniently located hotel then this is for you! I stayed there for 3 nights with my father. The hotel is close to a subway station, bus stops, a food hall, and convenience stores. The room was clean, modern-looking and comfortable. Sometimes we could hear people in the hallways but that wasn't a big issues. Overall we had a great stay and would definitely consider staying again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location!
desc: We stayed in the Rendezvous hotel Singapore during our honeymoon and it was a lovely hotel. Very close to MRT and a safe area. It was really close to Food republic in case you didn’t feel like hotel food, and the service was great! The only downside was that the pool area is so small. There are only about 5 chairs by the pool and they were always taken during the day so swimming in the pool was never on the agenda. There isn’t space to set your towel on the ground either. Other than that, it was a good hotel and value for money.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: very helpful staff
desc: I stayed there for a few days and enjoyed myself. Tidy, Nice people would come again especially because it is located close to all amenities including night life and shopping plus Botanic Garden, which is worth visiting

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful staff and service especially staff at the Club Lounge
desc: The wonderful, professional and fantastic staff at this Hotel and in particular the Club Lounge staff made our stay a memorable and fabulous occasion for our anniversary celebration. We stayed at Rendevouz on our way to spain and again on our way back to Australia. We were given two late checkouts due to our late flights and on our way back, we were upgraded to a suite. Location is fantastic and the price as well but it is definitely the staff and the great service which made this a fabulous stay in Singapore. A special word of thanks to lovely Sophia for the wonderful service always with a smile and all the staff at the Club lounge. What a team !!! The concierge , front desk and also cleaning staff did an exemplary job. Thank you Rendevouz for making our stay so special. We

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great trip, upgrade not worth it
desc: We were offered a room upgrade for $40/day. When we decided to do this we were told an upgraded room was not available but all other things were. Our mini bar was not stocked daily as implied. Did not seem worth the $.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location +price
desc: Excellent walk-ability, lots of restaurants, transportation + shopping are at your finger tips. Very nice hotel for a moderate price. I left some clothes in the closet and hotel mailed them to me in Canada. You won't be disappointed with this hotel choice.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore
desc: Rendezvous hotel . Deluxe room not very good . Poorly appointed . Mirrors in wrong place and lights in wrong place or in case of bathroom no mirror for shaving .lounge bar prices over the top . Nice staff but not suitable for European tastes .

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Hotel is next to Bencoolen MRT station and the public bus station is just right in front of hotel. Many good restaurants surrounded in the same area, as well as 7-11. Chijmas is 450 meters by foot. Quite area but easy to get around in Singapore from here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent 1 night stop over
desc: Stayed here for one night in between flights. Quick check in process, comfortable and modern rooms and was good value in comparison to other hotels in the area of this standard. We didn’t try any food here. If like us you have a late flight on the day of departure, after check out you are able to come back to the hotel a few hours before your flight to freshen up in the pool changing rooms. This was a really welcome addition and one we were very grateful for in this humid climate. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend to others.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Low cost business hotel
desc: Rendezvous hotel not the best of hotels. More of a budget business hotel. I found the rooms noisy, hearing doors in nearby rooms closing at night time and early morning. Not good when you have an important business meeting ahead of you. Breakfast is served in a cafe style restaurant. Food was adequate but I must have hit the cafe at rush hour.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Stayed 3 nights on way to New Zealand. Hotel and staff were attentive, courteous and extremely helpful. They offered suggestions and helped sort any problems, Nothing was to much trouble and all done with a smile. We were introduced to Douglas the manger who was talkative, polite and helpful. I hope I will eturn to visit and would happily choose and book the hotel. Thanks everyone for making the trip special and a special mention and Thanks to Sophia who was amazing

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect for couples
desc: Rendezvous Hotel is quite a quiet hotel. When I say quiet, I meant, once you are in the room, you are literally shut off from the outside noise. Not mentioning that nearby there's Plaza Singapura and many more. Perfect place for a short getaway or just want to isolate. Wedding packages are ridiculously reasonable as well. I would strongly recommend this hotel for any newly weds!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: Excellent stay experience at hotel. Front desk staff very courteous and helpful. Only request to improve breakfast spread for vegetarian. The hotel us centrally located. Rooms are well managed. Check in experience was very imressive.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday
desc: Had a week stay at the Rendezvous Hotel, Enjoyed my stay , staff very helpful..good wi fi ..Buffet Breakfast with egg station , with quite a few choices .. Had a good size room ..also good location... Will return next year ....enjoyed my stay ...

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great new find. Most accommodating staff ever.
desc: After visiting Singapore for work over the last 21 years I have only stayed at a few hotels. Mainly large high rise hotels. Our most recent holiday to Singapore started on the 2nd of Oct 2019 and it started off with probably the best reception we’ve ever experienced. As we’d only booked a week before our stay the room that would be most suited to us ,an adjoining room, was not available. Andrew James checked us in and made it possible. He didn’t ask, he just knew. The result was an extremely comfortable and enjoyable stay. The location was excellent. More appropriate for our type of holiday than the other hotels I’ve stayed in. The opening of the new MRT station right outside was a godsend. The buffet every morning was as good as most. Omelettes were my favourite. And

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Incredible Stay
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the Rendezvous hotel! It is in a great location in the center of Singapore making every neighbourhood walkable. Great value, amenities, location, and staff! Would 100% recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My 2nd stay in Rendezvous
desc: A nice hotel, with 3 different MRT lines nearby. Can reach anywhere easily. They keep improving their service as last time I remember they did not provide slipper, I stated this in my review and this time I found slipper in the room 😂

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not value for money
desc: Apart from the location,didn't find anything good about this hotel. Service is very slow, cleanliness is average;they have some green initiatives with that they won't change bedsheets everyday. However,it has a very good location.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and value
desc: Great location and good service. Rooms are somewhat outdated, especially furniture. Overall it is a great value with very good location. Plenty of food options around. MRT literally around the corner and bus stop right in front of lobby.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One night in transit
desc: Stayed a night with two children in a twin room with a roll away bed. Very friendly, warm service from check in and check out. Good value for money. Room comfortable as to were the beds. Amenities met our needs in the room. Swimming pool nice. Only negative is that although the common areas seemed well maintained, the room we were in itself although clean was showing signs of wear and tear and looking quite tired. A refurbishment seems over due or a least new paint work and tiling in the shower.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic stay
desc: My husband and I stayed at Rendezvous Hotel before and after a cruise. The rooms are extremely comfortable and have everything required for an enjoyable stay. We upgraded to Club level and enjoyed a later checkout and breakfast in the Club Lounge. When my husband fell ill and we had to extend our stay the staff were incredible. There were no rooms left so they upgraded us to an Executive Suite so he could recover and helped us find a doctor for treatment. The staff were so very lovely and willing to help in any way possible. I cannot thank them enough. Highly recommended .

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent experience
desc: I chose the Rendezvous for a recent business trip as I wanted a hotel with a business lounge. What a great experience. I arrived on a late flight and the staff at the lounge were so welcoming and courteous. Check-in and check-out was smooth and my room very comfortable with plenty of space to work. The staff in the lounge were delightful, particularly Noor who went out of her way to help me with a query. I’d definitely recommend Rendezvous.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very accomodating
desc: I did non-refundable reservation through their website, but at the last minute i had to attend to an emergency on the dates of my reservation. Tried to have our dates moved and they were very accommodating in my request. We were able to move the reservation and enjoy the amenities the hotel has to offer. All in all it was a pleasant experience.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service and great location
desc: Great service and a great location. The staff were very welcoming and friendly. We really enjoyed our stay at Rendezvous Hotel. The rooms were clean, neat and tidy.Breakfast was included in our accommodation and it was awesome! I would recommend this hotel highly.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Absolutely fabulous
desc: We ( 2 adults and 2 kids) stayed here for 5 nights. Our second time staying here, and both times we stayed in a club category room. Last time in the junior suite and this time we were upgraded to the executive suite. There were some issues about using the club lounge during the cocktail hours, we were told during the booking time, that kids will be allowed inside during the cocktail hours, but when we were checking in, they told us kids are strictly not allowed.so we spent our cocktail hours in their lobby bar. Initially I was disappointed with this arrangement but we were treated so nicely by all of them, nothing was too much for them, and we ended up like this arrangement better than sitting in the club lounge. The room was fantastic. And everyone in this hotel was warm and

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very pleasant stay
desc: I stayed at the hotel for a week for a business trip. Position is optimal (stop of underground is exactly next to the building) and ratio between quality and price is very high. I strongly suggest it.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Please Train Your Staff
desc: What i have is a terrible experience in this hotel. Please train your staff! This is the last time I will be coming to this hotel. First day of check in at the front desk i am totally feel like going back home.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointing
desc: Great location. Staff friendly and accommodating in lobby and on floors. BUT actual hotel is very much in need of refurbishment. Wallpaper and paintwork tired and dull. Low levels of natural light add to the dingy appearance. We stayed in a deluxe club room which was small, made worse by being crowded by a huge and unnecessary 'grandfather' armchair. Club Lounge was old and dingy with worn furniture. Breakfast in the hotel's Straits Cafe left a lot to be desired.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Holiay
desc: Close to everything - Orchard Road, shopping centres food shops - Walk or catch the MRT to everywhere. Clean, friendly, not overcrowded 3rd Stay here and would stay again. Our Updated room was lovely. View to Mariner each morning.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Central City
desc: This hotel is a great location for transport needs shopping and access to the sights .Up-grading to the Club gave us benefits at a minimal price. The staff were very nice and accommodating, we would stay there again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good hotel for business and leisure travel
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights for conference events and a bit of leisure. The hotel location is perfect to me, it is right next to Bencoolen MRT station, which is also 3 station away from the CBD area. In leisure, i could basically walk around to area like Bugis, to the CHIJIMES, or i could take MRT / buses to everywhere i wanted to.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Overall very good stay. Room was very comfortable and quiet with lots of storage space. We did not use the open WiFi that was included but on request they supplied us with a secure WiFi that worked perfectly during our stay. We upgraded to a ? Deluxe room so the minibar was included free and restocked each day, this includes two beers a day which in Singapore almost pays for the upgrade. The hop on hop off bus tour that is included with the upgrade is not with the larger companies and so we were unable to use it for our needs because of poor route information. The MTS underground station is literally in front of the hotel so very convenient.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Place
desc: i love staying at the Rendezvous. great location . walk to every where. the staff were very helpful. the mrt and buses are at the door. we walked to marina bay and back , many shops and food places close by

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, friendly staff, but very tired hotel in need of renovation.
desc: This hotel has a great location, good sized rooms and amenities, but is in need of a refurbishment. The room is shabby and worn out. Staff are very helpful and friendly and the room was sufficiently clean, but I was definitely disappointed by how shabby everything was. The doors on cupboards stuck because they were all beaten up, tiles chipped, and furniture tired.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location, Service and for Wheelchair-bound Guests
desc: Although its not a new as the other hotels in Singapore, Rendezvous Hotel Singapore makes up for it by the warmth and care of its staff and the location. Also, as we were travelling with a wheelchair bound guest, the room and the bathroom were definitely made for those that need the space and the support needed for those in a wheelchair. The front desk staff, particularly Kevin, made sure that he remembers the guests that he checks-in, and would always be a patient and friendly guy whenever I had a question or needed something. Manu, the deputy manager, greeted us as we checked-in and made sure everything was ready for us for our 1-week stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: complete facility
desc: the hotel is in strategic location, as it is just a block away from the famous orchard road. We have two options of MRT stations near it. The facility of the hotel is complete and the service is very good and helpful.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best hotels in Singapore
desc: Rendezvous Hotel is very week located near the subway (MRT) and the bus stops are at the gateway of the hotel. This is a service oriented hotel. The staff are very friendly and attentive. Catering services are excellent and the durian dessert at the Straits restaurant of the hotel is a must. Rendez-vous is definitely my reference for my future visit to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good place to stay
desc: Overall our experience with the hotel was very good, reception staff were so helpful as was 90% of the staff. The only slight negative was the repeat breakfast as we stayed 5 nights. Central to what we needed in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: Very calming ambience, close to many sightseeing locations and many nearby cafe's and restaurants. Artistic features of the lobby and corridors and very good Club experience. This is a great place to stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Third time's a charm
desc: For my birthday treat, my husband paid for my 12-night stay at the Rendezvous from end Nov until early Dec 2019. As expected I had a most wonderful stay. The twin room was clean with towels changed daily. Housekeeping was meticulous in maintaining the standard. Complimentary bottles of water and the minibar items were replenished daily. Front desk was friendly and polite. Special mention of Daniel Rodriguez who was most helpful when I had to extend my stay for an extra night due to a fractured toe. The breakfast buffet however, was a let down. I remembered in my past two stays that the food variety was much more than it is now. Dismal spread I would say. Luckily I only paid for it on the last day; otherwise it wouldn't have been worth it IMO. The main pro is the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding Banquet
desc: Held our wedding lunch at Rendevouz. Huang Yan, the Sales Manager, was very friendly and prompt in delivering her services. Always smiling and giving us very positive vibes. She delivered everything that was agreed during our earlier meet ups even though we did not remind her. Her answers to our questions were always straight to the point which helped us get clear pictures of what to expect. The food at Rendevouz was good too! Our guests gave good reviews about it! Hotel Suite and helper room were cosy and clean. Both rooms were beautifully decorated when we checked in. I would recommend Rendevouz Hotel to anyone! Well done, Yan and team! Thank you for making our special day a memorable one for us and our guests!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value quality and experience
desc: Real value in a perfect location as the metro right at the door. Definitely recommend and we'll be back. I would say close to the best value you could get in Singapore Service was excellent and late checkout unbeatable.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Executive level staff are fantastic!!!
desc: The team on the executive were great. In particular Sophia on the executive level is amazing! In general the staff were very helpful and professional. I will definitely be back... The only area the hotel could improve is offer more vegetarian meals...

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel for the location and price
desc: From check-in to check-out, I stayed 5 days, with friendly and helpful staff, I had a very over-all pleasant stay. The room was small, but adequate. Only complaint is that I could hear voices of next door.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly and Efficient
desc: Sofia from the Executive Floor at level 11 was a breath of fresh air and she attended to my various requests impeccably. Sofia went the extra mile to provide a service unparalleled with other main hotels that I have stayed in internationally. Thank you again Ms Sofia.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value for money. Excellent choice
desc: Second time staying at this hotel. Clean room. A bit of queue upon check in but not waited very long.Food was great and on time. Will come back again and will recommend to my friends when staying at singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel- great location
desc: Very good experience- great staff- room wa sgood. wifi easy- very nice lobby downstairs. The location is perfect- right in center andnear MRT station- ( few meters). Really everything was fine. Will return

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic
desc: 3rd time stay at Rendezvous, warmly and intimate service like always, thanks the club room front desk staff Sophia whom makes me feel like home every time. Located at the center of Singapore, 2 minutes walk to the MRT station. This is the one of your must try hotel in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay. Very comfortable.
desc: Great location. Easy to get to Raffles and Orchard Road. Good transport facilities at the front door. Love the remaining colonial architecture. Singapore also very safe for a solo traveller. Botanic Gardens just beautiful, first time visit and loved them, a real highlight.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay at Rendezvous Hotel
desc: Staycation at Bras Basah Rendezvous Hotel. Good experience. Breakfast is good. Very convenient. Surround the hotel is eatery place. MRT is just beside the hotel. Very near to Shopping centre. The hot shower is good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice and pleasant stay at the hotel while preparing for my exam
desc: The location of the hotel is great, just beside the MRT station and there are food court and plenty of eatery and pub for your family. The Front Desk personnel is nice and proposed me to upgrade to the Club room for just $50 with the access to the Club facilities which is great. The Club room is nice and cosy.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Anniversary Getaway
desc: We stay for one night for our wedding anniversary and have nothing but praises for this cosy hotel. Nestled at the quiet end of Orchard road (it is seriously right at the end of the famed Road of Singapore), it is nonetheless easy to reach the posh section at Ion Orchard area. Many buses converge at the bus stop right outside the main door. Add to that 2 MRT stations right outside the door and you have an unbeatable combo here. The breakfast is decent though choices could be more varied. All the staff we encountered were friendly and cheerful- must be a great place to work at! The hotel concierge kindly extended our checkout timing to 4pm and we had a lot of time to cosy around till checkout. Will definitely return given the chance!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 3 night stay for Business & Pleasure
desc: My best hotel experience in Singapore to date! Beautiful hotel, nicely renovated. Rooms are a generous size and come well equipped. The Club Room upgrade was well worth it and gave a nice spot to work our of and the staff were extremely welcoming and helpful. Comments on room for improvement: Gym was not well equipped for a regular user and very small for a property of this size. The breakfast options got old after just a couple of days - nice Asian options but the international (western) options were very limited and carb-heavy. Maybe a few more options required here. The coffee machine was also only a self serve (and quite slow) machine, meaning it could take quite a long time to queue for a coffee in the busy part of the morning. While the coffee tasted great, it may be

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location the main attraction
desc: MRT Station (Bencoolen) is merely a footstep away for traveler's. Ideal for getting around places and there is a convenient store located at the lobby. Recommended for those who don't mind getting around by MRT.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful hotel - great facilities
desc: Stayed there for a few days before and after cruise - rather have stayed here for duration and avoided cruise - venue was fantastic- nothing to much trouble great facilities great value - happy to return anytime

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous in Sungapore
desc: Excellent location with refurbished, modern rooms. Handy to MRT, Raffles and Orchard Rd. Plenty of eating options are nearby. Staff are helpful for and friendly. Only issue experienced was with WiFi where At here were problems getting internet access.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel rating
desc: Good. The location was good to the access to MRT and the room was kept clean and I felt very comfortable. Wifi access was easy to use. If we could enjoy more various kind of daily changing breakfast, the hotel will be more comfortable to stay!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Needs improvement
desc: Needs improvement in quite a lot of things. Firstly the rooms were dated when we thought it would be modern. You can hear noises from neighbouring rooms at night interrupting sleep. There is no kettle or tea coffee facilities. The iron didnt work very well.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Fun
desc: The hotel is great, staff, location, bars and restaurants. We recommend this hotel. Great pool, great food, we loved our stay. Right on the Red Bus stop, close to the fantastic Singapore Museum. We will return.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Welcoming and Personal Service
desc: Location perfect, MRT around the corner and easy walk to Orchard and City Hall. A big thank you to Sofia and her staff in the Club Lounge. The team were incredibly attentive and greeted us everyday with a personal touch. Whilst the Club Lounge was a little tired and could do with some immediate cosmetic changes, it was easy to overlook because the service was wonderful. Having stayed for a week, we noticed the evening canapes were on fast rotation, so there wasn't a great deal of choice throughout our stay. This should be reviewed. The rooms were spacious enough, but again a little tired. All in all, a fantastic stay made better through great service.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great as always!
desc: Service at the hotel is great with a very pro-active approach. In particular club room is recommended (thank you Sofia). Overall the facilities and room were excellent. Location also worked well for me. Will stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Staff was friendly; breakfast was excellent; and location superb. Plenty of good dining nearby. I went to SMU, the museum, and Little India, all of which were within walking distance. What makes it even more convenient is that there's an MRT station right around the corner.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and facilities
desc: I stayed at the hotel for the first time for 3 nights. Really great location literally next to the Bencoolen MRT with access to practically everywhere. I had a very late flight and the staff let me use the lounge and refresh with a shower even though I had checked out. Kudos to Sofia for arranging everything for me. Really helpful staff and great amenities. Will definitely stay there again!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Central City Accomodation
desc: A well placed hotel with clean and functional facilities however rooms are quite small with limited storage space for couples staying any length of time. Leaving cases on the floor is not ideal. Breakfast menu is limited but adequate, library bar is excellent for guests and serve is of high quality,

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice
desc: Very nice location and easy access to public transportation. Food is nice, little crowded, staffs are very nice especially club floor and lounge too. Cleaning little improve needed, we noticed hair and stain at our sheets and bathroom.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice hotel in the nice location
desc: This is a nice hotel in the nice location. Right outside, there is Bencoolen MRT Station, and across the hotel is Kopitiam. Plasa Singapura is 8 minutes walk from the hotel. The room is a little small, but it is a good stay for 2 day trip.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location
desc: Location is convenient as it is just beside Bencoolen MRT Exit 2. Choice of breakfast at Straits Cafe was sufficient. Room is neat and clean. The room is quiet so it is a good place for people who wants to rest and relax.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyed my stay
desc: I was there way too early for the check in . For a small amount I got upgraded and I managed to easily settle in after flying red eye . All thanks to the staffs at front desk who made everything happen smooth and fast . Room was good . Every day cleaned . Well lit . Quiet . Mini bar was replenished everyday . Hotel is at excellent location , right next to MRT , Bus stop and museums . There are many restaurants nearby . Staffs were always there to help . Breakfast was okish but loved the ala carte menu . Portion was huge too . Loved the swimming pool and jacuzzi bath . Gym was small but useful . Check out smooth too . Will definitely return .

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Dec 2019
desc: Your club lounge's food lacks variety compare to last 2 yrs xmas eve.Food is also serve cold into warmer which is unacceptable for a hotel standard.Staff stares n gossips when we took some can drinks to our room to drink.This my third yr with ull.Need to reconsider my choice of staycation if no improvment.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location is good.
desc: Location is good very convenient tobmetro Station. There are restaurant and bars around the area, closeby shopping malls. Room was too small as well as the bed. it doesn't look same in the website. Dusty hallways.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent and clean enough
desc: Superior Room is rather small. Toothbrush quality is not good. Air-con is weak. Lift abit slow. Building is old. TV programmes variety is good. Location is near plaza sing/bugis/suntec and train station.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: wonderful end-year stay in my favourite hotel.
desc: I decided to choose this hotel as one hotel blog describe Club Rendezvous as top 10 Club Lounge in Singapore . Most of these hotels listed in Top 10 are 5 star hotels which are pricey at this period of the year. I booked 2 night stay in Club Room there which cost me total of $680 inclusive of taxes and service charges. Check in- I went to reception at 1st floor. The reception checked at my booking and asked porter to take me to 11th floor . There, I was greeted by Club Rendevzous staffs. who led me to club lounge where I was served a cup of aromatic coffee. while my booking was processed. Then I was asked to pay deposit of S$100 ( incidental deposit of 4 star hotel is $50 per night.) When the room was ready, I entered the room. Nice room with large King Bed,and there is

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Close to shopping at Orchard Road
desc: Nice fairly priced hotel well located close to all shopping on Orchard Road. I recommend the Club rooms that include breakfast and afternoon drinks and canapes. Also it includes washing Service of 2 clothes per day which is convenient in the humid and warm weather-

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
desc: Dear all staffs and managers, I am writing to express my appreciation for the quality of service you offered me wedding banquet (21 December 2019) of our 2 days stay at the Hotel Rendezvous bras basah in singapore. Thank you especially for being aware of your excellent service for staffs and managers, every segment of your hotel. Despite of the many bridal packages offers we received from other hotels, we decided to choose your hotel because of the unbeatable deal you offered us. We just wanted to let you know how much we valued that effort, how impressive and gracious and how greatly we appreciate everything that you personally and your staffs did for us. We have always a great time staying at rendezvous and loved the property. We will definitely recommend your hotel to

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous
desc: Great location, friendly staff and lovely atmosphere. Being so close to Orchard Road it means you can walk to everything locally. Efficient service to get a taxi to the airport and to other locations such as the wildlife parks.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money
desc: Was disappointed with one room delayed for check in, was meant to be rooms side by side ended with a smaller room 3 hrs late. But overall experience still within acceptable range. Food range during of peak are the same daily only cake n fruit and is the same type everyday.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Hotel
desc: The breakfast was wonderful. The staff was very friendly. The location was perfect. The swimming pool was clean. The hotel location was perfect, almost near to everything. I would have liked that the dinner themes would have been more towards International Cuisine rather than Asian.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall a great stay!
desc: Great location and price. The staff was friendly and the rooms are very well equipped. The curtains need some adjustment as sunlight can get in easily so if you are easily awoken by light, I recommend bringing some sleep masks. Other than that, great place!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Tired,
desc: The staff were great, good cleanliness, but the exec club seats were a disaster and needed replaced two years ago!! There were also old leak stains in our room which is totally unacceptable in my opinion. If it had not been for these points i would have given the hotel a very good review

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful Staff
desc: Hotel location was great for me and my family. The staff were excellent and went above and beyond. I asked for adjoining rooms as my adult kid came with us and when I made the booking I was told they would do their best to accommodate and they did we had adjoining rooms. The staff are the most beautiful, warm, kind and helpful staff we have ever come across. Totally recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Hotel is in a good location, next to metro station. Rooms are very comfortable and spacious. All the amenities you can think of. I would definitely stay here again and strongly recommend to others. Good value.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Always a pleasure
desc: Love staying here, we always use this hotel when in Singapore this would be our third stay in 3 years, Such good value for money and the most friendly of staff. Great pool and facilities. Breakfast is good too.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay at Singapore
desc: Kind of a late review. I was there at Hotel Rendezvous on last December during the Christmas. I was on a official travel and I had second thoughts when I'm booking the hotel since it was my 1st time at Rendezvous hotel. However I must say I was wrong. The hotel is really good. They have a friendly staff. The only problem we had was me and my colleague couldn't get near by rooms. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. I had a problem in the shower but the a person from maintenance department helped mt out to fix that. Unfortunately I can't remember his name & appreciate if Hotel can find out the person and reward him by following the booking i made under my name. Hotel Rendezvous has a small bu good Buffet. Don't have a larger choice but it's really good. very close to MRT and bus

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Well located!
desc: We stayed here for a night prior to a cruise from Singapore. Fantastically located, a short taxi ride from the airport and an even shorter ride to the cruise terminal. Surrounded by shops and nightclubs, has convenience store and shops in the same complex. The restaurant is Muslim and doesn't serve alcohol but they will bring your meals into the hotel bar where you can enjoy them along with something from the bar! Comfortable, well priced, well located, would be happy to return - well recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Old and dusty
desc: Location is nice because it’s very close to Bencoolen train station and in few blocks you can find some restaurants that serves local foods. But the hotel is kinda creepy it’s dark and the hallways are dusty. Service was okay staff was helpful.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall fine but still some suggestions
desc: Overall I'm satisfied during my stay. Some feedback: 1. 26th Dec is my mom's birthday. I asked the reception one day before whether there's any cake/promo from hotel, they said yes, a cake will be delivered to the room after 2pm on 26th. However, it didn't show up eventually and I waited till night. I could've arranged one from another cake shop if I knew this wasn't gonna happen. That was a BIG let-down! 2. The room seems a bit tired. It's better if the window can be opened for fresh air. 3. Strong and pungent perfume smell in the lobby, the smell feels artificial and not natural at all.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Xmas Holiday Visit
desc: As always its a great experience with the hotel and their staff. Minor hickups only at arrival where they need extra time to prep the room.overall its always a good choice for short or long term visit.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Go for upgrade club!
desc: Very nice and warm service ... go for Club upgrade! Worth to do so .... relax atmosphere and perfect customers service . Rooms are cleaned and confortable. Not my first time and It won t be the last one ... my home in Singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and enjoyable stay
desc: This hotel is in a great location within walking distance to some amazing sights and museums. We had a very pleasant week's stay. There was no need to use the restaurant (we didn't include breakfast) due to good quality, cheap local food places. Check out the hawker centre 5 mins walk away on Waterloo Road. We particularly want to thank Paneer at the Rendezvous Hotel for walking my mother to the local doctor's clinic in the pouring rain one morning. Great service!
