The housekeeping staff were also friendly and accommodating though they appeared to be overworked.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, very comfortable
desc: Very convenient as Bencoolen MRT station just next to it. Stayed at Deluxe Plus room and very satisfied with the late check out time at 4pm and also complimentary mini bar for this room type. Experienced some inconvenience during check out time but overall great stay here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Our stay
desc: This was our first time in Singapore, and the staff at the Rendevous hotel were very friendly and helpful. The staff gave us helpful tips on what we should see and how we could get there. The facilities are very clean.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Location
desc: Easy to access as it is very near (just next to) to the blue line Bencolen MRT Station and also it is just in front of the bus station. It is a very convenient place for accessibility to other places such as Bugis, etc.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My current favorite hotel in SG!
desc: Location is GREAT. Easy access to 2 MRT lines, Bras Basah at the back with all the restaurants. Modern coffeeshop across the street, 711 downstairs! I didn't get to eat breakfast or dinner at the hotel's buffet restaurant, however. Staff: They're GREAT Rooms: Medium Sized by Singapore Standards. And they are somewhat new or recently refurbished. Internet: Fairly fast and reliable. This has easily become my favorite hotel in SG at the moderately priced hotel range. I would definitely come back here if i was travelling alone. This hotel is not quite 4 stars. but definitely above a 3 stars. Amazing Hotel At the Right Price.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy days
desc: Having stayed at this hotel previously in a Club room, enjoying everything about it we decided to return . Arriving well before check in time the staff in Club lounge were as before ,very helpful. Kelvin and Tiffany went out of their way to ensure we were accommodated with refreshments immediately and an offer of a junior suite at a very reasonable price was accepted . As in our previous stay Sofia was exceptional, this lady is outstanding in her role of hospitality. We have enjoyed long conversations with all of the team in the Club lounge Sofia, Joyous Kathleen,Tiffany and Kelvin are all so pleasant and helpful it certainly made our stay enjoyable.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very warm welcome as home
desc: My stay in Singapore, at Rendezvous hotel, is just like coming back home. I always get a very warm welcome here, thank you Rendezvous hotel team. Hearty hospitality, keep me coming back here, and not going anywhere else : )

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: RENDEZVOUS HOTEL SINGAPORE....A home when your not at home...
desc: Rendezvous Bras Basah, ideally located in the heart of Singapore accommodation to meet your needs. I love Singapore, I discovered this amazing hotel. From the front desk to your room or suite you feel the comfort and very friendly and accommodating staff.Special thanks to Guest Services Exc Sofia and her wonderful staff in the Club Lounge... Joyous and Dayang..

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cleaning needs to be strengthened
desc: The toilet is not clean enough, check in the toilet on the first day The urine smell is very heavy and smelly, and the service staff has been notified to improve it slightly. Hope to improve in the future

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: warmly received by front desk and club lounge staff and offered upgrade to jr suite for an extra $35
desc: would have preferred more living space in the jr suite rather than a spacious bathroom, only a single sofa that has seen better days, hope for better spread at breakfast in the lounge plus pts, friendly staff, great pool ( water too brrrr cold)and jacuzzi,

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding
desc: The best Hotel and service I have ever experienced. I stayed on floor 11 with the amazing club rendezvous team. The rooms are immaculately clean, contemporary yet relaxing decor and all the staff display proffesionalness and passion in equal measure. My job requires me to stay in hotels all over the world. For efficiency, Switzerland. For style Italy, for friendliness USA. Or you can stay at Hotel Rendezvouz, Singapore meet Sophia, Kelvin and Kathleen and have it all in one place. Complimentary cocktails, food, laundry and mini bar. words are not enough, experience it for yourself.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, great location
desc: An older but stylish and very comfortable hotel with friendly and attentive staff. Great value club add-on on the 11th floor. Quite but very central to everything including trains, buses, National Museum, Raffles Hotel, Orchard Rd, Little India.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fair Value. Good public transport.
desc: Clean, comfortable bedding, helpful, happy staff in a good central location, next to the MRT, buses and eateries. Although clean, the hotel is tired and run down. Understaffed, highly fragranced in the lobby which mimicked insect spray. We stayed here for 8 nights, however the rooms are fairly small and cluttered even with an adjoining family/kids room. Bathroom taps were tricky to use. Lighting switches/panels were also not functional nor practical to use. One of the lifts didn’t appear to be working too well which scared us a tad, esp the kids. We called this the dodgy lift!! Carpets looked fairly dirty. Cleaners do not vacuum the rooms so our sons’ allergies were a little rattled with the dust. The breakfast was more expensive than some of the other surrounding, 5 star

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location
desc: We stayed a night at this hotel. The check-in process was efficient, front desk staff were warm and friendly. The room is cosy with nice warm lightings, however, the room and its furnishings were getting dated. The bed is comfortable and we had a good night sleep. However, the cleanliness of the bathroom could be improved. There were hair on the floor from the previous guest. The location of the hotel is great. Easy access to public transport. There is a bus stop and 2 MRT stations (Downtown Line and Circle Line) right at the door step. There is a 7-11 convenience store at ground level and a food court is just next to the hotel. Great location!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: GREAT CHARACTER WITH EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE
desc: The Rendezvous is very well located for all of Singapore’s attractions, the hotel is an older building and has a great character and ambiance, comfy beds. customer service and staff friendliness that is second to none, overall great value for money

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: club room
desc: I stayed at club room. the service was great with food and TWG tea. the hotel location is also very good direct to the MRT downtown line station and closed to singapore museum. Internet connection is also good for web meeting.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location
desc: Great location right next to MRT and walking distance to shops. We were upgraded so our room was big. The only negative thing was the check in and check out process, it took ages. Would definitely recommend

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Memorable Stay
desc: We had the pleasure of staying with Rendezvous Hotel Singapore for our 3D2N staycation during which we made ourselves feel at home in their Club Room. Unlocking the door and stepping into the room, we were welcomed by cool air as the room was prepared beforehand and greeted by the sight of a fairly spacious and modern-looking room. Equally spacious was the bathroom, which features a large bathtub under a window. We thoroughly enjoyed the cocktail and wine from the Club Lounge. Admittedly, we were not too impressed by the food they served, in terms of quality and variety. However, we were impressed by the quality service the hotel staff provided, who we can only describe as attentive, accommodating, friendly, polite and professional. Overall, enjoyed our stay and would come

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My Stay Experience
desc: The location is excellent due to nearby Cathay cinema, cafes and restaurants nearby and quiet with not too many people. I also like the room which is clean, organized and well-prepared. Same for breakfast which comes in a great intercontinental style variety and well-worth my money.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: good
desc: great location, great pillows, great beds, peaceful and quiet although along main road. bathroom was nice and clean, but hotel needs a bit of refurbishment. staff was friendly,approachable and prompt.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Meet up with friends.
desc: Met up with friends from other countries at this central location. When we arrived at Singapore airport we went downstairs and booked the coach, two people for £10 and journey took about 50 mins. The hotel did have a 7-11 on the ground floor where we stocked up on water and milk. The room was clean, bathroom lovely. We were only spending three nights there so didn’t book breakfast. Instead within 50 meters of the hotel there is a Starbucks, but just before Starbucks there is a Singaporean food mall. With about six different food stations in, a toast bar, but it appeared most Singaporeans eat curry or soup for breakfast and these stores were very well stocked with freshly cooked food We did use the hop on hop off bus tour for two days and the bus stopped right outside

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A quiet couple's staycation
desc: A quiet and beautiful room and good location for a little weekend staycation for us. Bed is comfortable enough with nice food easily accessible. check in staff is prompt and efficient. Will return again and highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great room for a nice chill out
desc: Nice room n friendly staff. The bed is high n soft. Aircon is strong. Toilet bidet is very useful. Able to supply more bottled water upon requests. The complementary carpark ticket is very useful. Save a lot of money.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: Nice hotel. But sales guy had been replaced for my company contract and that guys attitude is not nice.And new WiFi system, always disconnected after turned of smart phone it's too much trouble.Toilet is excellent all Japanese loves water bidet. They should add it for all rooms.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional Accomodation
desc: We recommend paying a little extra and staying on the 11th floor, making use of the Club benefits. The breakfast was fabulous each day, the room was so quiet and staff were exceptional. It was wonderful being able to access the lounge for drinks all day, the cocktails between 6-8pm were also fabulous along with a great selection of appetisers

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Food at breakfast
desc: The various of food supposed to be better ... more of choices of the food..and the foods is not everyday the same taste.. shud be different everyday.. so that we can enjoy the breakfast .. thankyou bye.bye

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Our extended holiday
desc: Brilliant hotel to stay in. Location and price are wonderful. Staff were friendly. Having stayed before we knew what to expect and were not disappointed or dissatisfied. Our room was very spacious and comfortable. Would recommend this hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay but would stay elsewhere next time
desc: We arrived here a day late due to our flight being cancelled and reception had told us that I had requested twin beds, I said ok as I assumed they would be 2 queen size beds so it wouldn’t be a problem. Getting into the room the beds were tiny, I checked my booking and I had requested a queen bed. Not only that but as soon as we stepped out of the elevator the whole floor stank of smoke (even though it is a non-smoking hotel) and in our room must have been the room they person smoked in because it was so so strong, it made me feel sick. After calling up and complaining about this, after them stating I had requested twin beds again and me saying I could show them my booking they moved us rooms - there was no way I could have stayed in the original room with the smell. The new

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Customer Service
desc: Due to the recent virus scare we thought we would want to cancel our staycation but the boys had been looking forward to it. So as not to disappoint them I upgraded to the Club Junior Suite, minimise contact with other guests in the hotel. I would like to express my grattitude to the staff from the front desk, I am sorry I missed her name who personally escorted us to level 11 to check in. Dayang Sari was there with another colleague to help us with the check in and brief us on the benefits we are entitled to the club lounge. Our two days of breakfast were made comfortable and pleasant with Sophia and Balan. These duo were such angels. Their excellent customer services to the guests other than ourselves in the club lounge. Taking photo and personalised the greeting card was

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous Stay
desc: We had an excellent experience with friendly and helpful staff. All genuinely friendly and happy to help. Rooms are spacious, beautifully clean with nice outlook. Food are excellent as well. Highly recommended! Thank you again for everything, certainly the best Wedding Anniversary celebration with my wife and kids. Really appreciated all hotel staff efforts.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel
desc: Great hotel and warm reception upon check in. Nice high floor room overlooking the skyline. Has small fridge, big smart tv, comfy beds, strong a/c, toilet with bidet, shower etc. Was quiet and slept well. Small pool area nice too with accompanying gym. Location is ideal with 7/11 downstairs, shops and food court neighbouring and numerous transport options including buses and train lines. Most GRAB and taxi drivers know this place so easy to come/go as you wish. Highly recommended for any Singapore stays. Suitable for couples and families too.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: With good service from friendly and kind club staff, I enjoyed the quiet stay, with good food and drinks at the club in the morning and in the evening. The room is clean and comfortable. Wifi speed was good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice mid-priced hotel in great location
desc: Stayed there with husband for 2 nights before cruise. Very nice front desk staff made room available at 9 a.m. We had just flown for 2 days and were exhausted so this was very nice. Upgraded room to include breakfast buffet and the hop on/hop off bus that stopped right outside hotel. Room was very nice as was breakfast. Hotel is very quiet. Hop on/off turned out to be a great thing to do since we were sleep deprived and just wanted to see the city. We hopped off at Chinatown and enjoyed a food stall lunch, then hopped off at the Botanical Gardens which were magnificent, especially the Orchid Garden. Hotel is walking distance (40 min or so) to the Marina Towers area and Gardens on the Bay which we greatly enjoyed seeing. There is also a very handy money changing machine

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Holiday
desc: Great location, close to many tourist attractions. The hotel staffs are amazing, engaging and cheerful. I think the hotel has a potential to do better/improve, the management need to make sure all rooms are in excellent condition.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice place
desc: Good location clean , The breakfast was short with vegetable and cheese it was more for Asian guest, not for europeans guests , in the past stay the breakfast was better. The bed was comfortable but queen bad too small

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: great location
desc: The location could not have been better with access to public transport outside the front door and within easy walking distance of many of the city highlights. The Club facilities were very good. All of the staff, particularly those in the Club area, were especially helpful and friendly. The presentation of the ground floor facilities was excellent but the rest of the hotel was a bit "tired" looking and in need of refurbishment when compared to many of the newer hotels available at similar cost in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: very enjoyable stay, great location, nice people
desc: I really enjoyed my stay at the Rendezvous Hotel and will gladly go back. The location is ideal for sightseeing, both on foot and via public transportation. I was happy to have a Club Floor room. Breakfast, access to the lounge throughout the day, drinks and snacks in the evening, laundry of two items per day included – it all made my stay that much more enjoyable. The people who work at the hotel are uniformly nice and helpful, including Sofia and Kathleen at the Club Floor lounge. Some of the common areas look a bit worn around the edges, but I understand some refurbishment is in the works. The two rooms I saw were both very nice and up-to-date (not much drawer space, a minor point). The fitness room is unremarkable but gets the job done, and the pool area looks nice.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Beautiful hotel on great location, very near 3 MRT stations. Excellent service and spacios room. Very clean and nice. Big tv, tea and coffie, big bathroom, nice city view. Good restaurant and shop inside the hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and great service
desc: Hotel is in a great position close to Raffles with buses and trains adjacent. Hotel room was a decent size with comfortable bed and very clean. Lighting is dismal; particularly in the bathroom. Reception and concierge service was outstanding. Great place to stay in Singapore!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful stay!
desc: Subway and buses directly at the hotel. Good location. Breakfast excellent. A swimming pool in the town center is a plus. Rooms clean and well furbished. Staff perfect. Thank you very much, we recommand this hotel!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short break in Singapore
desc: Good location. Excellent staff. Clean and well serviced. The desk staff helped with all enquiries about transport, and the MRT was absolutely first class. We were within easy distance of the stations, and only a short walk from the world famous ‘Raffles’ Hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb hospitality
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights on work. This hotel is in a great location..very convenient for CBD meetings. Bencoleen metro is right outside the hotel and so is convenient bus stop. As regards the hotel, one must stay in the club rooms..slightly higher priced but totally worth it. Free minibar with beers as well. Free drinks n snacks from 6 to 8pm everyday..and drinks do have a lot of variety. Hot snacks including vegetarian options as well. The club room offers 2 pieces of free laundry every day which was super helpful since I stayed 5 nights. Bathrooms r decent sized n functional. The toilet seat was electronically heated n controlled ..much like the Japanese n Korean washrooms are..very comfortable. The rooms had a really big tv with one Hindi channel as well. Staff is

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient location
desc: Generally I enjoyed my stay here. On checking the staff member told me I wasn’t eligible for late check out despite that being the reason I booked a club room. Thankfully the staff at the executive floor were able to confirm what I was able to check out late (having booked a club room). The room was clean and modern. The gym whilst small was functional and had everything I needed. Breakfast was lovely and staff at executive lounge very friendly. The location was great, so close to major attractions and public transport

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Weekend stay in club room
desc: Stayed in a club room which was worth paying extra for. The service in the club lounge was great and all the staff were top class, special mention of Sophia who welcomed us and gave us 110% service throughout our stay. The quality of the drinks and canapés were first class, rooms could have been a bit bigger but as we were out most of the time it didn’t really matter. The hotel is a little older than some of the modern hotels but for us the location was superb being central and within walking distance to most sightseeing, a bonus was it was just up the road from Raffles and the iconic Long Bar. Would we stay again, definitely.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location and value for money
desc: Have stayed here twice now, and have found the hotel to be very comfortable. Hotel staff are friendly and accomodating when checking in at 3am. It’s located right on the doorstep of Bencoolen MRT station, and has a bus stop right outside the entrance. It has a 7-eleven, coffee shop, Mexican restaurant and cafe attached to the building. Further food option can be found across the road (Food Republic, Starbucks, Pizza, Subway, etc) Hotel has a pool and spa that can be used until 10pm. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: A good hotel, with a very good location, walking distance to shopping area and not very far (30 minutes waking distance to Marina Bay). The room is spacious, spotless bed linen, a little bit hard the bed. Breakfast has a lot of options, not so many fruits, and salami, but anyhow very good. We have been happy to choose this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great New Year Staycation
desc: Spending New Year is equally enjoyable and relaxing with great service, good meals, workout in gym and laze by the pool side. Pleasantly surprised to try out the new gym equipment. Not forgetting the attentive service provided by the following staff despite full occupancy by holiday making guests. They are friendly, accommodating and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organisation. I am sure I will be back again. Club Lounge : Kathleen, Sofia, Kiki, Tiffany, Dayang, Kelvin, Balan and Diana Front Office : Daniel Straits Café : Roy, Marlon and Khairool

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Locations and Rooms.
desc: Pros: Great Location - Bencoolen stop on Downtown line easy to get to from airport and on same block as hotel. Dhoby Ghaut right nearby. Good value for Singapore hotels and room quite nice. Cons: Room needs a little bit more attentive cleaning (room carpet not the cleanest) but otherwise okay. Would stay again if price is right.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business stay - Jan 2020
desc: Great experience had - excellent staff with awesome attitude, nice vibe, great rooms which are well equipped, nice amenities, great position with views and proximity. Perhaps only slight criticism might be that the breakfast buffet could use some more choices and the in-room WiFi needs to be faster (particularly given it's Singapore!)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hidden gem in plain sights
desc: Most taxi drivers don't know Rendezvous hotel, though it is right there where Orchard road turns into Bras Basah road. Large size, art deco style. It is a very comfortable hotel. Just renovated. We had a nice quiet room overlooking the pool. The housekeeping is good. Straits Cafe where we had breakfast was fine. Staff here too were excellent. The hotel is a few minutes from two different MRT lines. A bust stop is right outside. So you can go to any part of this great city pretty easily. Plaza Singapura a huge mall is 10 minutes away to eat and shop to your heart's content. Overall a great hotel. Just don't tell anyone. We don't want it to be over crowded and increase their prices now, do we?

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Final leg of our Cruise
desc: I have been to Singapore many times and I feel that I have seen it for the first time, mainly of the different position of the hotel experience. This hotel is not as well known as other hotels but it surpasses them in many ways. The staff were genuinely considerate and helpful as my brother was disabled and they helped in more ways than one. Thanks guys !!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great 👍
desc: We Normally stay at Royal Plaza on Scott’s but this time we thought we will give Rendezvous on Bras Basah Road a go. We were not disappointed with our choice we were very that we chose the club rooms here. The lounge needs a bit of TLC but that’s not a major. We will definitely be going back there for all the staff we very helpful. You have return customers and I will also be Recommending this hotel for my friends visit. 😊

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Room are very clean
desc: Very good is a recommended 4 stars hotel in Singapore. Location is very good next to Roche Centre, Bugis Street as well as Orchard road. Easily accessibly to else where, bus stop, taxi stop and MRT station nearby

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Andrey
desc: Best quality for the money.Excellent location and service. One drawback was that there were no towels in the pool for the whole day.Otherwise, the hotel deserves only praise. Will definitely be back in May

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: No King Bed despite Booking one
desc: My partner and I booked and paid for a King sized bed but when we arrived we were put in a room with a single double bed. We did get “club status” which I’m unsure if we had paid for or not, but it did come with lounge access that was a nice little benefit. That being said, the breakfast provided was really not good at all, though the snacks they put out during other times of the day were nice. Honestly, we would have rather just had the king sized bed we’d paid for. It kind of put a damper on an otherwise pretty good hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Old-Charm Hotel with Commendable Service
desc: Loved the attentiveness of your staff at the Club. Location is good, with bus stop just beside the property and MRT just few minutes walk away. But there is no major shopping mall around within walking distance, the nearest being the Marina Square and The Shoppes at MBS.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: Good, just that sofa and sofa chair needs to be improved. Too hard and too airy. Overall was good. It was my partner’s birthday and they upgraded our room to the biggest room. Very good service. Happy to stay here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Late checkout
desc: Had a long layover in SG and booked a room with them as there’s a promotion for late checkout on their website, little did we know that it needs a prior confirmation via phone or email. Duty Manager at the time was very helpful and accommodating. Location is very convenient and room is clean, will definitely come back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good experience for the hotel and its location
desc: Excellent staff, with attention to details. Club lounge was booked and we could enjoy a late check out. Room was very clean and silent. Location is great, MRT and bus station at the hotel. See you again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Normal Hotell
desc: Good location, no breakfast included, looks a bit old, but clean. Pool area needs to be updated. Price worth for a short stay. Wouldn’t stay here for a longer stay. But if you plan to be out on the town and only need a clean and quiet room with a good location for a reasonable price, this is a good pick.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location & Stay.
desc: This hotel is very well placed near train stations, bus stops, and plenty of places to eat near by. Little India, Marina, etc are all within 30 minutes if you like to walk. We stayed for 3 nights from 30/01/2020. Rooms are fair size, clean, comfy double bed and no noise. Reception staffs and all other staff service is very good and polite. After our stay we went away to other near by country and returned back to Singapore 10 a.m. on 13/02/2020 as our flight back home was at 9 p.m. The hotel allowed us to keep our suitcases as compliment (free) while we did shopping on our last day. We would recommend this hotel to any one. Rates per night are value for money compared to other 4 plus star hotel in the area. Thanks Rendezvous.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very positive experience
desc: Great location in the middle of everything. Excellent breakfast. Clean, roomy and comfortable rooms . Best value. I would skip the club though. not really beneficial (went to the launch only once as it was that redundant)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Room is outdated for staycation
desc: We are not sure if the breakfast buffet is halal certified since the response given via fb meseenger is Not halal before we booked our stay, just to make sure. The straits cafe is however Halal certified. Room is outdated, need to refurbished. Room lighting was quite dim.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: ok but not good enough
desc: the hotel is dated and the staff dont follow the hotels environmental policies. Towels are replaced when I indicate I dont want them replaced. The location is good and the rooms quiet and clean. A mixed experience overall.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: I stayed in the club room for 5 nights. It comes with lot of facilities like lounge access, 2 piece laundry every day, happy hours from 6 to 8. The staff is excellent and courteous. Worth staying. Enjoyed.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good quality hotel in busy built up area but within a walk of many of Singapore's sights
desc: Well appointed modern hotel with efficient staff who adopted sensible practices with our arrival being during the early days of the Coronavirus pandemic. Good sized bedroom with usual modern facilities Good variety of food at buffet breakfast inc many Asian dishes Although located in a busy built up area the hotel is well located being within walking distance (albeit along busy roads) of many of Singapore's tourist sights inc- Art Gallery (3/4 mins), Singapore Museum (10 mins), Raffles Hotel (10 mins), St Andrews Cathedral (15 mins) and Marina Bay (20 mins or 30 mins to Marina Bay Sands Hotel) Getting a taxi at the hotel can be a bit hit and miss with a system of queuing until they turn up, so allow plenty of time if going to the airport etc Would consider staying here again if

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: GREAT HOTEL
desc: This is a GREAT hotel. The location is perfect. The rooms are super clean and comfortable. The staff is amazing. I was celebrating a milestone bday and received a delicious slice of cake and a card from the hotel. I recommend staying in one of the Club rooms. You will enjoy free drinks and hors d'oeuvres in the Rendezvous Lounge each evening of your stay. This hotel does not disappoint!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Warm and friendly ambience and service.
desc: My husband and I stayed there for our honeymoon and we had an amazing time. Ms. Sofia at the reception was exceptionally accomodating during our stay. She was very helpful and kind. I had an amazing time. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Location for the Subway/Hop on Buses
desc: Stayed for a couple of days - good location. Had a Club room - which was great value - the even paid for the hop on hop off Bus for a day - which was very helpful to get your bearings. The breakfast was just OK - certainly the Club room breakfast was a nicer atmosphere and we enjoyed it more than the main buffet restaurant, albeit with a lot less choice ( but mostly stuff we would not be interested in). We would have liked to use the pool area a few times but the limited number of sunbeds were always occupied. The evening drinks and food were nice and we were well looked after. For the price paid this was a very good value option in SIngapore and I would stay there again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Booked an Upgrade and paid a premium for very poor service and Room.
desc: We arrived quite late about 21:30 and were shown to the 11th floor to be checked in. The lady first of all offered us what I thought was an upgrade to a room I had tried to book but was not available, but then she said we had to pay extra plus an extra $100 to check out a couple of hours later. We were not even offered a welcome drink and she kept going off to ‘speak to her boss about the price’. In the end we declined and were shown to our ‘refurbished room which had no view a dirty carpet and damage to the cupboard and door. We went out and on our return we had been upgraded to the room we had initially been asked to pay for. But even so the shower was very dirty. Due to being out and about in the city for a couple of days we could not take advantage of the free cocktails

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Warm and Caring Staff
desc: We recently stayed 6 nights at this wonderful hotel. From the moment we walked into the hotel and 6 am, we were warmly greeted. I had requested an early check in not thinking we would probably have a room before noon, but they were able to check us in by 8:00 am. We had made a reservation for the Club level rooms so we were able to wait in the club room upstairs before our room was ready. Lillian served us tea and coffee while we waited and also told us to please help ourselves to any of the breakfast foods that were available. The hotel is in an excellent location. There is a bus stop on one side of the hotel, and an MRT station on the other side. We had breakfast on the 11th floor as part of the price of our room. There were many choices every morning including

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location but offers little on excitement
desc: Nice looking hotel at a very convenient location. Most of the hotel facilities close at 10pm to 11pm. Heated pool was great but it closes at 10pm. Agoda stated that they had smoking rooms but there were actually none, very misleading!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fast Response & Excellent Service
desc: Must give 5 stars to their house keeping dept for their fast response & service. The staffs are very friendly and provide excellent service. Location is good. A bit walking distance to Plaza Singapore and Orchard Road. The foods are excellent especially the durian desserts.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fine Property at Fair Price
desc: After multiple past visit to Singapore, tried Rendezvous Hotel based on favorable TA review + pricing. After mentioning preference for "best view possible in price category" on booking, was disappointed in that aspect of my first room (an x39 room), but much more satisfied after front desk kindly assented to my request for a room move (to an x02 room) on my second day. Room fixtures & amenities were very comfortable and well maintained and location is convenient to both MTR and downtown/tourist areas.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service
desc: Some initial cleaning issues were promptly rectified and our stay was very pleasant in the end. The pool and gym were great, the location is fantastic, very central, many shops and eateries around, the MBS casino is not far, even within walking distance if desired.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Singapore
desc: We had an absolutely amazing stay in a club room at Rendezvous Singapore. The staff were so helpful and looked after us so well. We arrived early after an overnight flight and they were able to get us into our room early so we could get some sleep. The hotel was beautiful and our room had everything we could have wanted. The little bit extra we paid for the club room was more than worth it. The club lounge was fantastic and the staff incredible. The hotel was so close to train stations, shopping centres and places to eat. We loved Singapore and will visit again and will definitely stay at the Rendezvous for sure.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Okay Staycation
desc: Booked a room at Rendezvous while I'm on leave. Didn't spend much time in the room because brought my son and Mrs to Indoor Playground. Check in was quite smooth. This was pre-lockdown in Feb 2020 but there's already some safety measures taken. Room was outdated but somehow comfy. It's okay for the price that we paid. Location is the positive point, near to Plaza Singapura and The Cathay. And there's MRT nearby. Overall it's worth the money though.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: We enjoyed our stay at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore. It was in a great location close to restaurants and the subway station. We were able to get a late checkout at 6:00 pm which was necessary since we had a 9:00 pm flight. The breakfast was a great variety and very tasty. I would highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Decidedly Average
desc: There for three days. Frankly I was disappointed. Great location but in dire need of upgrading. Room OK but nothing to write home about. We were promised water in our room but there was none available for a drink after a long and tedious 17 hour day getting there. Reason given “we have gone green so do not provide water in plastic containers.” There was an empty mini bar to be used as a fridge and an empty glass water jug on the dressing table??? Only ate there for breakfast. There was ample choice but of average quality. The fried eggs were something to behold. Nothing was freshly cooked and the eggs were piled high under a lid. Some were cooked to death whilst others were half runny/half hard and most were in pieces where others had tried to extricate from the pile. The other

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay
desc: I was upgraded to a nice room on the 9th floor overlooking the city. A return visit for me. The team always extend their usual utmost care and warm hospitality. Shout-out to Ifa and the front desk team. Not forgetting the tip top Concierges Norazali and Gafar who never fail to attend to my every need and concern!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Ageing Hotel with great location
desc: The hotel is opposite Singapore Management U and very near the underground station. It's not the modern hotel with very limited space. That said, it's not a new hotel with obvious signs of ageing. Staff are generally helpful but some are careless. Hannah, the duty manager is exceptionally good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Warm, engaging and professional staff
desc: The rooms are very comfortable and smoothed by an arts theme. The staff are highly trained in all aspects of hospitality and the club room is a bonus for travellers of all kinds. Central location makes access to tourist venues and business district so easy. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding Staff & Service
desc: The original room booked had some issues with warping wallpaper hidden behind the curtains. However, the staff promptly changed the room for us. The newer room looked less aged and was well-appointed with beautiful artwork. The 3D2N weekend stay was non-eventful. The service staff, including the housekeeping, were prompt and exceeded expectations. It is probably time for the property to go through minor renovation and maintain its’ fixtures. Overall a 4-star hotel with 5-star service.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect location
desc: Great location on Bras Basah close to Orchard Road where the main shops are. Also close to the MRT which is a great underground service. Nice rooms not too big but comfortable. Great staff on the reception who gave us all the info we needed to get around Close to plenty of bars and restaurants down Prinsep Street so don’t forget to take a stroll down there

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Two Nights in Singapore
desc: We upgraded to the club room at the Rendezvous and it was well worth it ! The lounge Happy Hour with appies is complementary and very well done. The location is perfect and we couldn’t have been more pleased with the room itself. Not large but very elegant. Highly recommend the Rendezvous 👍

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Truly Excellent Hotel
desc: Having never stayed in Singapore before we left the choice of hotel to our travel agent. They got it right! The hotel is close to Orchard Road and near to Raffles so a great location. We arrived early in the morning having disembarked from a cruise ship. We had our bags stored and offered the opportunity to shower should we wish we declined the generous offer and buzzed off to see Singapore. When we returned the lovely chap on reception told us that we had been upgraded to a suite. Wow! Our room was truly fab. The hotel was brilliant and we would defo return.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great but curtains need a bit of fixing
desc: I have always stayed here and really enjoyed it. The hotel itself is nice, staff is friendly, the room is well equipped and the location was perfect for me. If you area light sleeper though, the curtains are not blackout curtains and sunlight can easily seep in. Aside from that, a great hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very comfortable bed, nice clean room.
desc: We only stayed for one night and did not use any facilities outside of the room so I can only comment on the in room facilities. We had a junior suite and it was very nice, clean and comfortable. TWG teas and a little coffee machine are also available in the room.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: ONE NIGHT STAYCATION
desc: Nice grand hotel Friendly reception staff Smooth check in Clean rooms Spacious Clean bathroom Near to MRT and shopping mall Breakfast was awesome International breakfast buffet Quiet peaceful room Wifi connection was great

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 5 night stay
desc: Great stay. All staff exceptionally helpful and courteous. Wonderful location. Very near lots of sights. Clean and quiet room. Breakfast fine. Concierge very helpful and Bellboys great. Nice pool on 1st floor.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One Night Stay
desc: I booked for a one night stopover going to Australia & again for one night on the return trip. A club room is good value (by Singapore standards) as you get breakfast & the cocktail session with drinks & buffet included in the evening, the option of a 16:00 hours check out was a great help for my night flight. Staff are all great & helpful. Oddly enough although I booked the same junior suite for both nights the second room was not as good as the first. Would use again for stopover.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: amazingly comfy
desc: friendly staff , i love the arts of joyful color from the lobby into the room . amazingly good to stay and relax , close to everything . a bar ! restaurant! mtr stations ! shopping malls ,,.,..,,,,,,,,,,

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great breakfast, stylish reception, slightly dated room
desc: The title says it all, we enjoyed breakfast with a great mix of local and continental food - that was worth paying for as we were also up early with jet lag. The reception is stylish and nice to be in, albeit small. There is a courtyard but it’s not inuse by the hotel so looks rundown.... which is a shame as we have a toddler who could have used a run around. The room was a good size, it was deluxe and fitted the baby bed well. However the carpet was old and could have been cleaned better, especially noticeable as I spent a lot of time in the room and on the floor with the kid. We upgraded on arrival for the late checkout/hop on bus/bigger room/breakfast package for $50 per night and can recommend that. The bus was good and air conditioned. The pool was great and the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Staff and Great Location
desc: We chose this hotel as a place to recover from jet lag a couple of nights before our cruise. We had been to Singapore before and this time didn't feel compelled to push to see the sites. Right from check in the staff was welcoming and informative. The room was quite comfortable and the location wonderful with Food Republic next door to grab a quick bite. The shower was exceptional, spacious and great water pressure. My husband used the pool and gym facilities. Both just adequate not bad but no wow-factor. We were able to walk to the Gardens by the Bay and also Little India from the property. The night before we were to sail, our cruise line cancelled the trip and so we needed to reserve one more night while flight arrangements were changed. We booked one more stay but as it

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointed
desc: Results in February / 20 at the hotel. The location is good! only that! the breakfast we didn't like. It has no variety. the value is very expensive for what they offer. Juices are not natural. About the room, much smaller than other hotel rooms of the same standard. about the Staff, we had a problem and they didn't help us! about the price, very high. we made a reservation well in advance, and paid more amount for two other rooms (of our family).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the great downtown hotels
desc: Great location and near to shopping mall, all the hotel staffs are friendly and excellent services. We felt comfortable to stay, cuz upgraded rooms clean. Especially, we r so thankful to the staff. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: We had an unexpected week in Singapore due to a cruise cancellation and we came across Rendezvous Hotel and stayed there. The location was excellent, walking distance to many areas and the bus stop is right out the front for slightly further away destinations. The rooms are spacious, beds are very comfortable. Lovely library, seating areas and nice pool. Staff is great, concierge is excellent. And the price is reasonable. All in all, highly recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank You !!!
desc: Pleasantly surprised, satisfied and very happy with our stay here since 24th March 2020 till 1st June 2020 ! Everyone from the front desk clerks, concierge to the housekeeping staff were friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and cozy. We were very happy with our accommodations. Location is definitely a huge plus, as we were able to walk to Orchard and Little India to get our meals. Thank you so much for assisting our stay especially during this Circuit Breaker period. Special Thanks to : Douglas, Ifa, Mano, Shafiq, Kiki, Everlyn, Afiq, Tiffany, Dayang, Andrew, Hannah, Paneer, Sofia, Rosly, Azali, Sam, and Masagos. Appreciate all your assistance. Thank you so much guys.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Feedback
desc: Excellent customer service I enjoy to stay in this hotel All staff are excellent but special mention to Masagos and Sofia. Thank you Rendezvous Hotel for making my stay special. Location is very good. Close to my work area

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel stay during non-exciting time
desc: I served to stay home order in the Rendezvous hotel. Being confined in a single room for 14 days can be depressing for anyone, but the hotel staffs were really amazing. They made every effort to keep me comfortable. They sent plenty of nice food and lots of fruit. They were very caring, tried to accommodate every single need of mine. Few names require special mention Manoharan, Gary, Kevin, and Sofia. Thanks guys for looking after me during this difficult time.Hope to see you again when we return to a peaceful time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice welcome...
desc: Nice welcome cause got alot good staff at this hotel... All very cheerful... I'm really like it... Keep it the good job... The room also nice n comfortable for us... The housekeeping also very hardworking...i still remember who the person... The is Sofia, Kathleen and shAfiq...This all are a the good staff at this hotel I meet...

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service
desc: Staff are all very friendly and hospitable and passionate. I stayed here for almost 2 weeks and i feel i it is my second home. Location is very good. Food in hotel is very good. Hotel cleanliness is equally good. i walk pass the club lounge everyday and all staff working at club is very friendly but i must say Sofia and Kosum always had the extra smile to brighten my day. Thank you

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay
desc: Service is very good. Stay here because of msia close. all staffs have been helpful and the room is clean. Especially thank u Daniel and Evelyn that greet me everday after i end work. Free coupon for motorbike everyday.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Mini Staycation
desc: I stayed here for one night in early March, before things really started to get bad on the virus front. Paid $150 SGD all in on Agoda, no breakfast, and got a nice quiet room on the 10th floor. Double bed was a little on the small side but was still quite comfortable. Rain shower but no bath. Drain was overflowing in the shower. Huge TV set in the room. Very good free wifi (no password required). Late checkout until 1:30pm allowed. Great location near Bencoolen, Bras Basah & Dhoby Ghaut MRTs. Small pool and gym on level 3. Worth considering for another mini staycation once they are allowed again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Thumbs up:)
desc: Stayed here for 2w and all the staffs were extremely kind and warm-hearted. Room condition, concierge service, checkin checkout service etc were perfectly good. It was grateful experience ever:) thank you everyone who helped, encouraged me during the stay!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel
desc: I think it's one of the best in terms of services and locations . Rooms are definitely bigger than some big names hotel. I have to shout out again to the excellent services by the staff especially One lady named Sofia. Good job and thank you for the wonderful hospitality.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: One of our best staycations we ever had. One of their staff members, Sofia, was extremely helpful and her service was top quality. She even went the extra mile of suprising my fiance with a birthday cake knowing that her birthday was around the corner. We really appreciate her thoughtfulness and her kind gesture. Will definitely return for our next staycation(:

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great artsy hotel with awesome club rooms
desc: We booked a Club Room but was pleasantly surprised when we got upgraded to a Heritage Suite! Check-in experience was a breeze thanks to Sofia for her wonderful service. The Club Lounge serves unlimited alcohol from 6pm - 8pm and they were very generous with the serving portions. Excellent service by the staff, with a special shout out to Lilian! The only downside for the stay is the pool area. Deck chairs were few and extremely uncomfortable. Otherwise, would have been a perfect staycation.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and lovely staff
desc: It was the first time to Singapore and some friends recommended this hotel. MRT and buses are right outside the hotel. The staff are lovely and helpful. We took advantage of the club room that we paid extra for. It was great. We will definately be back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value
desc: We stayed at the Rendezvous during the Corona virus outbreak so maybe the price was lower than usual. We found it to be very good value for money. We booked a club room after seeing TA reviews and we're glad that we did. There was an initial problem with our room booking but it was sorted out quite quickly by Lillian. The clubroom facilities were excellent with non alcoholic drinks available all day and alcohol, including cocktails in the evenings. Pretty good canapes in the evening too though you needed to get there early for the best selection. Laundry included in the club room price was very well done and quick. Like other reviews have said the whole hotel is a little bit tired but there are plans to refurb it shortly. Worst were the pool beds, there are only 4(or6?) But the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel in an excellent location
desc: The hotel is not new and you can tell that. It may be up for a renewal soon; however, the room has a decent size, same as the bathroom. The bed was FANTASTIC. The breakfast was good. The pool is not big, but it is very nice. The gym is good as well as the spa.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff and good facilities
desc: Overall experience was very good. The only issue is the air conditional in the room. My friend and i were sweating in the middle of the night even though we put the temperature to 16 degree. Other than that, i have a wonderful stay in this hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely Staff and cozy Hotel
desc: Probably our 3rd time in that hotel, fantastic location, super friendly staff, very helpful Sofia at the reception desk, small room but cosy and clean room, The only thing i would suggest is to add more chaise longue by the pool as only 6 chairs for the whole hotel, we will definetly be back in Singapore and will stay at the same hotel, thank you to all the staff for our wonderful stay

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable Stay
desc: I guess due to the concept of preserving the architecture of the building, the hotel takes a more classic look. The room looks pretty small but a good size with good enough room to walk around The air-con works really well, adjustable to your liking. TV channels were really good though i wish there was an option on the remote for channels that actually has dual language. I don't fancy programmes where the language is dubbed. Spacious shower cubicle. Hot water runs well. The minus points would be that i wish housekeeping also communicate with engineering department. A light bulb was not working since my first night and it was not rectified. The other point is that there seemed to be no good ventilation or vacuum in the bathroom. The odour or smell permeates into the bedroom.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good combination of price vs quality
desc: I was very satisfied with this hotel. It was nice combination of the price vs money. Excellent staff, always willing to help. Good breakfast, quiet room with nice comfort bad. Everything was very clean and tidy.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good place to stay
desc: The front desk kiki and dayang is super helpful and super sweet. The day here is marvelous.....the hotel is super high class . The bed ...super comfortable. There is three type of pillow for you to choose .so great

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: perfect
desc: perfect stay for city tripp ,very central the rooms are very clean and the staff very friendly and helpful. Check in before the specifield time was not a problem,everything was to other sadisfaction. Dank you

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing stay!
desc: Our stay was comfortable and we would especially like to thank Sonia Franklin and the Rendezvous Team, for always checking in with us and ensuring that we had everything we needed. Thank you Sonia! We would definitely recommend this place!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very Good location
desc: This hotels location is very good. And all the staff was very helpful and kind. All of them earn big thanks! Hotel it self is a bit shabby and needs renovation. The room (club room) was ok., beds were comfortable, but aircondition was oldfashioned and noisy. Pool area was quite small and there were only six sunbeds. The sunbeds were in bad condition and needed to be changed. Pool itself was nice. We had club lounge access and I can recommend that. Nice breakfast and small snacks in the afternoon. In the evening there was also some food and alcohol available, but we usually ate somewhere else in the evening. Because of good location and very nice service (thanks to staff) I think this hotel is quite good value for money.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rooms for Improvements
desc: Before I begin, This is not me wanting any form of entitlement. Just giving my honest review and my thoughts about my 1 night stay. This is the 5th time I've checked into the hotel and it is really upsetting to see that the hotel does not acknowledge or care if you return. Out of the previous 4 times, they only have 2 of my check-in records in their system. Probably due to their system migration. Understood. I made the reservation through Agoda and made some request through the app. And it is super annoying that the reply you get from the hotel lacks the human touch. Obvious copy and paste. Upon arrival, I walked towards the front desk and there were two front desk staff. Both looked at me and continued doing their work. Only when I said I was checking in, one of them smiled

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Gary soh，Daniel and evelyn good help and service
desc: We come from another hotel, facing problems, thanks for your both quick settles our problems, great helpful, polite, good service, good communication.I greatly appreciate for Gary soh, Daniel and evelyn.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly warm staff, delicious breakfasts, clean, comfortable room!
desc: One month in a Room with a View: If you had to be in a luxurious "home away from home," this couldn't be better. I felt like a queen for a month with my breakfasts delivered promptly at 8 a.m., my room cleaned and maintained daily, and a staff that did everything they could to make my month long "layover" a pleasant and workable environment. The night before I left they brought me chocolates and cookies with a card and gifts to say goodbye. I know we are in the time of the Coronavirus but this hotel took every precaution while making their guests their focus. Thank you everyone! I love you Singapore!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and good stay !
desc: I love the location, It's located only a min away from the 2 mrt stations so very convenient to get around anywhere and has a lot of eateries too. The room was clean and quite spacious. It's a great value. I want to thank all the staff for the friendly service !

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Immaculate service in an upscale environment
desc: Impressive service and quick response time by the team - Andrew, Dayang, Sofia and everyone on service at the Club Lounge from 1st to 4th April. Sorry I can't remember all of your names. From the hotel staff to cafe waiters, all are warm and friendly, making our stay extremely enjoyable. Absolutely love the Club Rendezvous benefits and highly recommend their luxurious Club rooms! We got access to food all day long, they were empathic as my child had a food allergy and tried to accommodate us as much as possible.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Kudos to the front desk officer Kevin for being friendly and providing excellent customer service. Location of the hotel is ideal being walking distance from Orchard. However, the room was not cleaned properly. There were stains on the tables and in the fridge's compartment. Especially during this Covid-19 pandemic, the hotel should step up their housekeeping standards.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing
desc: We arrived early at the Hotel and they offered if we wanted to upgrade to a Junior Suite so we can check in early (unfortunately the room that I've booked wasn't ready yet). It was a good decision as we had a nice view. Big shout out to Kathleen, she was awesome during our stay. We recieved some freebies too, bus tour, food vouchers, and tickets for the museum. Check in and check out was a breeze. We enjoyed the Club lounge too. The staff are really friendly during our stay. However, our mini bar wasn't replinshed for 3 days, We had to call twice and they came asap. Last day of our stay, I didn't even bother to call them about it. Over all, it was an awesome experience and we would love to come back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycay right before the lockdown
desc: I left a note in the room with my feedback. Hope this helps! I don’t mind coming back for another stay but if the gym/pool facilities don’t improve, I’m voting for a no. Looking forward to coming back again!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent customer oriented service
desc: Fabulous warm greeting at front desk and speedy check in. Laundry pickup fast and deliver next day. Great housekeeping and make sure cleanliness is top. Raya give biscuit for everyone to enjoy celebration.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Complimentary for the staffs during the stay
desc: I’ve been here all these lockdown and feel very welcomed by the staff at rendezvous bras Basah hotel. I’m very happy with all the services provided by all staff and especially by Mr.Sam Panneer. Good day.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service rendezvous hotel bras basah
desc: special thanks to rendezvous hotel staff for ur excellent service, kindness & helpfull, im very appreciate... tq Staff name:- AFIQ TIFFANY KIKI DAYANG CHEF AKMAL ROSLY GAFFAR Regards,- Yusuf (sbst staff)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service Staff from Rendezvous Hotel Brash Basah
desc: I would like to give a big special thanks to Afiq, Tiffany, Kiki, Dayang, Rosly, Gaffar & Chef Akmal for their excellent service to us..keep it up.. Thanks. Regards, Saiful Sarif. Sbs Transit Bus Captain

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent cleaning room and good service
desc: During my stay in this hotel everything was amazing and all the staff in here very friendly. I wanted to give 5 star service at hotel housekeeping, they always clean up my room and help me to find my own charger once I finish my mc. And I wanted to thanks to front office Shafiq and afiq that always make me happy to talk with them when I come back work or I'm going work. If anyone read my review don't worry about hotel service because in this hotel everything was good and the staff are friendly.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay and attentive staff
desc: staying at this hotel for more than 14 days has been a pleasant experience for me. The bed is comfortable. The food is delicious along with some tasty snacks in the cupboard. My favourite part is the spacious table that actually allows me to do some work. Also, my e-buddy Ms.Yan is a very friendly and considerate person whose presence adds more interest to the otherwise mundane SHN.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Memorable stay in Orchard Road Singapore
desc: Rendezvous Hotel location is good, close to Orchard Road, Shopping Centres, Restaurant, food shops and walk to MRT. Would like to thanks staff Miss Xiao Zhen for her clean friendly Housekeeping services. Thank you

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Here for SHN: Bland food, terrible wifi, no fresh air.
desc: Food: Terrible, bland, tasteless and no variety. Wifi: Keeps going down every 10 minutes, can't even get through a single meeting Fresh air: Windows are locked shut, so good luck getting any fresh air

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Above and beyond expectations!
desc: The hotel manager went above and beyond in delivering a great, personalized guest experience. The staff did their best in trying to accommodate my requests. Thanks for the amazing hospitality, Douglas!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN
desc: My son stay at the hotel was really an extraordinary experience whereby he was taken care very well.Has served the well deserved meal ..His experience was great and he felt at home and very comfortable..Awesome hotel to stay when you have a family under SHN.Thumbs up for great service provided.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel in Singapore
desc: During my 2 weeks stay in Rendezvous Hotel, I am truly amazed by the facilities and services provided by the staffs. The room is spacious and clean, equipped with strong wifi, good ventilation, tv channels, comfy beds etc. On top of that, the management organized fun challenges for us to relieve stress. Lastly, I would like to thank the management and staffs as they had made my quarantine days a good one!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 14 days quarantine
desc: Great service and good customer service Please keep up your good work. Looking forward to visit again for holiday and will recommend to my friends Dan families visiting singapore in the future. 👍🏻👍🏻

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exelent Hotel and Service
desc: Absolutely outstanding hotel perfectly located.Helpful,friendly staff exspecialy Shasi & Tharma who go above and beyond to make sure me have a comfortable stay.I will definitely come back with friends and i will high recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A hotel with its blend of architectural history and the new building.
desc: This hotel is situated in the Bras Basah. Bugis precinct which is the arts, heritage and design district in the heart of Singapore's civic centre. Hence its strategic location means that it is within walking distance of many landmarks in Singapore. The building consists of nine Art Deco shophouses fronting a new 11-storey building in this charming integrated development. During the conservation of the shophouses, its lively decorative features were retained and restored. In fact, with the latest new coat of painting, these decorative features were painted in different colours to enhance its beauty. A splayed corner entrance leads to an open courtyard serving as a focal point between the old and the new. There are interesting murals at the entrance walls to reflect the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Room facilities are good.
desc: All facilities in the room is good, simply simple and we get everything we need! it would be better if we are able to open the window. Not sure on the facilities outside the room as we were quarantine in the room only. Receptionist responded on every request! Amazing!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Feedback
desc: Overall everything went well. The food provided are delicious,the room is neat and tidy before moving in. The person in charge at the counter is polite. Personal delivery was well kept and sending to the room fast.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A pleasant & memorable stay :)
desc: Friendly hotel staffs and lovely room with well maintained facilities… Organised small but meaningful event on National Day to provide special local treats to kids although we are serving quarantine time here… Thank you very much for taking care of us.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: EXCELLENT SERVICE
desc: I stay in rendezvous hotel for my stay home notice.I have issue with my phone.Cannot to register my simcard.I tried so many time but cannot to register.I called reception for help.One of their staff manage to solve my issue after try many times.I think his name is Shasi.He helped me to register my card use his phone and also while we doing the registration through phone we had some good conversation.I feel really good after talk to him.Such a friendly and helpful person.Two days after that he send me roti canai for my breakfast.He said he went to shop to buy breakfast for himself and thought of buying for me.I ask him if i need to pay him and he said he buy it without any expectation and he said he went through same quarantine experience a year ago and he know how i feel eating

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean, Pleasant Staff with a Heart
desc: I've stayed in this hotel Nov 30 - Dec 10 and I have the best stay ever. Room is very clean, bed is too comfy. Staff are toooo friendly, helpful and generous. Special Shout out to Sir Daniel for assisting my foods and Sir Daniel for helping me with my luggage. I am so touched with their kindness and goodness. This hotel should be 5 star because of the staff and hotel's state of the art.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: BEST STAYCATION EVER - SERVICE, FOOD, AMBIENCE!
desc: Very friendly and helpful staff, meals provided are specially curated that throughout my 10 days, no repeats, very courteous and during Christmas, the concierge service is truly over & above the service to deliver the items to rooms more frequently. Very comfortable bed & pillows! Detailed in every aspect!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great thanks
desc: MDM Yoo here, thanks again to the duty team 0, calling daily to check on me. good service n kind, Hotel foods is good, wish all the miss, Mr, here all the best.😀 Although here for quarantine, I'll look forward to coming back again

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay at RHS
desc: Thank you for the surprises, care and concern given by the RHS team during my stay at the hotel. It was indeed a pleasant and comfortable stay to allow me to get rest. The staff is very attentive to our needs as well. Giving a thumbs up to the staff and team at RHS.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Super amazing stay!
desc: My stay at Rendezvous hotel is super amazing! I stayed for 6D6N and I enjoyed it so much that it felt like time passed by so quickly. Amenities were sufficient for my week's stay. Bed and pillows were super comfy, room is clean and spacious. The toilet seat has heating so I didn't have to worry about having to go in the middle of the night. Room has lots of storage and power sockets - i could charge all my devices at once! It's not noisy at all, I slept soundly even during the day. The free wifi is really fast! And tap water is safe to drink! The bathroom has ample hanging space for towels. The shower area has a ledge to place toiletries and even a clothesline which can be stowed away when not in use. Sink area also has space for toiletries and skincare products. Bathroom is

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My experience during covid quarantine days
desc: Staff are very accommodating.Foods are awesome and well packed. Room is spacious good for 2 persons. Love the toilet bowl coz its warm when i sit and no need to use bidet coz got auto bidet like in Japan. Internet quite slow.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay!
desc: Cleaniness is top. Service as well. Great care from staff was given throughout my stay. Comfy bed that made me want to laze around always. Overall i would say that i had a comfortable stay! The toilet is clean, the toilet seat has a bidet. There are plenty of drawers/ storage in the room that you can make use of especially if youre going to have a long stay. The lights in the room are cozy as well. I would rate Rendezvous hotel excellent.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Covid Isolation Facility
desc: Opted for isolation and was posted here. The room surpassed all my expectations - bright, very well-maintained, comfortable bed with thick duvet. Surprisingly good soundproofing. Air purifier that works. And I was glad that the toilet was spanking clean (better than some 5 star hotels in Singapore). They even provided a brand new toilet brush (wrapped) and Cif. Best of all was the daily call from Simie, the front desk officer. On my first day she called 3x just to make sure everything’s ok. Requests were promptly attended to and questions answered. I’m thankful for all the care and concern. Thank you Simie. I’d gladly recommend this hotel for its location, good rooms and great service.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: loved my stay
desc: went here for self isolation because of covid-19 and im satisfied with the service! receptionist is very friendly and always checks up on my well being. room is spacious and cozy with a beautiful view of the city!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay
desc: The bed was comfortable. Service staff were very helpful and accommodating. There was an instance when my toilet bowl choke up, the cleaning staff came up to unchoke my toilet bowl promptly and was very friendly as well. Would recommend staying in this hotel!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service!
desc: During my Covid stay, the service was a really good one. They did a good job by checking up on the guest, asking the guest if they do need anything. Rendezvous hotel really hire a good staff! What's more nice is that the staff or receptionist is very friendly! i really enjoy my stay here, even when i'm sick, i dont have to worry about anything as they'll always check in the morning and night.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Stayed for 3 nights and staffs are being helpful and lovely. Will call and check whether any amenities needed throughout the stay. Since I’m quarantine at room due to covid-positive, they will call and check on my body condition. Lovely and helpful staff!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Caring and Friendly Staff
desc: Friendly staff. I was diagnosed as Covid Positive, and was arrThey even call to check for any special request from myself. I am well taken care of by RHS throughout my stay on 18-21Jan2023. Thank again to Rendezous Hotel Singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay during my self-isolation of getting covid
desc: I went here for self isolation because of covid-19, all the staff are good, and receptionist is very friendly, always checks up on my well being. The bed is super comfortable and they have fully facilities also, so no need to worry to much, im very satisfied with the service! Thankyou Rendezvous and all the staff too!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay during self-isolation
desc: Had a pleasant and comfortable stay during my self-isolation as I tested positive for Covid-19. The team here is incredibly kind. I was especially touched by the daily calls checking in whether I am okay. Thank you for making my self-isolation experience pleasant.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Experience
desc: I had a really really pleasant stay here. From the moment i enter, it was super clean and spotless! especially the toilet as i am quite particular but they did a great job maintaining it. I stayed here because i was covid positive, but they really treat me with care and they even took the time to call and check up on me everyday which i truly appreciate. Especially Miss Marjorie & Kiki, they were accommodating, friendly & they made me feel warm even though i was sick. thank you for the care & concern this hotel has provided me for the past week. Truly appreciate it a lot. Also, food was amazing. so many varieties & it made me look forward to every meal! kinda sad leaving this place, would give this place 6 stars if there was an option 🫶🏻
