hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Covid Facility
desc: Great room with great receptionist. Had my Covid Stay here and everyone was so accommodating. Called me everyday to check up on me. Everyone made sure that I was comfortable and all my needs are being served. Receptionist Kiki was the one who called me for the first few days of my covid and she really acts like a mother figure, giving me the motivation to crawl out of my bed to pick up her call and making sure I ate my medicine. You guys are amazing and I hope you open to public so that I can meet all of you again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My Solo Staycation, 5 days and 4 Nights
desc: Very clean rooms, friendly services and prompt assistance rendered by hotel service staff. Conveniently located. 1 min walk to d downtown line MRT connecting me direct to the airport and town. Check in and check out is very smooth. I truly enjoyed my stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A very friendly hotel in an excellent location
desc: The experience was very enjoyable, the staff in particular were very friendly and considerate of our needs and provided invaluable advice and were very helpful. The highlight was a wonderful conversation with the hotel manager.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel for a stay
desc: Amazing staff, spacious and very clean room, wide breakfast selection, very good location (more than 20 buses stop right in front of the hotel, and 3 different MRT lines are within about 200 m). We can totally recommend it.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing staff, good location, clean
desc: Good stay made great with the amazing staff. Special thanks to Dean and team for the wonderful experience. Location was good, near to various malls and food/drink choices. Breakfast was nothing special, but it runs till 10 if I recall, so there wasn’t a need to wake up super early. Did not try the pool and gym but would love to next time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, very friendly staff
desc: This was the fourteenth hotel we stayed in on our month-long trip to Singapore and Australia and was very much amongst the pick of the bunch. Extremely friendly staff, immaculately clean, modern bathroom, large pool and great location, very close to Fort Canning Park and the National Museum. There are four RMT stations close by, one of which (Bencoolen) is just yards away and on the same line as Changi airport. The hotel had not long re-opened after being closed due to COVID and having been used for quarantine stays. We were made to feel special and offered a complimentary late checkout until 3pm as we had a late flight. The breakfast buffet was varied and extensive - juices, fresh and dried fruits, nuts, yogurt, cereals, cold cuts and salad, cooked breakfast (eggs, baked

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommend
desc: I had 2 nights stayed at this hotel when Iwas traveling asia.clean and spacious room size, bathroom are large. From hotel can to go to any where in Singapore, Extremely service from staff, friendly. Special parking are near hotel, very comfortable for transportation. Strong recommend

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Warm welcome in Singapore
desc: Came back to the Rendezvous for the first time since 2019. Stayed on the day of re-opening following Covid lockdown. Still has all the same advantages, and staff can't do enough for you. Short of top rating as no proper restaurant yet or alcohol licence and the jacuzzi was under maintenance, but hopefully that'll all be sorted very soon!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: We only stayed for one night. The personal working there was super friendly. The room was really nice and the bed huge. Thank you very much! We can only recommend this place! When we come back to Singapore next time, we will stay there again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant staycation lovely experience
desc: Delighted to be back at Rendezvous hotel as my last staycation here was over 3 years ago. Arrived and was warmly welcomed by hotel manager Douglas Fernandez and his front desk team. Fantastic check in experience. Service is very personalised and exceptional. Had a pleasant conversation with the hotel team at the reception. The hotel team shows a genuine interest and care for guests and the team is more than willing to extend a helping hand. Extended complimentary breakfast. Excellent house keeping, got a nice and clean room on a high floor away from the elevator exactly as I indicated in my pre stay preferences. Room was prepared ahead of time and well ready for check in and occupation. Any other requests or room service is just a phone call away and quickly attended to.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Returning to Rendesvous after pandemic
desc: I used to stay at the Rendezvous quite often before the Covid pandemic hit. Their staff always delivered top-notch service and always had a smile on their faces. They recently re-opened and I returned few days ago for a stay. Happy to see that the high level of service is still there. Special mentions go out to Kiki, Shalini and Dayang of the front desk.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy anniversary stay in one of the best hotel and services🥰
desc: Really a big Thank you to GM Mr. Douglas and team! I was here for my wedding anniversary and Mr Douglas really ensure I was enjoying. We were given a cool nice room, high floor and away from elevator. We were welcome without much hassles and the checking was fast and happy. This is my first time here and to be frank, location was superb and rooms were cozy, clean and neat. Have been having staycations in sg since the opening of sg, and this is one of the best stay! Thank you Mr Douglas for your commitment to the hotel, providing guest with all your heartfelt smiles and home sweet home attitude! 😍. Not leaving out the team who put in the extra efforts, I also say a big thank you! I really enjoyed my stay and love it!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation in Rendezvous Hotel
desc: I had a wonderful stay here. Mr Douglas has been most wonderful and sweet. The room was clean and tidy. We had a simple continental breakfast too. We haven't got enough time to try out the Gym and swimming pool. We will surely make a return in the future

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice experience and great value
desc: The Rendezvous Hotel was a great surprise. Found a good offer on the Far East Hospitality website for a 3 night stay. It was superb value for money. The room is very homely (while and dark wooden features) and also comfortable with a big armchair in the corner. The bathroom is very clean and an excellent size with a big walk-in shower. Only criticism is that the toilet isn't accessible if the door is open. Otherwise, the design is really lovely with the use of wood and white tiles. The lobby is inviting and the doorman was always helpful. The bar and restaurant are still closed but when they reopen - it will give the lobby more 'life'. That said, off the lobby is a courtyard with various restaurants (Steak / Korean) and also a 7/11 which was really handy for a late night

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: The friendliest staff I have ever encountered. We had a let flight and we used the pool and facilities lng after check out time. Good value. Centrally located, close to Little India, Kampong Glam, and Orchard Road

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very convenient hotel
desc: The hotel is 100 meters from al MRT station which is very convenient. Rooms are normal size and sufficient in space and comfort. Due to late departure in night we were offered to use the shower and towels from the pool area. Very client friendly and convenient. Top service.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A warm welcome
desc: Warmly welcome by hotel manager douglas & senior guest service executive andrew, whom were quick and efficient in fulfilling my needs for the stay. All of the staff were very friendly and extending that extra mile in helping guest with their needs. Douglas was very friendly and sincere in giving his fullest in helping me throughout my stay. He is indeed a role model to his fellow junior members and can lead by example. I am looking forward to my next stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, comfortable hotel
desc: Great location, 2 minutes to the MRT, nice room, comfortable bed, good bathroom. Pity no onsite restaurant or cafe but plenty within walking distance. Great staff, especially Dean at reception and our porter, both of whom were exceptionally helpful!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Very convenient to restaurants and getting around very clean Lovely comfortable bed and pillows Shower great Staff are exceptional.Very helpful and friendly. Excellent service. Shame bar not open, but would highly recommend Thankyou so much

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location but...
desc: Check in was smooth, with complimentary parking available. However we encountered three issues with the room 1. Air con was not cold, technician fixed it 2. Shower drainage was not working and the bathroom almost got flooded with water after both of us are done showering 3. Pillows and bed is uncomfortable

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel for this price
desc: Nice hotel for this price. Very good breakfast, good staff, also hotel has all amenities inside the room and slippers and bathrobe. Very calm hotel. Places at the centre of Singapore, near a Metro, its very comfortable. But, rather small beds, but comfortable.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Review
desc: Hotel had a terrible smell on every level. The air conditioning in the room was freezing and there is no controller or ability to control the Tempe tire in your room. Overall I would not recommend staying at this hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Sleep like a baby throughout your SG stays!
desc: The pillows and mattress are super comfy; also the cleanness is something superb to highlight. My family and I enjoy the stay very much! Thanks for the excellent hospitality and Rendezvous will surely be the choice for our next visit! Special thanks to Dean on the warmest checkout.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service, facilities and location
desc: From Check-in to Check-out, thank you for making our stay comfortable and memorable. Rendezvous Hotel on Bras Basar is one of the best hotels I’ve stayed in, in Singapore, for many reasons; 1) Service was awesome. From the welcoming smile of the doorman, to the fantastic service from the reception, the service experience was excellent. Special thank you to Viloshini for the excellent service right throughout the stay. Made my 5 year old daughter feel extra special and made us all feel welcome every single day she was on duty. You made our stay extra special. Thank you!. Thank you to Manoharan for your efforts to make our stay special. Much appreciated! Special mention of Prema who kept the rooms tidy and did it in a very pleasant way. 2. Little activities. The art class on

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location & friendliest staff
desc: Great location, ease to the airport and all of Singapore’s attractions. Large size comfortable rooms. The staff were welcoming and very friendly. Perfect for your Singapore stopover. Would recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: NICE
desc: It was very kind to get a free late check out. Good location but we expected a bar in the hotel. Due to 2 rendez-vous hôtels in Singapore, the taxi drivers were not aware of this and this is amazing. We recommande this hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cozy and comfortable stay
desc: Great location! Bencoolen station right outside the hotel, as well as the bus stop. Short, easy walk to Dhoby Ghaut Station. From the hotel, we even walked to Bugis Junction and Bugis Market; and on another day we walked to Plaza Singapura. A lot of Colleges around, so there's also plenty of restaurants nearby. Check in was quite a breeze, shout out to the very pleasant welcoming front desk staff especially to Mark. Big yet cozy and clean room- comfortable but quite high bed. Clean bathroom and I love how they have a bidet that's very common in Japan hotels- oh and the toilet seat's heated! Will definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice experience, clean room
desc: Hotel room is big and clean but a bit old. The door of the bath area cannot be closed properly. Nice and helpful staff. A bit long check in time with handwriting form. Good location, 1 mins walk from MRT.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent & Memorable Service!
desc: Dear Dean, Shalini & Team, Thank you for the wonderful experience at Rendezvous Hotel. It was a memorable experience which started with the front line staff, Shalini greeting us with a warm welcome. We were presently surprised by her thoughtfulness. We were given a room upgrade, as it was my husband’s birthday, which made it extra special. Shalini and Dean served us with a smile, whenever we approached her for assistance. Such impeccable service, left a lasting impression. Additionally the hotel room interior was elegant and comfortable. We definitely hope to revisit Rendezvous Hotel soon. Thank you.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful
desc: One of the best hotel that i’ve stayed so far , very well mannered,friendly, and helpful staff !! Will defitinely comeback again for staying here in the future and also the price was affordable also fair and the location is really strategic

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and conveniently located
desc: This is my second time staying at this hotel. The rooms were much better than my last stay. The bed were big, comfy and clean. There were complimentary carpark for hotel guests. However, the check-in front lobby staffs were pretty hostile and unfriendly. Apart from that, all were good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Smooth Check in and Check Out Process
desc: The place is a few kilometers from Marina Bay and the nearest MRT is right beside the Hotel. The location is not that busy like the Orchard. We had a smooth check in and check out. Staff are attentive to the guest needs. Will definitely recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great choice in Singapore
desc: Great choice in Singapore! Clean and stylish hotel for little money. Fantastic location, lovely and friendly staff especially Kiki, Dean and Kristina from reseption. We will stay here next time and recommend it for our friends

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, friendly staff and cozy room.
desc: Room was cozy and clean. Duty manager Melvine and other staffs at the reception are super friendly and professional. Concierge staffs always greet me and offered assistance. Housekeeping order taker and room attendant’s service was so efficient and friendly. They made my stay so comfortable and pleasant.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and very friendly staff
desc: Excellent location to visit all points of interest, either by taxi or metro... even within walking distance! Very friendly and attentive staff too. Perhaps the only drawback is that the room and bathroom felt a bit tight in size, but the bed was simply super premium! Other than that, great value compared to nearby hotels.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Long stay with family
desc: We booked 2 rooms for us & our 2 teens. The rooms were clean and well attended. Sleep quality was good (good mattresses and sheets changed regularly). The staff was very friendly and helpful. The photos of the building are a bit outdated and the outside would benefit from a repaint, especially the internal courtyard surrounding the pool.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, comfortable and very helpful staff
desc: We had a nice one-night stay in Singapore on a very comfortable room. The location is very good, central with metro and bus stops super close and the staff and concierge were really helpful and friendly.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nothing Fancy but comfortable stay
desc: Nothing Fancy but comfortable stay. Small details needs improvement We'll come back soon. Service Excellent Cleanliness Excellent Value Average Location Excellent Sleep Quality Excellent Rooms Average

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Averaged standard for not fair pricing
desc: The room standard is pretty average for that price. Breakfast is not proper for hotel standard . Room is dated and bathroom looked old. Tidy and clean is fine. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Strong smell upon entry to hotel lounge.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Service
desc: The team were so welcoming and provided excellent service throughout our visit. The room was comfortable with a large bathroom and shower and the beds were very comfortable. It is an older building that has been renovated.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location with excellent staff
desc: The staff, especially Dean, were extremely helpful. He he hotel is in the center of the art district and at a superb location for public transport. It is a short walk to the museums, malls, and great food, and only a couple of stops away on the blue line MRT to Chinatown and Lau Pa Sat hawker stations. Great value for money. We had a wonderful and enjoyable stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quality hotel value for money
desc: Good location, clean room, friendly staff, very convenient for shopping, really enjoy the stay. I will recommend the hotel to my friends and will come back again for my staycations in the future. All the best.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Feel like home and well treated
desc: The concierge personnel was so friendly, polite and helpful. We have an urgent request and they have tried their best to make it working for us. We are much appreciated and it’s feel like home. The service is superb. Very recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Strategically placed and great service
desc: We have been to Singapore many times but this was the first time at Rendezvous, and are overwhelmed by the experience. Dean gave us a great welcome. He took time to explain things for us. The rooms were quite spacious considering it’s Singapore. The bed was comfortable. Interior was beautiful and everything was in order. We didn’t have to call and ask for help for anything. They cleaned our room daily. It had all essentials like tissue box, kettle, iron, hair dryer etc. Service levels of everyone were so high. Special mentions to the security personnel who were very supportive and so prompt to get us taxis whenever we needed. The location is so great. It’s right next to Bencoolen MRT which takes you to blue line and has all tourist spots. Surprisingly you do not get any noises

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb customer service
desc: The entire experience was an amazing. Everyone at the hotel was incredibly nice and went out of their way to help me. There was a problem at the gym, but the manager immediately stepped in to help, providing me with a brand new yoga mat and a bottle of wine! I was so touched by his thoughtfulness and generosity. I received a thoughtful card later the following day. Everyone followed up to make sure my stay was excellent. I’m not used to this level of service and kindness, coming from Paris. I will definitely stay here again the next time in Singapore. Thank you!!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: good location and amazing staff!
desc: this hotel has a perfect location! it’s close to the MRT, nearby shopping centres and a large variety of food choices surrounding the hotel, what really made our trip so wonderful was the amazing staff! The staff member named Dean went out of his way to ensure that our stay was as comfortable as possible, he has an amazing attitude toward customers and is a very polite individual, he is an absolute gem at his job.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: There was no issue during our stay for a week in April 2023. It was a quiet place, very central and good connected, supportive staff and may places to eat around. For us a great place that we can recommend to anyone going to Singapore. Beds were perfect.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location, Staff, Value
desc: Pros: - Located just beside two MRT stations. - Has a 7-11 below, has multiple eateries just beside - Extremely professional and friendly staffs - For the price, value is high compared to other available accommodations around the city Cons - the hotel is a bit dated

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful experience!
desc: Wonderful hotel with amazing service! GG was delightful and so helpful! Beautiful rooms and great location- walking distance from everything we needed to get to. Would definitely recommend and stay again when we return!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect place to recover for a week in Singapore
desc: A very convenient stay for a week. We had a very quiet room and no noise from neighbours or traffic in the street. The secret is a room to the back side of the hotel. The location is very central with two MRT stations, close to Little India, Raffles hotel or Orchard Road. All in walking distance. For people that like their own breakfast there are many options around.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: Overall our stay at Rendezvous hotel was excellent. The room was clean. The AC worked perfectly. Staff at front desk are tentative and care of guests. Room service was so polite and honest. I will stay here again when coming to Singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
desc: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality, location is in the center of down time, three metro stations are very near to the Rendezvous Hotel. Keep in mind that the hotel does not provide bottle water at the room

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice!
desc: The place is nice and cozy. It is accessible to any amenities. Staff were nice and friendly. The hotel must have at least a coffee or tea and a microwave oven but if u want pack foods 7-eleven is at the lower level. I will definitely book again in this place. Thank you🙂

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: Room was comfortable and spacious, bed was very cosy. Some public areas ie lounge & breakfast area yet to finalise upgrade/renovation, after that it will be great. Staff were very attentive. Would happily stay there again on next visit.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Bedroom infested with bugs
desc: I was severely bitten on the first night in my room, i have more than 20 bites on my arms and face that become infected. I asked reception to fumigate my room which they did and after that i did not receive one more bite. However I am now dealing with a mass of infected bites and scarred. The hotel bar which was advertised was also closed the whole of my stay, meaning i could not sit and get a drink during the day

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stay in Singapore
desc: Stayed here with my wife and two teenage sons. The property is extremely well located in the heart of the city and literally atop Bencoolen MRT station with main shopping area and numerous restaurants nearby. Staff members were very helpful. Overall a very nice experience.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best stays I’ve had as a traveller for years
desc: This is one of the best, most memorable experiences I’ve had in all my traveller years. The amenities were great, the room was spacious and cleaned daily, hotel service was quick to respond to any concern, and their breakfast at their Club Lounge was excellent. We were unable to try the cocktail at night since we always arrive late at night (hoping to be try this next time!) We’ll definitely go back to this hotel whenever we decide to visit Singapore again. The overall ambiance in this hotel was luxurious. Giving our special thanks to Dean, Elijah, Mark, and Maybelle for making our stay in Singapore a lot easier, more comfortable and convenient. They have made our Singapore trip special for us!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My business visit to Singapore
desc: I found my visit to be comfortable and without any concerns. The Staff were all very helpful and the Hotel was in a good area, close to shops, plenty of places to eat, also not too far from marina Bay. i would certainly stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and service.
desc: Excellent room, great staff, perfect location at a reasonable price. It can be a challenge to get it all right but the team here are going an excellent job. Recommend this property for anyone visiting SGP needing a well priced room with good service and central location. Thanks to the team, GG, Dean and Sarmila!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommend
desc: Staff were extremely friendly and attentive. Dean was particularly helpful. Rooms were spacious, cool and quiet. Easy access to MRT - right out the front door which was great to use. Hotel positioned well for sight seeing.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Noce hotel
desc: Really nice hotel. The staff of the front desk was so kind. We did get super early check-in. And the hotel is located next to the metro station. The transportation wsa really really comfortable Thank you

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best guest service in Singapore
desc: Excellent service from guest service manager. Nice rooms. Very clean, nice views. Perfect location on Metro station and few minutes away from Marina Bay. Many shops around. If you looking for place for relaxing and enjoying shooting Rendezvous is the best choice.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and Satisfied Staycation
desc: Pleasant welcome by staff. Comprehensive facilities with gym and swimming pool. Centrally located in the city which iseasily accessible to public transport, a nearby train station, shopping malls and F & B outlets. Surrounded by few museums; arts and history. There's always things that one could do inside and outside the hotel. Good News that the club lounge would be opened and operational in days ahead. Indeed, a comfortable and satisfied staycation. Specially mention and applaud for following staff for their good services being friendly, helpful and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organization. Hotel Manager Douglas Front Office Manager Mano Assistant Front Office Manager Majorie Front Desk Staff Andrew, Melvin, Christina, Elijah and Gaffar

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Hotel
desc: All staff are very kind and helpfulness. Breakfast are really great. Room are very clean and have automatic bidet also warm. Location very strategic area (MRT Station Bencoleen and Bus Stop) and also shopping area (Bugis Street and Junction).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Polite Service
desc: Excellent clean hotel with friendly staff and good food. Enjoyed the gym, pool and outdoors of the hotel. It is very accessible to all types of transport just next door and a beautiful scenery. Thank you to the front reception staff, Maybellen and Cristina who checked us in and our room ready immediately. Thank you!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Seeing the sights
desc: The pillows and beds were very comfortable. The pool didn’t get the sun until around midday so it was wonderful swimming in the shade. Great location next to good bus and Mrt lines. Close to the sights and places to eat. We did find some local food in the food court at Singapore Plaza.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: This is what I call 7-star hotel hospitality experience:)
desc: We experience a first class hospitality whereas Dean, the front desk in charge, on May the 5th, when we checked in the afternoon (14:30 SGT); professionallly handled the dispute made by travel agency where we made our rsvp & upgraded our room to the club member, where we got to experience the club perks, such as complimentary minibar, bfast, aaaand free wine! Yes you read that right :) Thank you Dean & Far East team at Rendezvous Bras Brasah. You guys made our staycation experience unforgettable. ~Su

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Over all pleasant stay
desc: Pros :Hotel in good location, very friendly staff and spotlessly clean room. Cons : lacklustre breakfast with no gluten free options and no restaurant or bar. If the hotel fixes the cons it would be an excellent stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very comfortable,clean and convenient
desc: We have stayed at the Rendezvous Hotel a number of times and it has been consistently clean, with a very comfortable bed and luxe bathroom. Bencoolen stop is right outside the hotel, so it is easy to take the train from the airport. Just a couple of blocks from the great shopping in Bugis Junction or Raffles Centre.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Strategic Location with a great experience
desc: The hotel is in a great location almost near where you would want to visit in singapore. The hotel is right next to 3 bus stops and 1 train station without getting wet by rain since it has a shade. The hotel is great with great amenities and the room is the perfect size for a couple that just wants to get around the city and explore. The breakfast could be improved but maybe you ought to go out and find more breakfast worthy places.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic hotel at good location
desc: The location is very good. Facilities are good. The best part is courteous staff. I refer Mr Paneer who was a great help in and out of the hotel. You can reach to various tourist location that are not too far from this hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great
desc: Gigi, dayang, yuvaa are very helpful. Very nice hotel, great location, the price is very good, which is refreshing because hotels in Singapore can be expensive. There are lot of restaurants near and orchard road is just a short walk away

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location in Singapore
desc: If you are looking for a convenient location, then Rendezvous Hotel is the best location. Great price for room, but very few amenities in hotel, besides the swimming pool. Not sure I would stay there again. But the service was impeccable!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: All around very nice and staff were great
desc: Good location, great staff and can highly recommend. Good central location, next to the subway and lots of restaurants. Fort Canning is around the corner if you fancy a leg stretch and downtown is a few stops away.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended!
desc: The location of the hotel is great accessible both to metro, bus line and a good walk to famous landmarks around the area. Room is clean and well maintained, comfortable bed, always a good rest after a long day. But the thing that makes this hotel such a good place to stay is their staff, exceptional customer service. Dean who assisted us throughout the hotel stay is incredibly helpful and generous with their time and recommendation around the area. Will definitely stay again! Thank you for the wonderful experience.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not too bad - Rendezvous Hotel.
desc: Room spacious, bed firm and comfy. Pillows a lil flat. Special birthday deco done up with complimentary cake slice which is a very nice gesture. Gym facilities are okay. Wanted to go jagucci but it is not in operation (maintenance mode but can't see any work done). Swimming pool oversee building walls worn out with algae/mould... not a pleasing sight though... staff at reception very friendly and accommodative. Location of hotel is perfect, within walking distance to Dhoby Ghaut and City Hall. Would be great if u can bring back the hotel lunch/dinner buffet... missed it the most! Disappointed that it is no longer available.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Easy transit to the best parts of Singapore
desc: Location is key for this hotel. With access to 3 MRT lines and heaps of buses you really can’t go wrong. Cleanliness could do with a bit of work, and it’s an older looking hotel, but it was still a pleasant stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A good base for a Singapore Holiday
desc: Great location, well-maintained rooms and bathrooms and some exceptionally polite staff. The hotel experience goes up a notch because the staff are super nice - at the reception, at the restaurant and the housekeeping staff. Indian travellers may not find any food items tailored to their needs, but we were quite comfortable with the breakfast options. We were a family of five, took 2 rooms here for 7 days and left pretty satisfied with the experience.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: thank you.
desc: Thank you for the wonderful stay in this excellent hotel. I totally recommend the hotel for the visitors of Singapore. Totally appreciate the help from the reception officer for extending our stay in the hotel for extra 3 free hours.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Location and Great Hospitality
desc: We arrived early in the morning from a long flight expecting to leave our bags and survive the day and were pleasantly surprised. Dean very kindly found a room for us straight away and Rosly took us and our luggage to it, explaining everything to know. Great hospitality and much appreciated. The hotel is right next to Bencoolen Station on the Downtown line so it is easy to get to and from the airport and to local attractions. A great stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Super good.
desc: Staff was superb !!! Shalini and Andrew including the other receptionist and Bell boys (sorry i don't recollect all names). All were courteous. Only suggestion is to start a kitchen. It's always good to have a kitchen at hotel(they were yet to restart post COVID). Plus since i paid a hefty price for the room, I think complementary breakfast would have enhanced experience. Some entertainment for kids would be appreciated. assisted with early check in and laste check out considering health issues. Full marks.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best-in-class hospitality.
desc: Whether you are staying at the Orchard Rendezvous Hotel or the Rendezvous Hotel along Bras Basah, you are in for a treat. Timeless and vintage hotel vibe but nicely renovated and embraces modernity. The Far East Hospitality management should be very proud of their front office and housekeeping teams at both Rendezvous Hotels. Mr. Douglas Fernandez, the Hotel Manager was especially helpful in acceding to my requests pre-arrival. A special thank you to the Gentleman for his kind assistance.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Vacation
desc: The hotel is very nice. I can't hear the neighbors in the room. Nice bed and pillows. Very kind and polite staff. There are grocery stores nearby. The hotel has a pleasant atmosphere. We will definitely come back again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience😊
desc: The place is so nice very accessible for everything you need ..The room was great and clean,and also the receptionist and the staff are very accomodating they were so very nice and approachable.. highly recomended this place👍

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Old hotel with small room but bed is comfortable
desc: Stayed here for 3 days as the hotel is centrally located. Check in was smooth. The hotel reflects what you pay for. There are no bottle water provided in the room as the tap water is safe to drink in Singapore. This so an old hotel the carpets and furniture in the room reflects it. Room is small but the bed is comfortable and most importantly the room is clean. It is a no frills hotel so it is better to grab breakfast across the hotel in the food court. Overall this is a average hotel but it is value for money at over $250 Singapore a night without breakfast. Location is good. If your budget is around the Singapore $200 plus a night this will do. They do provide house keeping which is indeed a plus.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient location in Singapore
desc: This hotel was recommended by friends who had stayed previously. It is well located within 100m of two MRT stations on different lines, near the downtown end of the Orchard Road shopping strip. The Singapore National Museum is one block away. The room and bathroom were clean and comfortable, but the hot water service was inadequate. Staff were at all times friendly, helpful, courteous and quick to respond to our needs. Average value for money.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Loved the Rendezvous Hotel!
desc: This was the second time we have stayed at the Rendezvous, and have been very happy with this hotel on both occasions. The hotel is in an excellent location, with access to the metro on the next corner, a bus stop just outside, and only a short walk from Orchard Road. Staff were all exceptional and very helpful. We were upgraded to Club Rendezvous and our room and the meals and drinks offered as part of this program were also excellent. We were looked after by Maybelle and Mark and our thanks to them for making our experience at the Rendezvous so enjoyable. We had plenty of space in our room - bed was large and very comfortable, plenty of pillows to choose from, loved the spacious shower with good water pressure, and it was great to be able to have controls that actually

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Value!
desc: Great hotel in a perfect location near 3 MRT stations and bus stop right outside the hotel which made it so easy to get around! Room and bathroom were really good and the beds were very comfortable. Staff were always warm and friendly, pleasant to deal with. Overall, Rendezvous Hotel presents good value for the price you pay, coupled with the location making it super easy to travel anywhere in Singapore very easily. I would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly team
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 12 nights. Me and my husband and our 5 year old daughter enjoyed to be there. Location of the hotel is very good it is walk distance to Merlion and several other tourist attractions. Subway and bus stop is just outside the door. The room is big, clean and comfortable. Their cleaning staff made our room very tidy and homy everyday. Everybody are nice, friendly and helpful. Their hospitality let us feel the trip is more enjoyable. We definitely recommend the hotel to others. We will stay with them again next time when we visit Singapore. I want to thank to them again for their hospitality and help. And thank you for the birthday gifts and cakes for our daughter.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, accomodating staff.
desc: Location is amazing. Bencoleen station is right otuside of the hotel. It is near the singapore museum too. Hotel staff are nice and very accomodating. Room is big, and u can request connecting rooms too. Bed is really comfy. TV is big and clear. What is misisng i guess is a bidet; other Far East Hospolitality Hotels that do have one.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the comfort hotel in town😘
desc: Everything is very good, location, staff, big n clean room. Nice to stay with children. Many good n delicious food nearby. Much comfort I get along staying here for 2 days. Thank you Rendezvous Hotel...

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Air condition
desc: air conditioner is quite cold and is not able to turn the temperature up. The lights are fine but i would prefer abit more. The room keeps the noise from outside quite good but there are still some noises coming from the corridor. Everything else was fine and the rooms are clean.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A remarkable stay at Rendezvous Hotel
desc: Exceptional stay! Impeccable service and luxurious accommodations. The staff , Nurul Syakina, Hariani, Douglas and Shalini went above and beyond to ensure a memorable experience. Highly recommend this hotel for a truly remarkable stay especially since its located where you’re spoilt for choice.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location especially with kids
desc: Bus stops, mrts near hotel. Food choices also available walking distance. Great especially travelling budget with kids. Strategic location for me to meet up with friends at night too. The hotel offers luggage storage if you check in early. I checked out and stored my luggage before going Orchard for a short trip. One of the Receptionist abit blur but overall acceptable

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service.
desc: We booked via online and didn't expect to get early check in. Staff was very helpful in finding a room for us. Room is big and well maintenance. Location is connected with MRT but a bit far from other connection. Staff were very supportive and think over to fulfil the guests. We called operator to inform to clean the room, our phone line was not clear so Operator called Engineer to come at the same time to replace our phone without asking. That's beyond expectation and impressive!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Generally spacious room, the bed and pillows are excellent! It helped me sleep much better! Location is wonderful, convenience store is right downstairs and the hotel is right in town. Check in and checkout were smooth and fast, and the staff on duty were kind and polite too! We didn’t wander around the property or go anywhere really (the staycay was for “rest and do nothing” purposes), so there’s not anything that needs improvement. Thank you for a wonderful and restful stay, Hotel Rendezvous :)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: EXCELLENT LOCATION
desc: Very impressed with the hotel Located very close to 3 MRT stations and Raffles a short walk away and Orchard Road shops in the other direction The hotel itself is very clean and comfortable and the staff are so friendly .The air conditioning is amazing in the room and throughout the hotel which is a welcome break from the heat and humidity outside We loved Singapore and loved the hotel .No hesitation in coming back if the opportunity arises

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendevous Bras Basah - excellent location, smiling team!
desc: Rendevous have a lot to offer, Coming out from covid, many improvements needed to achieve the standards they aim to set. Housecleaning staff obliging though some need more training. Breakfast buffets below my expectations, but on speaking to management, many improvements planned in the coming weeks for their menu. The Club Lounge is lovely - staff happy to chat and efficient. I suspect when dining options are increased, it will become popular and their room may need extending. They are also open from 6-8pm for drinks and tasty bites often as good as dinner!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location & service. Clean room and bathroom. Good value
desc: Good service and excellent location. We especially like the short walk away to Fort Canning Park. Room and bathroom is very very clean. Amenities and in room facilities all good. Overall very good value for our family trip of 3.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel and close to everything
desc: Reception staff were very welcoming and helpful. Room was clean and adequate facilities. It was my son’s 17th birthday and staff had a surprise birthday card, small gift & cake in the room on our return from the days outing. Breakfast was different every morning, the 3 mornings we were there and great variety. The only thing that could be changed/improved is for food and coffee to be hotter as by the time we got back to our table, it was already cold. Hotel is very close to public transport and shopping. Other than that, we enjoyed our stay

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay
desc: We stayed for 6 nights and extremely enjoyed our stay! We were welcomed warmly and treated exceptionally by the staff throughout our stay, special mention to Dean who patiently gave us tips on where to eat in the city and was over-all so helpful and kind & the rest of the staff for being so helpful. Room wise - very comfortable beds, spacious considering we were in Singapore, and very clean! It was a joy to come back and relax in a comfortable room after long days of sightseeing! We also enjoyed the breakfast buffet that had diverse options including local specialties which were delicious. The hotel also had wonderful activities for guests to partake in - we got to partipate in making our own DIY tote bags which was very enjoyable. Location wise - this was the cherry on top!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
desc: A great stay, location was excellent, service was excellent, staff were incredibly helpful, facilities were excellent, Fabulous amenities, the pool was clean and cool. We would recommend this hotel based on our stay here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: This hotel is in the perfect location for getting around the city. Most of the site are within walk-in distance. The metro/ subway is just outside the hotel so it made easy for transferring to and from the airport as well as getting around the city. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. This was our second time staying at this hotel and would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Tourist friendly
desc: The staff were very accommodating. My family enjoyed our stay. The location is just beside bencoolen mrt station, bus stop is just in front of the hotel.. thanks so much to the manager and asst manager for replying to my emails..🥰

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Hotel Treasure
desc: We recently stayed at Rendezvous Bras Basah location. We primarily chose this hotel for its great location and great deal on the Club rooms. However this Rendezvous hotel exceeded all our expectations. We arrived late after two long flights from Europe and were greeted by the friendly and welcoming Reception staff , then wonderful door man Gaffer who kindly escorted us to our room with a beaming smile. It didn’t end there, the Senior Guest Service Executive Dean Molina who was there to fulfill our every wish was a super star. I had requested gluten free bread and lactose free milk, all waiting for me. We asked for adjustments to our room air conditioning , all done immediately, no fuss at all. The Club breakfast was very well done and the evening drinks also generous with

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The most comfortable base for Singapore.
desc: We arrived very jet lagged and without luggage and the management team immediately took care of us. Our room was upgraded to a very spacious room with a view and we were then able to access breakfast and pre dinner drinks and canapés. All the staff that we encountered were very caring and always helpful. We also appreciated local information on attractions. The proximity to all the cheap transport was a huge advantage for site seeing. This is a fantastic base from which to explore the whole island. We were so busy that we didn’t get to use the large pool and gym. There is good food right outside the entrance. This hotel was such a pleasure to stay in

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel with excellent service
desc: Very clean room with excellent amenities. Service desk was very helpful and responded immediately to requests. Checkin checkout was fast, no hassle. Hotel well situated with restaurants and 7 eleven on ground floor.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Singapore experience
desc: We stayed at the Rendezvous Hotel Singapore and was most impressed with the quality of the accommodation and the staff who provided outstanding service. The next time we are in Singapore this is the hotel we will stay at. It is well located - 2 minutes away from both the Met and the bus stop.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A welcome refuge
desc: This hotel was a real treat. The staff were very welcoming and generous in their support. A room upgrade and all that this entails was unexpected and so welcome. Tourist advice was excellent . The location by buses and trains was perfect. We can’t praise this hotel enough. Nothing was ever a problem for them.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location, but under renovation
desc: The hotel itself was in a really good and central location of Singapore in close proximity to many attractions and also was very handy in being directly above the underground train system. The staff were very attentive and made us feel very welcome and were happy to help with any issues we had including printing visas for our travels to other countries. Unfortunately the hotel at the time of our visit was under renovations. The dining area was out of order meaning we ate in their conference room, the jacuzzi area was out of action too and the pool had certainly seen better days. Overall though we had a very positive experience and hopefully the renovations and refurbishments will be completed for those staying there in future.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel in a Central Location & right next to a MRT Station
desc: I stayed in this hotel for 6 days with my family from June 1st to June7th. Right from the Check in till I Checked Out, I didn’t have any issues. During my entire stay, I could interact with many staffs & all of them did their best pleasingly to help me. During Check in “Christina” was the lady in the reception. Including myself we were five people ( 2 Adults & 3 Children ). We asked for a connecting room. Immediately she made arrangements & provided us. After getting into that room I said, we would prefer a different room as there were no shelves & we were with luggages. Once again, without hesitation she arranged a better room. She was an inspiration for me. Thank You “Christina”. Since the flight was late in the evening on our Checkout date we requested for a late checkout.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Great destination, Big bus tour right out the front of the Hotel, train station and bus station as well. Very friendly staff with a great breakfast. Staff organize Taxis for you with a waiting period of only a few minutes. Very impressive Hotel. Would recommend to anyone.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel needing to be renovated
desc: Hotel well located with excellent service due to a super kind and really nice personnel. Rooms and breakfast hall need to be renovated. Breakfast should be improved in both quality and variety. Swimming pool not well located

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Vacation in Rendezvous Singapore
desc: Excellent hotel, conveniently located, very hospitable. Staff are excellent. Rooms are very good. Restaurant and front office managers were so kind. Room was very comfortable for 3 of us to stay. Hotel location close to MRT stations is a huge bonus. Definetely recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Twas a pleasurable stay in Rendezvous Hotel Singapore
desc: I enjoyed y short stay at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore. Location is very accessible with MRT and bus stations just a few steps away. The staff are very hospitable, courteous, and professional. Check-in and check-out process was a breeze. Rooms are neat and clean.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel with great location near MRT and food place.
desc: This hotel is very near to MRT station. A lot of shops nearby. 7E just besides the main lobby. Starbucks and Subway just 2mins walk. The staffs were all very friendly and helpful. Especially mr dean from the front desk was very polite. even offered coffee and tea to us while waiting for our checkout. the room is ready when we arrived 1 hour early. they provided welcome drinks so its very nice on hot weather. the iron provided was one of the best iron i have used, my cloths are all very nice for holiday. they also provided luggage storage if you want to leave before check in or after check out. i give 9/10 for this hotel and recommend to everyone going to singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent value
desc: I really enjoyed my stay at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore. I enjoyed particularly the staff - very friendly, very helpful and very efficient. The location was very convenient for my needs, right next door to a MRT.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Loved staying here
desc: Had amazing and peaceful stay. The staff was extremely understanding and friendly. They let us check in early as soon as the room was ready. The location is perfect too especially for the people travelling through mrts.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A gem in the heart of the city
desc: We had dinner in the hotel pre-CoVid and liked the lobby. We stayed here for the proximity to the churches and other places we wanted go. Very convenient for public transportation including buses to the airport. Room is just right for our needs. Love the marble flooring in the shower.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business functiin
desc: I liked the hospitality from the team when we booked Symphony Room at Rendezvous Hotel for our training. The food from Grains was well received by participants. The AV system may need some improvement but overall Mohamed was very attentive to our needs.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Great location! Lots of eateries around the hotel and Mrt station is just right beside. Big shout-out to Mr Richard Dean Molina for allowing us late check out and free breakfast, appreciate! Exterior paint is quite bad.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Dated but clean
desc: This property is dated, but everything in the room and bathroom was very clean. We were offered complimentary late checkout until 1500, when the desk clerk found out our flight wasn't until 0200 the following day. We still waited a number of hours in the lobby, and I was freezing. The location of the hotel was nice, essentially right at the Bencoolen MRT station.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb service and location. Top class hotel for reasonable prices in the city centre.
desc: Absolutely top rate hotel, great service and facilities. Room clean and neat and we got an extra bed in to. Location superb within walking or bus distance of most of the must see places. Local food great and no problems storing bags for late departure.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: RELAXED AND ENJOYABLE
desc: Easy and relaxed very helpful staff , could leave the car in safe location , easy access to both airports , options to go and eat in very comfortable locations , not noisy at all , enjoyed , and will go back again .

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel and staff
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights for the D-Day concert. My friend and I had a wonderful experience. We were greeted by Dean in the frontdesk and took us less than 3 minutes to checkin. Really love the art deco at the lobby. Mark and Mayvelle welcomed us in the Club Room, shoutout to both of you for providing great service. Joined happy hour from 6-8pm and enjoyed the amazing selection of drinks and food. Will definitely stay here again on our next Singapore trip!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel
desc: Rendezvous hotel was very comfortable and extremely accommodating. It had everything we needed for a great stay in Singapore, the bed was amazing, great sized room and lovely staff. Would definitely recommend and stay again when I’m back in Singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic stay & friendly staff
desc: The executive room on the 11th floor was very good, clean & spacious. The special dining area on this floor was managed superbly by Marjorie & her team, who attended to our needs in a professional manner, ensuring our stay was made very comfortable . The evening cocktails were excellent as an aperitif prior to settling for the night. The free laundry facility was an added bonus that provided fresh, clean clothes to be used. The train station is literally steps away from the door of the hotel, which made getting around the city very easy. Overall, it was a pleasant stay, my wife & I enjoyed every minute of it.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay for business
desc: Very pleasant stay for business purpose. Room is clean, and staff are friendly, gentle & helpful. Special thanks to several senior staff - particularly Gary, Hannah, Andrew & Rosly for their professional service & efficient arrangements. Club lounge & related services are good. Glad to have such pleasant experience again (since my last visit before the pandemic), and I'm happy to recommend the hotel to others . Thanks.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very pleasant
desc: We were pleasantly surprised after a long flight and early morning arrival we received early check-in allowing us to rest and cleanup before we took on the day. Only suggestion is to have better lighting in the rooms and to have warm water in the swimming pool area change rooms

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Tiny lounge and no restaurant
desc: Loads to like about this hotel. BUT there are some shortcomings: i. No restaurant ii. Very little communal space (e.g. it needs a much bigger lounge) Everything else was good. The location is great (and there is a 24/7 shop open in the forecourt). The staff were really friendly. But these are two major omissions. It is so strange to have a gym and a pool but no restaurant and lounge.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel Needs a Renovation
desc: The hotel was disappointing. I would say overpriced for the room quality. I've stayed in better three star hotels. Room fittings are worn and aircon smells of mould. This hotel reminds me of a hotel from the 80s which hasn't been upgraded since.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, average room, basic hotel.
desc: We booked the hotel for the somewhat central location, and close to an MRT, and for that reason not inexpensive. The rooms were fairly small (even the club floor) beds are comfortable but small, and bathroom facilities not in the best shape (doors not closing, thermostat not working, shower holders loose. For sleeping, the main reason for the hotel, it was good. Breakfast however - that was far below any standard seen, more comparable by a road side communal hall, with shared tables (not clean) limited food choices (no rice in an Asian hotel?, no cold cuts?) That what was served was not of greatest quality. Also not frequently refilled. Use of a lot of single use items.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient hotel for a short stay
desc: The hotel rooms feel a bit aged, but overall the quality of the hotel is good, and the rooms are very comfortable in general. We stayed just for 2 nights for a stopover, and the location of the hotel is very convenient, being essentially right next to the Bencoolen MRT station, on the Downtown line, which means you can easily reach most short-stay attractions (like Marina Bay, Chinatown, Little India, Kampong Glam, and the airport of course) easily with just a few metro stops. The breakfast was the worst part unfortunately, with some cold food (e.g scrambled eggs, bacon and baked beans) served in a conference-style room (which didn’t feel like a proper restaurant).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good staying
desc: The Room clean and people are warm welcoming, only part it is about breakfast and lunch might not match with Indochina country people. but he location is in the center of the city and a lot of MRT station are around and easy to walk to.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent location but hotel room needs some upkeeping
desc: Attended to promptly during check-in and check-out. Friendly concierge. Decent quality of sleep but room assigned to me was not in the best of shape (bathroom water stains on ceiling/wall, slight odor).. Retail outlets next door somewhat lacking (there are decent options within walking distance though)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you for an excellent service!
desc: The hotel is clean and well maintained. Staff are helpful and accommodating especially Christina and Dean who went oit of their way to assist us. We have arroved Singapore n an early morning flight, we were accommodated for an early check-in with complimentary room upgrade!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: We Do Not Recommend
desc: Started at checkin when we were told that the king bed would not be available even though we booked months in advance. After refusing to accept this, they found a room.......Why not find a room in the first place...The hall ways and the lift smelled very bad. We will not stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service by Concierge
desc: We had an excellent stay with the hotel and an even better communication with the concierge gentleman. I forgot the name of the gentleman at the concierge but he is a sikh gentleman with black suit and black turban. He went out of his way to help us with navigating around Singapore and also helping us to ensure we had a confirmation of our transfer picking us up on our check out date. I would like the General Manager or the Front Office Manager to recognise the efforts of the gentleman in serving and taking care of us.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel in a great location.
desc: The room was lovely, large, and clean. The staff were helpful and nice. The hotel is right at a bus stop and a metro station, and there is a food court just over the road. When i go back to Singapore I will stay there again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Price too high for the quality of the hotel service
desc: There is no complimentary coffee at the room. The elevator smell bad and need to wait exactly 2pm to check in at room even i have 10min left to 2pm. But there is 7/11 downstairs and the place is near in mrt.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Nice hotel for a quiet staycation. Brings back memories.. Miss their dine in restaurant. Staff plesant and helpful... Good amneties around. Very accedible by public transport.... Will book again if needed.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: good location, nice room, helpful staff
desc: Good location as it was easy access to public transportation, MRT, subway, to go to airport. Good room size, pretty clean. Good shower. Only care point was that breakfast has no much variety, but it was ok.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent find
desc: Excellent stay. Comfortable hotel, great attentive staff. Super location just a few minutes away from 2 MRT stations. Easy access to Suntec, Singapore National Museum, Singapore Gallery, Chinatown… Highly recommend!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfy Stay
desc: It was a quiet stay in the center of the city. It has an old vibe, but the rooms are spacious and comfortable. Air Con was a bit cold but everything else was fine. A big plus was the 7-11 downstairs !! MRT is easily accessible from the location.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value for money in an expensive town
desc: The Rendezvous Hotel on Bras Basah Street (there is another of the same name on or near Orchard Street) provides a good experience at a (for Singapore) moderate rate. It has no restaurant, and the bar never seems to be open, but there are plenty of restaurants & shops nearby. The rooms are superficially basic, but, as one relaxes into them, they prove better than the first impression they might impart: comfortable furniture, very well sound-proofed relative to neighbouring rooms, and other details that make them quite comfortable. One challenge, as elsewhere in Singapore: overzealous air-conditioning. Service is basic but friendly, oriented and dynamic. The concierge desk is particularly helpful in helping guests to organize themselves on foot or by other means in the heart

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Accomodating and Convenient
desc: Aside from the very great ambiance of the hotel, the staffs were also very accomodating and helpful specially to Sir Dean. The location is very convenient and accessible since there is a train station behind the hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Average worn down hotel
desc: Average hotel. Location is great but the property in general is in desperate need of renovation and maintenance. Old and worn down facilities with many things "out of service due to maintenance". Breakfast was an absolute disaster! Room cleaning below average.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: I will not stay here again
desc: Our experience with this Hotel is they got our booking wrong. Twin beds ordered. We got to our room and had 1 king bed. We find out upgrade for Honey mooners. I was with a friend not a husband. We then got our twin room. Big dirty marks on carpet. Two small single beds. No teaspoons, just very small plastic things. No restaurant. Breakfast was ok. No teaspoons again. Had to ask for our coffee. Certainly looks different from pictures on their site. We should of taken the King bed room. Huge space. The hall was colder than our room. We tried to crank up air conditioner but it kept us cool but you sure could feel difference when went out our door. Bathroom was ok for cleaning. Could see tiles bottom of shower grim.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice
desc: It was good, mr jap singh on the front desk was really helpful and nice, he treated nicely , but you are very weird smell Indian reception in your horse and bar really very small and the breakfast was not up to the mark

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful experience
desc: We would like to thank Jaap Sing for the time he spent with us providing local expert knowledge that helped us get the most out of our short stay. He went out of his way to welcome us. Thank you Jaap

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pretty nice
desc: It’s a very lovely hotel. The price of room is very reasonable in current Singapore market. The room is big and clean, staffs are friendly and helpful. The location of hotel is very convenient, you can choose either train or bus. There is a direct bus from airport to hotel, no.36 is just at B2 in both T1 and T3 bus stop. Will select again once back to Singapore next time to enjoy all the facilities cause too busy on jobs this time, early morning out and back in late night everyday.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: good location
desc: this hotel centrally located in shopping areas, singapura plaza, suntex city, bugis junction, arab street, fort canning park and museum .MRT station just outside and very convenient to reach from changi airport..

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly Recommended
desc: My stay was nothing short of a perfect one. While the vintage element is seen throughout the hotel, the rooms and facilities have a modern touch and are in great condition for the perfect stay. Would highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Caring and attentive staff
desc: We stayed unexpectedly at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore for nearly 3 weeks to support a family member seriously ill in hospital. The staff were attentive enough to become aware of this and were a great source of practical assistance and moral support. In particular, Rasi and Mark in Club Rendezvous were always there for us with kind or encouraging words to keep our spirits up. Thanks to all for your support. With love from the Swain family.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore stopover for 3 nights.
desc: We were new to the delights of Singapore . We decided to get the local bus from the Airport to our Accom. Advantage was we saw a lot of surburban Singapore but our moving luggage was an issue and by the time we got off , we were a hot mess! Arriving at the hotel was bliss. The aircon amazing. Our multiple luggage was taken to our room. Thanks ! Our accomodation was excellent. Breakfasts were interesting , mostly new foods to us. All the staff were kind and efficient. We had a problem with electricity on the last morning. This was sorted very quickly.Fabulous place , will be staying again on our way home.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous stay in a lovely Hotel.
desc: Excellent hotel, excellent location very handy to Bencoolen MRT station, excellent staff. We stayed in a Club Room on the 10th floor and enjoyed the breakfast room on the 11th floor every morning and the free hors d’oeuvres and drinks every evening. All the staff were fabulous, especially Mark, who regularly went above and beyond to make our evenings thoroughly enjoyable.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect trip
desc: The hotel location is perfect, it’s easy to reach Mrt downtown line, we can reach many hot places by it. The hotel is an historical building, it’s old but clean, and most important the price is quite a bargain:-)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: No longer a regular visitor
desc: As a regular traveller to Singapore PRECOVID we stayed at Rendezvous Club Room every time, never again The food was tasteless and bland, variety a few different items and only a couple put out at a time, Club Room drinks run out of whiskey day two and was NOT replaced Many other guests complained amongst themselves about the food and the quality NOT even the coffee machines were hot I have asked for the food side of my hotel stay to be refunded

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Work stay
desc: Nice hotel, good breakfast with fair good variety of food, however - every day the same. Big tables used normally at venues for the breakfast guests (10-12 persons each), 3 rooms for dining. Swimming pool on internal backyard, view on buildings walls only. Nice gym with showers. Hotels TV - very cheap. Cannot cast media to TV, not even play music from USB - TV is resetting or braking connection - complete disaster for me. Couldn't play music from phone nor the usb on the gym. Get yourself a HDMI cable if you want to see "your" media on it. Staff: very friendly, breakfast tables cleaned very quickly (like "Flash"). Nice hotel for buisness trip, nothing fancy. No lunch or dinner - You have to go somewhere else.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: Great location for sightseeing. Hotel and room very clean. Light in the wardrobe wouldn’t go off. Children of other guests racing up and down the corridor at 11pm screaming and shouting. Breakfast isn’t included in price this is extra.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay, friendly staff & great location.
desc: We stayed for 10 enjoyable nights and were privileged to be upgraded to the club lounge where we were welcomed warmly and treated exceptionally by Marjorie Morales and her staff who could not do enough for us. Room wise; Comfortable beds, huge pillows and was kept very clean and tidy by our cleaning lady who was very pleasant. Location; Buses and MRT just steps outside the front door. Excellent. Jaap Singh; What can we say, he always went out of his way to help in anyway he could even coming in on his day off to give us a commentary on the National Day celebrations which we enjoyed immensely. The staff were very friendly and considerate to our needs. Ease of checking in and out was excellent. Jaap looked after us and arranged taxi to the airport. Overall would be happy to

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location and Staff
desc: Excellent location with good size rooms. The staff particularly on the 11th floor were friendly and helpful. The club floor is well worth the extra money, it included breakfast, light refreshments through the day, then drinks and delicious nibbles in the early evening.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Stay at a wonderful hotel
desc: Rooms were clean & comfortable. Staff was amazing and very helpful. Conveniently located and close to bus stations, MRT etc. Close to lot of restaurants and about 1.5 kms from Little India. I recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Service
desc: I’m impressed with the exceptional service provided by Christina and Elijah Mae during our stay at Rendezvous Hotel. From the moment we arrived, we are happy with the level of professionalism and friendliness displayed by the hotel staff. Thank you for everything…

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location and Good Service
desc: This hotel has everything you need. Yes the rooms are basic and maybe a little old but certainly not unclean. (Housekeeping later in afternoon rather than morning but all OK) it makes up for in location and service. We were able to walk easily to great spots and get to may metro stations easily. What was amazing was the Concierge and Doormen being able to book us taxis in advance or call taxis when we needed them. We knew beforehand that breakfast was in 'conference rooms' rather than a restaurant and ;outsourced' but it was perfectly FINE! Pool was lovely and each and every staff member was professional, friendly and helpful. Would stay again. Oh and yes - in a nod to a previous reviewer...the 7-11 located below was super convenient + there is another over the road!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay with excellent service.
desc: The club access was smooth and pleasantly surprised with the process from our check in till check out. Staff were most polite and patient with queries. Rooms were clean and very comfortable. Location is central and convenient to mrt stations and other public transports.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, great staff
desc: The rooms need a bit of freshening but everything else is great. The hotel is very quiet and the blackout curtains work well, and the beds are very comfortable and the bedding seems very new. The pool is very shallow which is good if you have small children, but for adults it's more just to cool off in. The breakfast is so-so: the pastries are delicious but the hot food is more mixed. That said, they do give you good tea and coffee both in the room and at breakfast. The staff were really excellent and helpful, especially Ms. Viloshini who saw it was my birthday and sent a cake to my room! Really above and beyond service.
