The location is great, 4 MRT lines in easy walking distance so you can get anywhere you need to go in Singapore reasonably quickly. Lots of restaurants in the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great and awesome stay
desc: The location was perfect for exploring and getting around. Greatest appreciation for the club floor staff by the name of Mark and Maybelle. Not only were they warm and sincere in their greeting, but also able to anticipate guests’ needs very well. Thanks to the housekeepers for their efficient and professional service during our stay. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone going to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Memorable Experience
desc: very friendly waiters, healthy food and lots of choices, clean rooms, very strategic location. It is suitable to choose this hotel for business purposes, vacations, relaxation and stress relief. Feels like home.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel near Downtown Singapore
desc: We lucked out and received a complimentary upgrade to the junior suite! Thank you very much to the amazing guest service executive, Ms Shalini! The room was clean and very comfortable, and it comes with a bathtub, which our toddler enjoyed. The hotel is at a great location and really value-for-money since it's near the mrt station, close to Plaza Singapura mall, multiple eateries and downtown. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone is looking for a nice and affordable hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A true embodiment of hospitality
desc: From the moment we stepped into the hotel until the moment we left, the service has been impeccable. I was travelling with 80 year old ladies who had only the best memories of their very comfortable 3 night stay. The staff were very helpful and proactive in ensuring that all needs and requests are provided for. The breakfast buffet spread, though not extensive, is well thought through with enough varieties to satisfy.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: Nice person and hotel will come back to Singapore and visit Rendezvous hotel as soon. Everyone here pays attention to details and cares for their guests. Thank you very much. I will be back as soon sir.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service, attentive staff
desc: My partner and I had a pleasant staycation experience. Rooms were clean and well equipped. Staffs were friendly. A big thank you to Logeswary for offering us a generous upgrade, as we were celebrating a special occasion. Keep up the 5* service

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Gross. Dirty and not worth what you pay
desc: Good location but everything is filthy. To the rat infested foyer, filthy pool area, dirty curtains in my room. Everything looks OK until u really look at it. Was no room service, breakfast in their makeshift area was a small ballroom with shiny covering on chairs and chandeliers..was just dirty. Breakfast cold. We left. For $350 a night I expected better. Will not be returning

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointing!
desc: One night was enough! Outdated, and very dissappointing given the cost! Facilities poor and needs a thorough clean and makeover. Will not be going back! Positives, its in a good location and near to several shopping centres and tourist spots.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at rendezvous
desc: Disappointed w the breakfast varieties and quality as stated international buffet.end up only see simply breads,a few dishes that is not appealing. Pillows are not as good too and after woke up feeling aching

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel at a reasonable price.
desc: If you look through the so called ‘better’ hotels in Singapore you’ll find that many of them are double or more than double the price of the Rendevous. I’ll say at the outset that the hotel is somewhat ‘tired’ in places but some of the recent reviews ( including the one which mentions a rat infested reception) are without justification. The check in was fine and thanks go to Mr Dean, the duty manager who looked after us admirably. The room was fine. Not huge but big enough. A large flat screen tv, a comfortable bed with quality linen and pillows, a view of the city skyline, a safe, gowns, tea and coffee etc. A great plus is that the hotel is almost on top of the Bencoolen MRT with easy access to everything. Would we go back? You bet! We’re booked in on or return visit to

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: Very nice hotel . Friendly staff. For 11 th floor breakfast poor presentation and variety. I didn’t figured out how to use the toaster without burning my bread. Not many chooses for breakfast. Great benefits in the afternoon. Nice pool. Great cleaning services

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value for money and nice location
desc: Nice room with everything you need. Huge shower, comfortable bed and quiet despite our room facing busy road. Excellent location with MRT around the corner and good access to cafe's and Restaurants within 5 min walking distance. Highly recommended as the price is also reasonable for Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel !! Great location and lovely staff
desc: This is a very nice hotel in the heart of the city where all the nice places to visit in Singapore. Lovely rooms and bathrooms and swimming pool .. we had booked the room for 2 days and had a flight in the evening so they let us keep our bags in the clock room The staff was so helpful they gave us a return gift too.. food at the restaurant was nice Kudos to the hotel staff right from gatekeeper to manager

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Sorry for late review as visited in May 2017. Stayed at the hotel in a standard room for 3 nights. The room was spacious with big comfy beds and all necessary amenities. All public areas are clean, spacious and modern. The location is great and there is a Hop on Hop Off Bus right outside. Staffs were helpful and friendly. The breakfast was very good with a large variety of both Western and Eastern options. Did not use the pool/gym or other facilities. Would recommend this hotel and would not hesitate to stay again if in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Unique Art Deco Hotel - Good Facilities
desc: A brief visit for work, with little time spent in the hotel other than one down day for catching up on emails etc. Comfortable facilities for working, good food, nice rooms and good location. Would recommend. The ‘business class’ floor is very good, with free drinks and food between certain times that is of a good standard. Very near a number of museums and points of interest as well for those with more leisure time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant base for exploring Singapore
desc: Whilst travelling alone for the first time ever (so far away from home) I was pleasantly surprised by how welcoming and comfortable this hotel was. Arriving at 7.30am, I was given a room straight away which was very much appreciated given my long journey. The room itself was a good size, very clean with a comfortable big bed. I don’t remember there being any noise at all - I am a light sleeper! The hand held device was so helpful for maps and for coming to my rescue to take photos on my last night when my own camera ran out of battery. At check-out I was given an additional 3 hours free of charge due to my late flight out. I was very impressed by the customer service. The location is perfect, you can easily walk through the park to China Town or up to Little India and there is

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent value
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights, If you want to stay at a nice place in central Singapore but dont want to spend too much then this is the perfect place to stay. The hotel is very well located in the old colonial district, surrounded by nice heritage buildings and tree lined streets. It is walking distance to 3 subway stations, all on different lines and is also walking distance to Singapore river and orchard road shopping district. The pool is nice for relaxing and the decor of the hotel is neat. Rooms are standard, not too small and are kept very clean.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A very pleasant stay!
desc: - The location is perfect! a 5 mins walk-able distance to Bra Basah MRT station and another 10mins walk-able to Dhoby Ghaut station. - Lobby area is welcoming, smooth checking in and friendly hotel employees - Room and its facilities are all clean and pleasant - The restaurant serves good meal and breakfast, plenty of varieties. - Most uber and taxis are able to locate the hotel easily

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Really pretty hotel. Great location. Noise wasn't a problem, but then we were on a higher floor. This was the first Hotel we chose on our trip and it was the best. Across the road is a food court, that sell your traditional Singapore food. Portion sizes in Singapore are huge if your trying for the first time. Across another road is Subways restaurant (for the fussy eater). Access to the MRT is just outside. You can get a taxi, nearly everywhere you look. Taxi in Singapore is cheap, it cost about $30 from the Airport (We left at about 6pm).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: great location; wonderful stay
desc: I stayed there from 27-29 April 2018. The location is great. There is a department stall nearby and convenient store just across the street (starbucks and 7-11 is just a mere 5-minute walk). As for the room, everything is great. They have all the required amenities and the bedding and view is great (though I stayed during raining season so nothing much to see). It is right next to the subway station which you can ride to city's main attractions (10 minutes to garden by the bay and 15 minutes to the Universal by metro). Overall, it is worth the stay!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Really Good Stay
desc: Really nice stay at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore. Conveniente location, really few step from the MRT. People at the reception were nice and helpful. Large and well maintained external pool. We also used the Gym, not particularly big but ok for a routine training. Overall a really good Hotel, really recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient Location
desc: We stayed there on our way back from Europe for one night only. The Hotel staff were very helpful in everyway. Location is very easy to get around close to transport etc. We did a lot of walking, because that's what we like to do. Very good choice and value for money. Would definitely stay there again and for longer next time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, easy accessible
desc: Had a short stay in here for work and found the location just right. Rooms are a bit rusty and small but other things are just fine. Breakfast is good with good tropical choices. Didn't use the swimming pool but it looked nice if you get a chance.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: The hotel was really lovely with a nice reception area. The staff were all very friendly and approachable, which made it a delightful stay. We were also received a complimentary upgrade to a junior suite at check in, which was a pleasant surprise. The room was spacious and comfortable. The bed was comfortably as well. The location of the hotel is great, as there are a lot of affordable and good food around the area, some even opened till late night. It is also within walking distance to Dhoby Ghaut MRT (5 minutes) and City Hall MRT (10 minutes). The breakfast spread was not bad - there was a mix of Asian and Western choices. The service at the restaurant was good too. All in all, it was a really nice stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy returning patron
desc: Stayed here before and returned. The hotel has maintenance its standard: staff, service, reliability, efficiency. Our friends and my family enjoyed the hotel's restaurant as well. Good variety and quality food.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Upgrade room
desc: 4 day stop over booked an upgrade room club class the price for the upgrade was very good value you could use the club Room for breakfast and go in during the day for tea coffee and soft drinks and then from 6pm to 8 pm you can get alcoholic drinks and some very nice small plates of food and they are not shy at serving you the drinks ether nice rooms and in a great location for the underground 2 stations very near staff in the hotel very friendly and helpful all in all very good place to stay

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Worth every penny
desc: The hotel is located in the center and close to many places. You can easily to anywhere by walking from her. Rooms were clean and large. They sent us to a dessert when they found out that we are in honeymoon. Staff were friendly and helpful. The only thing that needs to be improved is breakfast variety.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best in Singapore
desc: From the moment we stepped through the front door we felt so welcome. All the staff are so friendly and accommodating. The room was fantastic and the bed was huge!! Public transport is very close and so easy to use. I would recommend this hotel to everyone and hope to return soon.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful Stay in Singapore
desc: We visited the Rendezvous Hotel in August for my husband's birthday. We had recently stayed there in June and were welcomed back like family. Our room was excellent, the staff couldn't be nicer and nothing was too much trouble. Special thanks to Yi Sheng, Sofia, Doyln and Lizah in the Club lounge, you all made our stay very memorable. We couldn't recommend this hotel more highly.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great, central hotel
desc: The hotel was perfect for our needs; central, comfortable and had an excellent breakfast included. We didn’t use many of the facilities but it was handy to have a 7eleven inside the hotel complex and it was close by to many shops and restaurants.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Review
desc: All has been mentioned previously. The water temperature in the shower room was not constant. No tissue paper in the sitting room. Gym is ok. The food variety of the breakfast is not enough. Location is very convenient.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business and relax
desc: Good place to stay. Really close to the metro. I have been few days but hospitality at he top, gym no so bad and restaurant breakfast at good level. Support from the crew at maximun level possible. Yes, it is perfect for business.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: customer service n food
desc: marco is a good customer service person who treats customer well.he was very friendly as for the food is very nice.especiall the crabs it was the best food ever.marco is very patience person who does not rush to customer,the food is very the nice and other staff was very attentive to every customer especially when clearing the plates

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 10 day stay in Singapore
desc: A lovely warm welcome upon arrival, nice surroundings with artwork etc, amazing location in the city close to 3 MRT train stations and a bus station outside. Handy to a lot of malls and shops nearby. Pool was nice Staff very helpful.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice experience at the Club Level
desc: I have stayed at the Rendez-Vous hotel but it was the first time I was at the Club level. Customized welcome, lounge, generous room, everything was there for me to feel relax and peaceful before and after my day of work. The hotel is well located, letting you the chance, if you have time, to stroll around the Orchard neighborhood of Singapore. The staff and the comfort are very good, for one of the best place to stay in Singapore. Shiok Lah!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: efficient stay
desc: I spent 3 days in the executive club rooms. Very good service at this floor. Room comfortable and very clean, quiet. Swimming pool quite pleasant outside. Gym relatively small for the size of the hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: COMFORTABLE STOPOVER
desc: Centrally located to shops in both directions. Bus and underground is at your doorstep. Museums and art galleries is short walking distance. Friendly and helpful staff. Decor is a little outdated but clean and comfortable.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Should get a 3,5 review.
desc: I stayed for 3 nights in a double bed room on the 5th floor. The temperature inside the elevator was very high. The room feels a bit old, although it has a modern TV, phone, etc... I did not use the pool, but it seems to be in the shade for the most part of the day. Breakfast was OK. The hotel is within walking distance of a lot of shops and restaurants. The neighborhood is good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect stay in a great location!
desc: Very good hotel and really close to all attractions. We had a really good modern room and breakfast was SO delicious with quality coffee machine. We had an upper floor room with a view of the beautiful museum building. Service is 10/10!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent base for exploring
desc: My hubbie and I visited this hotel in September 2018. We where looking for a hotel in a good location as we intended to explore and wanted good transport links to the city but also as we where staying for 10 nights we wanted some comfort as well. We chose well. This is a lovely hotel. We booked a Club room which is excellent as it has its own lounge on the 11th floor where you take breakfast. You can also have breakfast on the ground floor in the Straits Cafe but the Club lounge is a lot quieter and suited us perfectly. Some reviewers state they found the food choice was limited, but it had everything we required. Cereals, Juice, excellent Coffee, a selection of hot food, fruit and pastries. It also comes with a bonus....the staff. They are truly lovely. Every review mentions

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lavish, elegant, and personal
desc: My husband and I spent one night in Rendezvous Hotel, having had a transfer arranged by AMOY (a sister hotel). From the moment we arrived, the staff were warm and courteous, and we were greeted by the manager himself! We were treated to an upgrade to a suite, and when the staff learned that it was our honeymoon, they surprised us with a delightful cake! We were overwhelmed by the friendliness and kindness of all the staff, many of whom learned our names within what seemed like minutes. As for the hotel itself, its location is second to none: right next to Bencoolen MRT, it is a stone's throw from the National Museum and Orchard Rd. The rooms are bright, and the beds are extremely comfortable (if a little high!). The facilities are fantastic; the pool is fun, and the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Staff was friendly, good service. Hotel interior at the reception was artsy but the room is old victorian-ish style. (Not so sure if the hotel is going through some changes.) Bed was comfortable. Shower is a little off, takes a minute to get it change from hot to cold. Other than that it was a comfortable stay. Will consider coming back again for another night.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: stopover
desc: Have stayed here several times for one or 2 nights. This trip we stayed one night going into Yangonn and one night as we came back about 3 weeks later. Hotel is just 35 min from airport by taxi and very nicely situated in the city for walks or MRT to different attractions. Staff always very helpful. Rooms very comfortable and clean

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Location
desc: The location of the hotel is great as it is within walking distance of many attractions and if walking is not your thing then there are 3 underground stations within a couple of minutes. We found the Handy phone in the room very helpful as we used it as a guide whilst out and about and to book tickets. The room itself was compact but clean and comfortable. Like others we had an issue with the temperature of the shower. On the last day we had to check out in the morning but as we had a night flight the hotel kept our luggage and then provided us with a key to the gym area so we could have a shower and get changed which was very much appreciated.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location!
desc: The location of the hotel was great! There are two train stations within distance. One is on the same block as the hotel and the other is 5 mins walk from the hotel. The hotel was average in my opinion. Our room was a little out of date and could probably use some renovations. I did hear that the other higher category rooms are better and renovated. The staff were amazing.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, great service and we are spoiled!
desc: Great service from the front office, concierge and of course the executive level staff~ Highly compliment to Jannah, Hannah & Sopia, who were very helpful, friendly and always with bright/ cheerful smile~~~ As someone who is with strong hospitality background, I knew lot of staff just treat it as a "job" rather than being very helpful and offer help whenever they can- to us, every guest is unique and we served our best~ <--- yes, they did it!Location wise is great~ Other than Orchard area, I am much happier to stay near Plaza Sing & Bugis! We will definitely come back for our future trip~ along with our baby little Sydney of course! hopefully these amazing female staff will still around~~!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous holiday
desc: Great location, helpful and efficient staff. Received excellent help and advice from the Conciergeregarding places to see and how to go about it. Club lounge and benefits it gave , were worth the extra money paid to have this available. Nice quiet area for breakfast and cocktails in the evening.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The straits kitchen
desc: The selection is not much though, but the food is nice. Especially the laksa is yummy Happened to be served by a friendly waiter, Marco. Good for colleagues gathering, spacious and able to hold bigger group.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel experience
desc: This hotel maintains the brand and also provide the best service. I would like to say thank you to everyone who make my stay enjoyable and also will look forward to stay at this hotel again. This is one of the best hotel experience I every had.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel. Value for money
desc: My friends and I love this place. We always have a great & enjoyable chill-out place at the lobby after our work. Great place for catching up without burning a hole in our pockets. Thanks to the hospitality of Rizz & his team.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Central location
desc: Central location, 2 min walk from dhoby ghat Mrt, edge of orchard road, 1o min from little india and 10 from Marina bay. breakfast addition and room upgrade is offered at abt 47 sgd, take that option. breakfast is mix of continental and local sigapore cuisine. Vegetarians have limited options. dhoby ghat mrt has 3 metro lines converving, can get to any part of singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendevous|Hotel
desc: Only stayed 2 nights but would go back again for the great location and friendly helpful staff, they were awesome. The bed was very comfortable and clean. A great place to stay. We recommend this hotel :-)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Every Dollar Worths
desc: We have lived in the hotel for 5 days at the junior suite so that our 18-month boy can run around and play in the room. Services of the club house are top class. All of the attendants are excellent and great. Everyone is treated evenly as a VIP. Varieties of food offered in the club are ample throughout our 5-day stay, no need to mention what enjoyable drinks one had during dinner time. Swimming pool is great. Front desk services are good. Parking facilities are available. Few eateries are situated inside the hotel complex. Moreover, it takes you few minutes to go to Bencoolen MRT station under shether. No need to worry about thunderstorm. Cross the road is the Cathy plaza and few more blocks to go to Plaza Singapuro. Overall travel facilities are within walking distance. We got

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hosting of meetings
desc: I recently hosted a meeting of 70 international guests from all over the world. This meeting was over 5 days and each day the service staff took great care of us. I would like to make special mention of Rajan and David Lai, these guys live and breath service. My guests were so impressed with the service standards and quality that they made sure I knew about it. Food at the Streets Cafe also deserves a mention, it is excellent food showcasing the best of Singapore food. My guests really enjoyed their lunches. I will be returning here to host my future events

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One got more than what one paid
desc: Remarkable excellent service from staff of the club that makes one feels at home. One can start to have a pleasant day by firstly enjoying a personal buffet breakfast at the club. Though varieties of food are not too ample, yet in general the menu serves one's needs. Fruits and salads are fresh and different types of coffee are well served. Coming to lunch time, one can have a light lunch with different types of juices. For tea time, snacks are served. Down to supper, a light dinner is served with good varieties of drinks, including alcoholic drinks (all free). Moreover, one still can enjoy a non alcoholic drink before bed time. Turning to other types of services, such as: luggages handling, housekeeping, laundry, etc., they are 1st class. We got the value more than what we paid

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: rooms to upgrade the cleanliness of bathroom
desc: rooms to upgrade the cleanliness of bathroomrooms to improve the water pressurerooms to improve the water temperaturerooms to improve the air-conditionrooms to improve the quality of drinking wateraverage quality of room but lack of surprise

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Stay
desc: Was there for 2D1N stay cation with my family to celebrate my husband's birthday. The staff was thoughtful to deliver a slice of cake with beautiful handwritten wording to the room. My son enjoyed the pool time too. Will definitely be coming back again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, so so facilities
desc: Location was superb as expected, but the hotel could use a little renovation, bedsheets could be cleaner, shower temperatures fluctuating less and carpet could use some cleaning. You should only consider its location and do not expect much from its facilities for the price you are paying.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location and Superb Price
desc: Great location. Near 3 mrt stations. Easy to get around. Very competitive pricing. Decent rooms. Great service. Didn't get to try the breakfast or use any facilities like the swimming pool and the gym.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Affordable quality
desc: I stayed only for a night. This is my second visit after ten years or more and I was pleasantly surprised. Check in was fast and efficient. Room was spacious,clean and well equipped. All I needed was in the room: nesspresso machine,free mini bar,large TV,safe,enough storage,fast Wi-Fi,shower cubicle and bath tub... Breakfast was not impressive but sufficient. Location is good,next to MRT station and short walk to Orchard. There numerous bars and restaurants within few minutes walk. If you a looking for a bit cheaper accommodation in Singapore and don't want to give up certain level of luxury,this hotel should be on your list.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic stay
desc: Really enjoyed our time at Rendezvous Singapore. Great location, Friendly helpful staff, rooms very well appointed. Reception staff recommended the Club Rendezvous Room Upgrade which was very reasonable and added so much to our stay. Concierge and Club Lounge staff particularly helpful and attentive.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Room smells like cigarette and towels are really really old.
desc: Room smells like cigarette and towels are really really old (like breaking apart old). Perfume they are using at reception js so strong. Location is good. Staffs are friendly. They offered upgrade with paying $40 pp, it probably was better with this offer.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Hotels
desc: Love this place the first time and will always return when in Singaporegreat room and close to MTR and close to the F1 track as that what I was there for few place close by for quick bites to eat and drinks

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Grand Prix visit
desc: The Hotel was very comfortable. It's location is excellent with easy and close access to the MRT and Bus service. The beds were comfortable and the rooms very clean. Hotel staff were friendly and efficient and I would happily stay there again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: We had a two night stay at this hotel with is very centrally located with bus stop right outside front door. Bed was comfortable and aircon very efficient. Bathroom was nice with excellent shower. Coffee making in room but you have to pay extra for breakfast. Staff are very helpful.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staff are lovely
desc: Stayed here for just one night unfortunately prior to taking a cruise. The hotel and the staff are lovely. The location is perfect next to bus stops and MRT stations - great for getting around easily. We were in a Club room which is well worth the extra money. From check into check out you do everything on the Club Floor and the staff are fantastic especially Dolyn and Farah on Club reception and Winston, one of the waiters. The Club lounge is perfect for breakfast and refreshments during the day with drinks and canapés each evening. Perfect! We will definitely be back soon. Thank you to all at the Rendezvous.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location for Grand Prix
desc: We stayed 3 nights during the grand prix. The hotel is well located and staff friendly and helpful. We had a deluxe room and it was ok. The double bed was small ( I am 6'6'') however a little tired in decor. The bar was good and restaurants close by. Breakfast was average nothing outstanding. Overall a reasonable stay and close for access to MRT and walking distance to grand prix.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hospitality and service at its finest
desc: I've never regretted choosing Rendezvous as my hotel of choice for hosting my wedding banquet last Sunday. The hotel does not have the best exterior but as the saying goes, don't judge a book by its cover. The ballroom was nice and the bridal suite was spacious. Here are a few people (apart from the service staff on our wedding day) who I would like to show my appreciation for making my wedding on 16 September 2018, a successful and memorable one. 1) Huang Yan (Catering Sales Manager) Shirley and I met up with Huang Yan sometime in October last year to view the premises and to discuss about our wedding requirements. Huang Yan is very responsive to queries, is detail orientated and had done a tremendous job in coordinating with operations (chef, banquet operations etc) and

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Hotel
desc: This hotel is in the perfect location, within walking distance to many major attractions. The amenities were all very good, buffet breakfast had everything you could want, the pool was beautiful, clean & just what you needed after a day exploring the city. The hotel has a bus service at the front door & a choice of 2 MRT Rail Stations outside as well, which are the best way to get around town. The F1 track was a leisurely 15 minute walk down Bras Basah Road & you can stop halfway at the famous Raffles Hotel for a Singapore Sling. Overall no faults with this hotel for quality & location.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good choice for Singapore
desc: Stayed for Formula 1. Really well placed for major things to do. Would recommend. Five minutes to Raffles and 7SGD taxi ride to Marina Bay Sands. Ten minute walk to Gate 3B for Stamford grandstand. Would visit again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Luxurious, spacious, strategically located, yet average breakfast
desc: The hotel is quite spacious, around 26m2 for deluxe type. Got a corner room which makes it loooks bigger. Nice firm bed. Overall is good! The one thigh that can be improved is the fruits variety for breakfast. They only provide honey dew... A little bit below my expectation

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: It's the staff that make this hotel so good !
desc: Another stay at the Rendezvous ( four times now ) and a room on the Club floor where the attentive service from Dolyn and her colleagues makes every guest feel special ! We were there for 11 nights in total , including the Grand Prix period ( so the room rate then wasn't cheap ! ) The hotel's location is really good , now there are three MRT stations within a short walk of the hotel and a bus stop immediately outside the main doors , so no problems with transport services. One area I think the hotel's managent could improve on is offering a better alternative restaurant -- when there was The Courtyard things were far better ; perhaps an Italian restaurant , or similar , maybe ? As mentioned above , what makes this place really special are the staff , every one of them is so

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect location
desc: Perfect location, the hotel is next to Bencoolen station and very close to other landmark such as food center, shopping mall etc. The last thing, I love the incredible bed. Real room size is a little bit smaller than I expect and room decoration.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Discriminated Superior Room
desc: Stayed on 3rd floor in a superior room for three nights last week. Entire floor’s carpet was old and dirty, from corridor to the rooms. Housekeeping was bad. No one picks up the line on at least 3 occasions. We have to call operator instead. It’s amazing how discriminated the superior room was in terms of amenities for a 4-star (if it is indeed a 4-star):- 1) No cotton buds. Hotel do not provide unless requested. We requested, we got some on day 1. Was never replenished. 2) No cotton. I was told that the hotel do not provide cotton at all as part of their amenities, regardless of room grade. They got me some and came in a pack that says ‘shaving kit’. Before i could use them up, the pack was removed by housekeeping day after. 3) No bathrobes. Requested and got it. BUT the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Corporate Meeting in Rendezvous Hotel
desc: My company had a corporate event that was held in Rendezvous Hotel with all our partners coming from all over APAC. The service level is superb and prompt, staffs are all very experienced and well trained. Thanks to Wong Li Min, Siti Nur Ainni, Jess Wong, Sheena, Callist, Mei who had ever been so helpful attending to all my needs as the organisor.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Short Weekend Staycay
desc: If you're looking for a weekend getaway in the heart of town, then this place comes highly recommended. Highly accessible, comfortable room, good food all around (day and night), shopping and movie theatres just a stone's throw away.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall great
desc: It was a pleasant business trip in Rendevous Hotel Singapore. Everything was so great, the service, the room, the environment. We had our meeting here for 1.5 days and 2 nights for staying. Everything was arranged so considerable and detailed. We appreciated it so much. Thanks!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent banquet service
desc: Have been conducting events at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore for the past few years. Aside from location being convenient and accesible, we decided to continue conducting our event here because of the staffs who are genuinely friendly and helpful. They listened and was very receptive to our need as a client. Some even went the extra mile to ensure our event went smoothly. Our clients were also happy especially when the restaurant received the Halal certification. Would specially like to thank the banquet staff - Mei, David, Rajan, Chris, part-time staffs and Callist (sales dept) for the excellent service rendered. We will definitely recommend this venue to anyone looking to host an event.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location
desc: The hotel was beautiful and the staff was amazing. We were able to check in smooth and the room was clean. I personally love the location of the hotel, it between 2 MTR station which is only 3min walk away. With the hotel between 2 MTR staion it easier to plan out which places you plan to go and go to the correct MTR station without changing over during the trip (Depend on where you heading). Yes it is on Orchard Road and the closest shopping centre is Plaza Singapura. Overall it a great hotel and perfect location for traveller, will definitely be back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Hotel to visit Singapore for some days
desc: Beautiful Hotel in a central location, right on the famous Orchard Road, very clean und well-kept Rooms, friendly staff, great breakfast buffet and a MTR-Stadion right by the Hotel. Absolutely to suggest

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location, Staff
desc: I travel to Singapore many times per year and have stayed in many places. The Hotel has great functional rooms, in a good location and the service and food is also a good quality. I travel for business and suits the needs perfectly and now stay all the time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Service Manager
desc: Need to be improved to room products such as hand sink, hot water is not really hotterQuality of room service also need to improve. Someone knock to my room very early morning during in sleep.Taxi booking more faster,

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay at Rendezvous Singapore
desc: Great Hotel friendly staff most helpful nothing was a bother. The club room was a very good idea andvery clean. The only small mention the breakfast did not cater for westerners so much. I would recommend this hotel to friends.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location and Fantastic hotel
desc: The room is very clean, comfortable and welcoming. The location is close to the metro station, shops and restaurants. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful, especially the ones at the front desk. We will definitively stay in Rendezvous Hotel Singapore again next time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Third Staycation
desc: All was good, Not really much complains or issues. Third stay this year and also for the Fiancée's Birthday. Overall however, personally felt that the first two stays were better, especially on the request for a delayed check out.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My suggestion
desc: It was good to be there for couple of days. breakfast was good and specially fruit platter. services are good enough, quality of room are good. only one thing I would like to suggest is that there should be Muslim shower in toilet.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A perfectly pleasant stay
desc: A very nice room indeed and the upgrade of services offered when I arrived seemed to be good value for money. Excellent service from the reception and concierge too. The only thing I thought was lacking was the communal area/bar which was dark and unwelcoming so I didn't use it but there's so much to see and do in the city that maybe that wasn't such a big issue.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Again it didn’t disappoint
desc: Just returned home after tenth visit to The Rendezvour Hotel in ten years. It was as always a very enjoyable experience for the five day stay. The accommodation is comfortable, the restaurants good and the location makes visits to all locations very easy. The staff are always helpful and friendly - Samsudin and Masagos of the Consierge desk were always ready to assist - as were all the others. I have already asked my travel agent to book me in next year. I find Singapore a great place to do a stopover on the way home to Australia to unwind from an overseas trip.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff, clean hotel
desc: The friendliness and warmth of the staff in the Club Lounge was the highlight of my stay. I booked a room for myself to celebrate my birthday and the staff did everything to make my time there a special and delightful one. The Club Lounge is comfortable and cosy and a really lovely place to chill out if you just need some time alone and don't feel like going out. The food and amenities there are great too. The hotel is located in an old building but don't be fooled by the exterior! The lobby is very trendy and well decorated. The room was clean and comfortable although the quality of toiletries could be improved on (they were very limited and lacking cotton pads which would have been useful for makeup removal, etc). But overall I'm very impressed by Hotel Rendezvous - the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel, close to synagogue
desc: Very nice hotel. Very friendly staff. Very comfortable bed.Very close to synagogue and very accommodating for shomer Shabbos people. You can get a third floor room and they will assist with opening the doors on Shabbos. There is a non-electric door on Shabbos, which is very nice.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: AMAZING
desc: I stayed in the Junior Suite 2 months ago. This is my first time writing a review and I am to say it is a good one. If you need a hotel to stay, come stay at this one! It is central, and there is good food as well. My english is bad but they made effort to try and understand me. They are good! Excellent!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short trip to Singapore
desc: We chose the hotel based on location (to subway). Access to subway was very easy and made moving around really convenient. We paid extra for the club, which was an ok deal since it included breakfast for the two of us. Overall the hotel is clean and has good quality services, so I can recommend this choise. At least we got a good price to quality ratio.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value for money
desc: I booked the Rendezvous Hotel,along with it's Club Rendezvous package due to a positive review from a workmate.Happy to say he was spot on as the staff were wonderful,the central location perfect for getting around and the Club package worked well for us.Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb wedding banquet & stay!
desc: Had our wedding banquet with Rendezvous hotel. Our coordinator, Yan, was very compromising to our requests and very prompt in response. The whole process was made easy and smooth. The banquet team was also very helpful and service was excellant! Special thanks to Chi Chuan and Mei who went the extra mile to ensure that our actual day wedding went smoothly and perfectly! Feedback from my guests were also great, the banquet team's service level was more than satisfactory. Although Rendezvous hotel is a 4 star hotel, the level of service provided was comaprable to a 5 star hotel. On a side note, would be great if the hotel can do more CSR by pairing up with charity organisations for wedding favours and flower deco. Our stay at the club room and suite was also excellant. Reception

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Unbeatable location
desc: Very accessible, near shopping areas and cultural/historical downtown Singapore. 2 train stations nearby and many buses pass by the hotel, easy to travel anywherembRooms are decent, but the Straits Cafe needs an upkeep.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First time in Singapore
desc: A really nice hotel not far from The Raffles Hotel. Really friendly staff and very helpful. We checked in early and was unable to have our room straight away. Once ready our bags were delivered to the room for us. Good size room, lovely comfortable bed and good sized bathroom. At least 4 bottles of water left in your room daily (free). On Bras Basah Road with buses and train station nearby. We didn’t have food here, just over the road was a food republic with great food and cheap. We did however enjoy very well made Singapore Slings from the bar and at $13 each they were much cheaper than other establishments nearby. Highly recommended. Don’t pay $32 for one ! Especially when they’re not properly made. This place makes each one to order. I can honestly say our first visit to

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: excellent hotel and rooms
desc: was located in a good position to everything easy access to transport and shops trains etc would recommend for people to book accomodation at this hotel staff very friendly and helpful had to have a late checkout due to delay of ship and they were most obliging and helpful

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Had comfortable stay
desc: Warm hospitality and good location. Staff were efficient, well organized and friendly. Responoded to our requests quickly. Clean room with good equipments including a good hair dryer, an iron, tea and coffee sets, a shower with enough water pressure etc. It's not a super gorgeous hotel but I strongly recommend you to stay if you are looking for a nice hotel with good price.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: So convenient!
desc: Convenient location as it was only small walk back from my event venue to the hotel! Had few glasses of wine/beer at the lobby lounge with my colleagues and the staff was very well on up selling skills.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good and suitable for business
desc: It is need to be clean bathroom because it was block in basin with piece f hair, and it is need to adjust the temperature to take a bath slightly. This is because of I was found with hot water when I took a bath although I adjusted temperature.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome weeks stay at the Rendezvous!!
desc: Just spent a week in a club lounge room, Can't fault anything about this hotel. The hotel is located equal distance between Orchard Rd and Raffles, Bus stop out the front and Belconnen MRT station 1 minute walk. In the room was a coffee pod machine, slippers, bath robes, ample toiletries and complimentary mini bar as well. I cannot single out one staff member as they were all excellent and attended to all your needs. The club lounge was excellent free refreshments and coffee all day and the breakfast and canopes provided was of a high standard. I also got the proposal package great value for money. Cannot fault this hotel at all from the moment we checked in to the moment we check out the staff were attentive and also happy to assist you. Thanks Rendezvous for making our special

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay
desc: My recent stay with this hotel was very pleasant. It was always very clean, neat and tidy and hotel staff very friendly and approachable. The pool was very nice to cool off after a long day. Our check in & out process was very long waiting other than that great location would have no issues in recommending this hotel to others.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay
desc: Generally, a good stay. Though room was a bit small after we put in the crib, it was still ok. Swimming pool was a bit small and doesn't look clean. Could be that it was not a new hotel. Anyway, we enjoy ourselves.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Stopover
desc: A well situated hotel with easy access to the metro.Needs a refresh , but is clean and comfortable , friendly staff.Look after your needs as best they canEconomically priced accomodation in an expensive city.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staffs are friendly, helpful and passionate.
desc: I stayed for two nights and I like the club lunge and the service. Besides food and drinks, I received warm greetings from those staffs in every breakfast time and evening cocktail. Various food and cocktails, as well as the lunge staffs make my stay a pleasant one. If my budget is enough, I'll choose it again next time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Super impressed by this hotel. Immaculately presented, service was 5 star, clean and in an excellent location which bus stops/ MRT station , shops and restaurants right outside.Breakfast was excellent . Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful and quaint facility
desc: Enjoyed every bit of this great hotel. Artistic. Loved the art ensemble, on walls, in rooms and lighting. The theme going on is beautiful. Services are wonderful. Food is a lot in variety and quality. The staff are friendly and warm, and very helpful, in checking in and on departure. I think the hotel can provide an online payment system where costs can be cleared by others away from the location for guests whose costs are catered by organisations.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay
desc: Everything in the Club room was as expected and the staff were very friendly and provided an excellent service. The Receptionist on arrival at 6:30am was very attentive and helpful. Thus we were able to go to our room early and recover from a long flight form Europe.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stopover hotel in Singapore
desc: Great hotel! Large room and great service. Upon arrival, we were given an upgrade that included a larger room, free mini bar , free buffet breakfast and vouchers for the hop on hop off bus, all at a VERY nominal rate. Diana, the woman who checked us in was amazing! Definitely recommend this hotel!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great little hotel in an excellent location
desc: Great location. The hotel staff are friendly and extremely helpful and the hotel has a great atmosphere and well appointed rooms. The rooms are small however, so as a family travelling it was not ideal for us. However would definitely stay here again in when travelling by myself or as a couple.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very Professional Catering & Banquet Service Team
desc: We have been hosting our client's monthly networking events at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore for the past 4 months. The feedbacks that we have received from our client and guests have been consistently positive on the accessibility, food & services. Overall, we are very pleased with the service support and how coordinated the different departments of the whole hotel team were. Special thanks to Huang Yan (Snr Catering Mgr) for assisting in all our projects. She is very service-oriented, on the ball and patient will all our requests. Aside, we would also like the thank the banquet team David, May, Chi Chuan, Gregory...for working closely with us on the execution of our events and accommodating to any of our last minute changes and requests. Great team effort and well done!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great spot, lovely accommodation
desc: We greatly enjoyed our stay here, value for money was fantastic compared to some other options we had looked into. museums, cafe's and restaurants were all within easy walking distance, and the reception / club staff / bar staff were lovely and most helpful.We would definitely return in future, and hope to do so very soon!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Like family
desc: We would not stay anywhere else, all the staff are wonderful and treat us like family. We have stayed here 5 times. The rooms are very spacious and clean and the bed is extremely comfortable. The club room is awesome and a special thanks to Hannah the Manager who has ensured our stay is wonderful.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: The hotel was perfect in every way for our trip to Singapore. I won't look anywhere else next time. I'll be staying there. The facilities, location and nearness to public transport was perfect. We were treated like royalty.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not a 4 star property as advertized
desc: Rooms are quite basic in amenities, and not exactly large. The carpet is old and with stains. The bathroom seemed like it was renovated a little more recently than the rest of the floor, but the overall design is poor: water from the shower floods the entire bathroom floor. Overall, basic hotel in central location, but by far not a 4 star property they advertize it as, rather 2.5 stars.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great room in SIN
desc: I stayed once again at the Rendezvous and this time was the best in terms of the room assigned. Beautifully appointed and groomed.The service is always friendly and good.Definitely will stay there again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Average with very poor customer consideration
desc: Stayed in rendezvous 3 times 3 weeks during last year.Quality of continental breakfast is very poor (no fresh juice, bakeries of bad quality, single coffee machine for whole area), staff not welcoming (request for your hotel card every morning when entering breakfast area).Room not quiet but globally ok.During this stay I was requested for a middle term payment, which I have never seen in any other place in the world.I do not understand why an initial prepayment of the global price was not made... (they told me that internal hotel rules prevented them to ask more than 2500 SGD prepayment).However, it resulted in coming back from work late one night and seeing my key not working. Hotel had blocked my card to force me doing a mid stay payment. Absolutely shocking and

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Restorative
desc: We wanted a place to recover energy after 6 weeks overseas. Our time in Rendezvous provided good sleep, privacy and friendly staff. The hotel is well located and close to MRT and for us out of the main tourist areas.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding banquet luncheon
desc: I held my wedding luncheon at Rendezvous Hotel on 21 Oct 18. The luncheon went by smoothly, exceeding our expectations. I would like to extend my appreciation to Huang Yan, the catering sales manager. Huang Yan delivered beyond our expectations and she was very prompt in her replies. She was also very accommodating to our requests with no complaints at all. Please give my heartfelt thanks to Huang Yan. The service staff on ground was of great help too - they were calm and steady throughout the banquet - . i would also like to especially thank Clifford, Rajan, Chi Chuan and May - we cannot be more thankful for their help. Sofia who was stationed at the lounge on 23rd Oct morning was very helpful to us too. Please express our heartfelt thanks to her. Overall, the banquet

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: good services and location
desc: poor in rain shower strength and its temperature control, but apart from that, it was a perfect place to stay - variety of buffet breakfast, location and friedly staff members at club floor. would love to come back on next visit to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic place
desc: Room was in great condition. Staff were friendly and the buffet was amazing. Easily would return. The lifts are fast I noticed. Maybe the pool doesnt get loads of sunshine but that's scraping for something to say wrong!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The place to stay in Singapore
desc: Stayed for 3 nights at the Rendezvous and would highly recommend to anyone visiting. We upgraded to the Club room which included a lovely city view and benefits including the Club Lounge. Very good location, close the the MRT and walking distance to most of the main attractions. The hotel is spotlessly clean and the staff are very friendly. We also used the gym and spent time in the Swimming pool and outdoor Jacuzzi which was lovely after a day sightseeing. The complimentary 'handy phone' with internet was a life saver and meant I could use Google maps without worrying about getting wifi in restaurants and bars. Can't recommend this hotel enough. Thankyou for a wonderful stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: No soap
desc: so I went to the hotel and I thought they had soap but they didn't had soap. Also I've been bullied countless times by staff and gamers( i'm a skater and photographer). I have been to a lot of hotels eh but I haven't seen one without soap. Soap is the essentials of life. Help. Help. I'm skater. (*dab*).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: The hotel is in a convenient location and has spacious rooms with comfortable beds. The Club rooms are good value. The staff is mostly friendly and helpful. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to both business and leisure traveller.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A very welcoming hotel
desc: Our journey to New Zealand from the UK to see our daughter seemed just a little daunting to do in one flight or seem less flight sequence so we decided that a two night stopover in Singapore would make things more comfortable. This hotel was recommended by our travel agent at STA. We weren't disappointed in any way. While not the last word in sumptuous the accommodation offers great value, meal options and above all the warmest of welcomes. We arrived at 5.30am when normal check in is at 2pm yet still we were found a lovely room where we could immediately relax after our 13hr flight. Thank you all at this lovely hotel!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: HIghly Recommended
desc: Excellent location close to MRT practically on your door step. Staff extremely welcoming and friendly and the café/ restaurant was also good with lots of variety of foods at breakfast. We would definitely stay there again and enjoyed our week in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service
desc: Excellent hospitality, I definitely would come back.toilet is very sophisticated. Room is very quiet. Staff in club lounge are excellent and friendly especially Sofia. Alwsys smiling and welcoming. Wilp definitetly make this hotel our first choice

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 2 night business stay
desc: 2 nights for business. Easy access from the airport on the metro. Also used the metro to go to the office. Easy check in. Room clean and comfortable. Good breakfast choice. Staff helpful. Would definitely recommend

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Impressive Hotel
desc: Rendezvous on the outside looks really rustic, but in the interior, I was taken aback by the contrast with the exterior. The room is not the most spacious but it was good enough and what takes rendezvous a notch up the other hotels is the location. The location is extremely convenient and with many shopping malls just a walk away it was heaven. The only thing that I would have liked better would be their buffet breakfast, the spread wasn't as wide as I'd like it, but since I'd rather travel to find breakfast outside of the hotel it did not matter much to me.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good times
desc: Just spent a week staying at the rendezvous hotel near Raffles hotel and the city centre. Second time there so they must have done something right the first time. They continued to do so this time. Well located and within walking distance (if you are slightly fit) to Little India, Clarke quay, Chinatown, Orchard road Museum and Art gallery are very close. Highlight for me was the exceptional service in the executive lounge. So you pay a bit more so what?high commendation to Sofia , Daniel and Farah for efficiency and friendliness. I highly recommend this place even though there are cheaper places.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent!
desc: The Rendezvous Hotel is located right in the center of a museum neighborhood, between the Singapore Art Museum and the National Museum of Singapore to be exact. Since luxury and art have always attracted one another, it is no surprise that the Rendezvous Hotel has become a bridge between international guests and the Singaporean culture, art, and national heritage. Each room was meticulously arranged in one of three art styles: Retro, Performing Art or Peranakan. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and club guests have full access to a free buffet-style breakfast at the Stratis Cafe restaurant, a swimming pool. Rendezvous Hotel Singapore is definitely one of my favorites. Luxury, minimalism, attention to detail, ideal location, but especially the love and passion for art are

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel for a staycation
desc: nice hotel, some improvement needed. The shower head was leaking, the rain shower was not working. Delighted with a small gesture from the hotel, a birthday cake was sent to my wife. Wanted to try the swimming pool but it was raining.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay in Singapore
desc: Rendezvous Hotel is central to most tourist attractions and is just next to Bencoolin subway station so there is easy access to the airport, Chinatown, Bay Gardens and Marina Bay. The hotel is very clean, and the staff are very friendly, helpful, and efficient. The room was very clean and quite roomy and had a great air conditioning system as it was very humid outside. Breakfast had a lot of Asian choices that I wouldn’t normally eat in the morning, but there wS toast, & cereAl & fruit as well.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A stay following a cruise
desc: This hotel is in an excellent position. Very near Orchard Road and Raffles. There is a bus stop outside for the open top bus. The reception staff were excellent. The rooms were very good and it had a nice swimming pool. I would definitely recommend this hotel. The only comment I can make is the pavement outide the hotel which is marked in yellow tape but I did trip over it and had to have 7 stitches in y head. Fortunately there was a clinic nearby.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 1 week stay at Rendez vous
desc: Hotel is well situated, staff is excellent and a pleasure to work any questions or requests. The hotel needs a rénovation, the carpets are old and stained. There are a couple of holes in the curtains and the towel rack is coming off the wall. There is one coffee machine for the buffet breakfast and most of the time there is a problem. Supposedly, there is someone that will make an omelette for you, but that person is typically not there. in terms of the staff, I would give 10 stars out of 5, but the hotel needs a little investment on the part of the owners.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday and Wedding Anniversary Celebration
desc: We enjoyed our time at Rendezvous Hotel during a weekend. We were upgraded to a club room, paid to upgrade to a Junior Suite. It was a great deal! The room and club lounge was great! The club lounge staff demonstrated a very high level of customer service and often went the extra mile to assist us. Every staff we encountered was helpful and knowledgeable. We recommend this hotel to everyone and we will be back real soon!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay!
desc: Strategic location within walking distance to almost anywhere to find foods, drinks, shopping, everything! Even to take MRT was just right in front of lobby hotel. Close to Bugis, Little India, Orchard, because it's in the city centre.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Good location and easy to get around from the Hotel. MRT stations nearby. This is excellent selling point.Good quality and choices of food.Pay a little more attention to toiletries and clealiness of towel and bed sheet.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very Good.
desc: Came here to stay on my wedding weekend. The room amenities were so good - I still can't get over the view I get over the tub and how tall and comfortable my bed was! Such a rewarding stay, especially after a hectic occasion. LOVE it!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staying at Rendezvous Singapore
desc: I have stayed at Rendezvous Singapore for 3 nights in Nov 2018. Hotel has good location which is near 3 MRT stations, bus stop is also at hotel doorstep. Room is clean and compact. There is a 7-eleven inside the hotel too. Breakfast is good enough. Check in and check out is smooth. Overall, I would recommend this hotel to the others, either for biz or leisure purpose.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient and cofortable
desc: I stayed for several days on a business trip that also included attending a wedding nearby. The Location is outstanding, very convenient to many important sites in Singapore. also plenty of good restaurants nearby. I enjoyed my stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic customer service
desc: I had a conference at the Rendezvous Hotel and stayed there for 3 nights. The hotel room is a bit small for the price but the design, level of comfort, and extra amenities (e.g., loved their version of the modern bidet) all make up for the size challenge. It's centrally located so malls and MRT stations are just a few minutes walk away. There's a 7/11 and several fast food chains within hotel premises as well, making it really convenient for the guest to get last minute meals or whatever. My favorite part of the hotel, though, is the customer service, especially as experienced during our conference. Attendants are always on hand to make your latte or cappuccino, turn up or down the A/C temperature, etc. On the first day, a conference participant asked for nuts so on our 2nd

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awsome Experience
desc: Awesome hotel at a convenient location, great pricing, Neat, tidy rooms, prompt service , friendly and co-operative staff, good breakfast buffet , laundry service is really fast overall great experience!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Late check in time not acceptable
desc: We arrived at 4pm after a long flight. Upon check in advised that only one of the rooms was available and the other would not be available until 8pm, they offered to provide another room but would not be interconnecting. We booked this hotel as we wanted a family room. We took the room that was ready and then went back at 7:45 to see if our room was ready to be advised that they hadn’t even started cleaning and the earliest it would be ready was 9pm. Reception could not understand why we found this unacceptable and just kept telling us previously occupants didn’t check out until 6. If you are unable to provide a room do not book it out. Eventually they gave us a suite to use and prioritized to clean our room which was eventually ready at 9pm. Would not stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore experience
desc: With next visit to Singapore most likely I will stay again in this Hotel. Great location,great service, very friendly staff, nice atmosphere .All our questions very professionaly answered . Wifi and aircondition systems operating very well 😃

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cost performance is good
desc: The location and the price of the hotel are good. There are Hawkers and shopping centers in the vicinity and it is convenient. It is possible to walk to the National Museum.I do not eat breakfast, but there is a dining room in front of the hotel from the morning.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, excellent to stay
desc: The staff at receptionist were all friendly. A special mention to Nur who arrange a birthday surprise for me it was a lovely gesture I appreciated it. There is a iPad in your room free to look up trips, food, directions a great idea. We booked the gardens by the bay bus and ticket unfortunately it was only one way had to make our own way back no indications on the iPad to say single when booking. Train station outside hotel to go to Chinatown and harbour front a single trip $3.30 for two adults. Easy walking to the movie theatre, shopping centres and restaurants. Breakfast in the cafe was good, but the staff could be friendly and helpful. Room was good. The library bar downstairs in the foyer was good the barman was friendly. Arrange for a late checkout, book a taxi back

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Simply amazing
desc: Located right in the city with 3 train stations (DT, circle, north east) nearby, traveling from one end of the line takes only few minutes. Room is spacious, there is a ledge(luggage area) besides wardrobe to stow the luggage which is very useful. Amenities provided from ironing board, bathrobe, coffee tea making facilities are perfect. I like the central remote control which gives the ability to adjust basic settings from lightning to air-conditioning, entrance light, table and bed lamp, standing lamp, wardrobe light, clock with alarm and privacy control...everything with this little console, nice!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Had a great stay
desc: We spent three days and two nights as a stopover on our way to Thailand for a conference. The room was fantastic and the service great - we opted to upgrade to the "club" for an extra S$50 per night which included access to the lounge and a host of other features like the sightseeing bus etc. Well worth it.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and peace of mind living for better work concentration.
desc: I have really enjoyed my stay in Rendezvous Hotel. Its near to public transport as well as city point. so reaching to any place in Singapore is really possible with staying at this place. The Breakfast is also quite good to get all options.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient area
desc: Close to food areas. Room is clean, spacious and comfy, hotel slippers is good as well. Iron is provided as it's seldom seen. Friendly hotel staffs who helped us with a luggage. Overall is good base on the service, cleanliness and location :)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not quite good enough
desc: Cramped room, very dodgy shower (either too hot or too cold and jumping sometimes without provocation from one to the other), inadequate amenities and a mediocre breakfast spread. Only the location commends this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Unforgettable
desc: This is an amazing place. The staff are the stars of the place. Just to mention two: Sofia and Farah. They are simply top class. Professional, kind and so helpful. I really enjoyed my stay there and can’t complain about anything. Great location, great room, great breakfast and had a late check out at 4pm. I’m happy.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service and well located
desc: Good centralized location with places for food and drinks walking distance from hotel. Staff were helpful and friendly. Decently quiet rooms.But room needed some maintenance done as bathroom glass door was rusty and almost coming apart, which could lead to serious safety issues if it were to fall apart and ended up shattering the glass door.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel of choice in Singapore
desc: The differences: directly next to SMRT station and lifts from platform to street level makes it a $2.40 trip to / from airport, close to orchard road but not in shopping district. Club class great value. Have always provided late checkout, club food and service lead by Farah, first class. Cocktails 6 to 8 inclusive of cocktails and canapes. Rooms extremely comfortable, with free mini bar. Can provide complementary get on /off bus tour. Always hotel of choice in Singapore and once you try it, it will be yours and as stated go club it is definitely worth it.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, central location
desc: A great hotel located just at the top of Orchard Road. Easy walking distance to three train stations and bus stops right outside the door. A 15 min walk to the heart of Orchard Road. The hotel room was clean with super comfortable beds and pillows. The pool and spa area was relaxing and the gym was well equipped. The library bar was quaint and relaxing. The staff were super friendly. Would definitely recommend staying here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Far East Experience
desc: We had a 2 day conference for SALAS 2018 and I must say that the hotel truly lives up to its name. We had about 170 people a day for both days and all our guests were very satisfied with how the conference turned out.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Comfy beds and pillows. Pleasant hotel with a nice pool area too. We stayed for one night and the room was nice. Bathroom was a little dated but was clean and shower was powerful. Staff seemed happy and helpful. Handy to have a 7/11 right by the hotel too and good location for the mrt.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 3 night Stay
desc: Very good experience and close to two subway stations which suited us. We did not use any in house services such as the pool but we have used them before and they were fine. We also had a early check in as the room was available which was great as we had arrived early in the morning from India.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Same, excellent service - raised the game
desc: I have stayed at the Rendezvous in Singapore for each of the last 5 years at this time. The service is always excellent and I recommend booking a Club floor room providing access to the excellent club room which offers a quiet, complimentary breakfast (served by the lovely and helpful Sofia) to drinks in the evening (6-8) with nibbles, as well as a quiet place to work other than your room. Daniel, the steward on the Club floor also deserves a mention - arranged a late check-out for me. Excellent accommodation. Not a fan of the Straits Cafe but plenty restaurants nearby that are quite excellent including Red House and True Blue. Also close to the excellent MRT Bras Barth or Douby Ghaut Stations a system that whisky you anywhere to pence. Like the Majestic in KL it is a hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First time in Sin
desc: Our first time in Sin, was recommended to stay at Rendezvous because it's close to everything such as food, MRT, bus line pick up. We learned how to take the MRT, it was very convienience and a frugal way to travel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel
desc: Hotel was nice. The location was very great as well. The main issue for me was the cleanliness of the utensils in the room and the other amenities.
