There was a steam iron provided in the room but it wasn’t clean and it seemed like it burned something before.There was no prayer mat in the room for Muslim guests. Some of the towels were torn and seemed to be worn out. The gym equipment were old and some of the equipment were out of order or needed some maintenance. I couldn’t help but notice that some of the equipment were covered in rust.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hit and miss
desc: Some aspects of this hotel are excellent. It's well-located, near restaurants, museums, not far from shopping, etc. The rooms are good sized and comfortable. The AC and WiFi work well and are reliable. Some aspects of the place are pretty problematic. The breakfast is a zoo. It's so crowded, the coffee is terrible, it can be difficult to get a seat, the food is okay but not great. The fitness room also leaves a lot to be desired. There are two bikes, one elliptical machine, two treadmills, and some weights. I only use ellipticals and bikes and so can only speak to those machines. They are in pretty bad shape -- very rickety and not well balanced. After 5 minutes on the elliptical, I switched to the bike because the machine was so unstable.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding lunch
desc: Just had our wedding lunch at Rendezvous Hotel, and had a two night stay there. The room is super cozy with all the basic essentials well met! The staffs are professional in handling situations during lunch. Check-in is a smooth fuss free process. The hotel is conveniently located just beside Bencoolen Mrt. The room is also beautifully decorated for us. Special thanks to our lovely coorindator, Ms Huang Yan, who have assisted in our planning for the big day!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: it is good
desc: overall experience is good, 1) hope the hotel can provide Facility or place to allow customer to make their wet clothes dry. 2) wifi speed is unstable, 3) there should be a plastic cover in bath room in case of the wet slip.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: The staff members were very friendly. The location was great close shopping centres, restaurants and pubs, train station. The cleanliness was good. It is worthy to get the club room experience (food, drinks, snacks. I celebrate my wedding anniversary and they gave us a very nice cake....I will definitively comeback again...Thanks guys

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: very nice
desc: we are a family and we get two comunicating rooms.the two rooms were large enough and well equipped. the beds were confortable and the room very cleanStaff was very friendly and helpful.The location is very convinient very close to bus stop ant metro line.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, friendly staff but a bit shabby
desc: Towels have seen better days, very threadbare and room service could take you literally hours to contact ... if this doesn’t bother you then the location is good. Oh and The water pressure here will propel you across the bathroom

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Outing at Orchard
desc: I give a 4 star thumb up to this hotel.Keep up with the service standard.The table located just next to the bed is abit of hazard to guest sleeping on the next to it.Both the side doors (toward 7-11 & Taxi stand) needs attentions (rough handle).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great
desc: Great location. Prompt housekeeping service. Clean room and washroom. Easy door opening access. Comfortable room size. Would have been great if there is a bidet for washroom. Overall it was a great experience.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Sandra Ong Yen Ling
desc: Awesome front desk service (staff - KIKI) and Dorlyn or Doreen (not sure the spelling of her name)was greeted with pleasant smile and approachable staff.highly recommended to friends to stay at this hotel! will be back again!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good and prompt services by the staff
desc: We arrived early around 12 and was asking whether can we check in earlier. Was later told room is available and we have been upgraded to a Deluxe room! Thanks for the upgrade! Check in was fast too! IF not mistaken, the front desk who attended to us was Miki on 24/12/18.As for parking, we requested later part and was given the free parking ticket and this was also done very swiftly. Well done for the good services

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: great location
desc: We were recommended to this hotel and were very happy with the experience.The location was great close to mass transit stations.I would recommend the club room as we arrived at 0630 and were able to access for breakfast and also the drinks at 1800.One tourist attraction nearby is the Battle Box which you can walk across the road t and is well worth the visit

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant hotel
desc: Pleasant hotel at a central location. Friendly and professional staff. Well equiped rooms. At arrival staff offered spontaneously a late check out as we would be leaving late. Good value for price. Would stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Christmas @ Rendezvous
desc: I checked into Rendezvous Hotel on December 14th with the intention of celebrating in this cosy hotel. Though I was told this hotel is classified as four star; I find that it functioned like a five star hotel. The bath area was equipped with taps that are very spar-like with rain shower. I must say I enjoyed every shower. Even the toilet bowl is equipped with a heater and gadgets for cleansing, which I have not seen in even a five star hotel. The entire staff from rank and file to the top management always greet me with their winsome smile, which makes my day. I want to specially commend on Sofia who always take care of my breakfast to the minutest detail. On her 'off' days she post me beautiful notes and videos which I enjoyed. I treasured her posting of Mother Teresar's

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Like coming home - every time
desc: Just had another fantastic stay at the Rendezvous for two nights in a Junior Suite with full Club benefits. We stay here because It feels great to be so warmly welcomed back each time. Having access to the Club provides a very attentive level of service which makes for a special experience. It was so nice to see our friend Sophia who is one of the fantastic Club staff. When she saw us she was quick to give us hugs and kisses. I've never experienced anything like this in any other hotel. It's so nice to enjoy this type of warm and genuine welcome. The Rendezvous is well located which makes for easy access to almost any part of Singapore. The MRT is prevalent with stations for the Circle and Downtown lines right beside the hotel and the Dhoby Ghaut MRT station is a five

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and service
desc: The location was close to the subway making travel around Singapore so easy. Rooms were lovely, roomy and quiet. Friendly staff helped us find our way around. Would come and stay again if we're ever back in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: HOW IS THIS PLACE SO HIGHLY RATED!?
desc: Terrible hotel, but 2 stars for the location and friendly staff. The first room I was in was dirty, the manager quickly relocated me. It was better, but still room for extreme improvement. There were stains everywhere from the carpet to the couch. Fixtures were dated and in serious need of updating/maintenance. The restroom showed signs of mold. There were signs of water intrusion from the air conditioning area. Was just disappointing, especially for the price point.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Mr
desc: The hotel provided services to meet international visitors. Hotel rooms are excellent and spacious enough to cater for two individuals. It is safe and closer to shopping malls, railway stations and taxi stops.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean hotel-good staff
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights and had good experience. Buffet was super, hotel's interiors are decent, rooms are neat and good. there is store in the Hotel area where you can buy food or other stuff. it's road side and bus stop is just outside so it further helps. Worth the money charged.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stay but Perfect!
desc: A very nice location of the hotel close to the shopping district of Singapore ,the Orchard road, the hotel was a great stay. All the rooms in the hotel are non-smoking rooms and that help in keeping the rooms look more fresh. A well laid out room and the handy phone being one of the best offerings of the hotel. The hotel coffee shop has a nice spread of the asian cuisine which give a great touch of the cuisine along with the culture of Singapore.I was at the hotel for a very short time but overall my experience was very good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Very short stay, the room at the 8th floor was big, clean and the bed very comfortable. Shower was perfect in the morning and the room was very quite. The room has a desk and spacious wardrobe. The water in the swimming pool is very clean. The staff is welcoming, friendly and helpful. The hotel is located in the city center next to the subway, the location is very handy and convenient. Very nice stay. I had a beautiful experience.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: SINGAPORE EXPERIENCE
desc: Hotel is good, location fantastic, management of guests could be better. Asking credit card details for any unforeseen expenses and thereby charged to the account without any real expense is little too much. Reputed hotels worldwide don't do this.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Return? - but of course
desc: Great hotel! Our suite was well-situated, ultra clean, quiet and had all the things we needed. A bed to die for after a long day of sightseeing. Was particularly thankful that I could get a take-away breakfast from the 11th club lounge for my sleepy friend. All staff very helpful, the car from and to the airport on time and very courteous drivers. Love it, Would love to come back some day. Thanks folks!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very enjoyable stay
desc: Centrally located, close to all the places I wanted to visit. Efficient and friendly staff. Amenities and services excellent. Fully intend to book hotel again for my next trip to Singapore. Family friendly.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Just a convenient place to be
desc: Rendezvous use to be one of the finest hotel but now everything has changed. From the soft and clean towels to towels that’s is as hard and rough as the sand paper. The only thing that hasnt changed over the period of time is the rate.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great
desc: I just had a fantastic 5-day stay in this hotel. Clean, pleasant and quiet room (admittedly, it did not face the roads). Extremely comfortable bed. 24-hour gym (although basic). It also had a swimming pool (I did not checked). Good breakfast and fantastic location (in front of SMU and walking distance from the main places downtown). Free shuttle from the airport and inexpensive public transportation options to return to the airport (from the same gate of the hotel). Quite friendly stuff too. I returned to the hotel one night by taxi and the driver only allowed cash (which I did not have). Someone from the hotel just paid the driver and it was simply charged to my room (I paired with my credit card when I checked out). The hotel also has some pieces of art (mostly paintings)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding Lunch Banquet + Hotel Stay
desc: I am glad to choose Rendezvous Hotel for my life's most important moment. My guests are full of praise for the food and hospitality. The hotel and the team is the epitome of customer service! Yan, the salesperson has been very helpful in planning for the banquet. Her timely response to my millions of questions with a < T+1 turn around is amazing! She even took the effort to be around in our wedding to make sure things are in order! May, the banquet manager gave me the confidence right from the day I did my AV testing! Very friendly and experienced. On actual day, we only need to just follow her instructions and enjoy the banquet. Her experience is even more useful for an anxious couple like us. Our brothers & sisters also like working with her. Last but not least, the team at

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of best stay i had! 👍
desc: The location is centralize and walking distance to shopping malls. Service is great! Room is spacious and so comfy! Easy access to two MRT station.. Will definitely come back again for staycation 👍👍👍

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fab Hotel @Sin
desc: Nice Hotel with the great loc. easy to access...With the warm hospitality, we can stay feels like home. The best hotel in Singapore (so far as I know till today).Price is comparable with what we get.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Thankyou!
desc: My husband and I were checked into the Rendezvous Hotel by a lovely gentleman. The room was large and very comfortable. Only 30 minutes later I needed to be rushed to hospital in agonising pain with a kidney stone. The gentleman that booked us in was wonderful. We didn't get to thank him personally so I hope he reads this. THANKYOU. Wonderful hotel and amazing staff.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Review
desc: TV channels are limited. Very few Chinese programs especially there is no TVB channels available. The kettle button is not working when water is boiling.. It did not turn off immediately. It has to be turned off manually.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: We made the right choice for our wedding :)
desc: My husband and I stayed a night at the Heritage Suite (as part of our wedding package). Service was impeccable thruout, from the wedding coordination, banquet, to room service and concierge. And of course the suite was cleaned to a tee, furnishing & décor warm and homely, everything you need in the 2-room suite (living space + bedroom + 2 toilets w/ standing shower & bathtub). One thing to note is that the bed was "too high" for me to hop on - perhaps at 1.63m, I wasn't exactly built for such beds, hahaha. I needed some help from the husband to get on the bed :P

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service.
desc: I stay 2 nights for holidays. Good location can walk to shopping at the orchard road. MRT Station near hotel. The room was clean. Feel like home. Miss Ning Diana at the front was nice service. She gave me upgrade room and early check in. Very helpful. Thank you for best service. I recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A most wonderful and memorable stay
desc: Wonderful memories at Hotel Rendezvous Singapore! A big shoutout and many thanks to outstanding Nor'Azali, Rozly, Sam and team at the Concierge Desk, Hannah and Farah at the Club, Nur at the Front Desk for the warm welcome and terrific hospitality. Looking forward to our next trip!!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent customer service and staff
desc: Great location near Dhoby Ghaut MRT station. Colonial style building but with modern facilities and good wifi. Excellent customer service and staff evidenced by allowing us to have a 4 hour extension to the check out time because of illness.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Great location and very friendly staff. WiFi signal is strong and room is spacious for two pax. The bed is really comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay here. Opt for the city view. Also opt for higher floor to avoid any traffic noises near the main road. Hotel is also situated in the arts and heritage district and ideal for arts lovers.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Accomodation comforter
desc: Spent three nights at the Rendezvous hotel Singapore for a regular visit to this clean and green city. The location is convenient to restaurants and local food outlets. The Bencoolen MRT station is nearby to link up the metro transportation with other tourist spots like Chinatown and popular Orchard Road. Room is reasonably comfortable in size and cleanliness. Staff of housekeeping, front desks, reception are courteous and efficient.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay & location !
desc: Stayed here in early Dec for 5 nights and had a pleasant enough stay as hotel was comfy and adequate for its purpose. Hotel is located very centrally with easy-links to 3 different MRT lines (all within 10 mins walking sphere with the closest just 2-3 mins walk away), which is a major plus!. Close and walkable to Bugis St, which is great. Being a 4-star hotel, it appears that the rooms have done its years and is a bit dated, compared to similar hotels in its price range. Although rooms appears dated, beds are fairly comfy and generally our non-smoking room were clean. Pool is a bit dismal and small and cold as it is a small outdoor pool, would have been nicer if pool was heated in early morning or late evening.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous in Singapore
desc: Reasonably priced and had everything we needed. Close to trains. Yummy breakfast! D on't bother with their Hop-on/Hop-off bus offer included in the 49.00 upgrade. Trains were more direct and efficient

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice location
desc: I enjoyed that the hotel was walking distance to many malls and easy access to public transport. My room was reasonably clean but the chair by the desk looked dirty and the carpets did not appear to be very clean. I did not go anywhere the chair as a result. I upgraded my room to deluxe plus but wasnt really sure if it was worth it as the rooms are quite small in size.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Club Rendezvous for 2 nights was outstanind
desc: Stayed on the 11th floor of this perfectly located hotel for two nights on our way to NZ. The room was a great size and had a Handy mobile phone which could be used outside the hotel as a GPS amongst other things. Made working our way around Singapore so easy. Superb WiFi on it too. Calls back to the UK were free as well. The bed in the room was the most comfortable ever. The room was very clean and well maintained. Staff were so helpful - they take service to another level we do not see in the UK and are just so friendly. Would recommend this hotel club room any time and would go back if ever we are in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: exellent
desc: excellent room and services, quite and clean environtment, great location as well in orchard road and near with MRT station and food republic food court. i love it and looking forward to stay there soon

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Free mini bar with deluxe rooms
desc: Deluxe rooms include free minibar, which was refilled daily, also check out until 4.00 pm. Hotel was very close to the metro station, just a few steps to go afterwards. Breakfast was OK with a big enough selection, even hot food ligh spring rolls and some Indian dishes have been there every morning. Staff was friendly and helpful. Hotel was clean enough, but the shower had some handle falling off during our visit. We also had a blackout in our floor, which was handled fast enough. All in all good stay would be back if I had to go to Singapore again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Rendezvous Hotel from the 11 Dec to 14 Dec. We stayed here at the start of our time in Singapore and had busy days planned so we knew we would not be in the room much. We booked a deluxe room and overall it was good nothing spectacular. The room was ok in size but the bed was a bit hard. The service was great and the hotel is located very close to orchard rd and is also close to Dhoby Ghaut station which is one of the main stations in Singapore. I would recommend this to people who are after a nice clean hotel somewhere to put there heads down for the night.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Yearly staycation for the family (3rdyear)
desc: Nice cozy and friendly staffs We were well served by the club facility staffs (Sofia and Daniel) Well deserved vacation with family Was given a slice of cake for my birthday but was missing the nice birthday deco (previously)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Unbeatable location for the price
desc: It’s my second stay here and I enjoyed it more than the first time. Previously I didn’t realize how well the Rendezvous hotel situated until I tried other ones that are newer, have bigger room, and are better equipped. By then I understood that those add-one are not very useful when location is less favorable. To me, it felt like every train/bus leads to Rendezvous.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not the best rendezvous stay
desc: The hotel is fair and the staff are friendly. The air conditioning is very cold for the entire Hotel. Due to the Hotel License only able to keep their bar open to 10pm so if you come back from eating and want to relax with your colleague to have a drink and a chat, no can do sadly. The breakfast is ok, but not fantastic. I had to have a luke warm shower in the evening late which was a major surprise. Possibly all the hot water used up with the Hotel aircon being so cold.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Average for business trips
desc: I found that the hotel is not a good value for money! It is from the main attractions. Expect 20 usd for reaching the gardens and marina by taxi. The breakfast is very good. Rooms are basic and small. I didn’t find the employees friendly and welcoming! Maybe it is a different culture?!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cannot be beat for location
desc: I recently stayd in the hotel during a conference at SMU. Its location is fantastic - walking distance from Raffles shopping centre and the SMU campus and adjacent to two metro stations. The hotel itself has everything you might need as a business visitor. I especially recommend the excellent breakfast. I was very impressed when the hotel not only kept my luggage for me on the last day after check-out, but offered a facility for us to freshen up before our evening flight. Truly excellent service!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel
desc: We spent three nights at the hotel and had a great time. We were on the 10th floor overlooking the pool so the view was not very good but in Singapore there are so many fantastic views. The room was clean and tidy with everything you could want in there. The staff were always polite helpful and courteous. The pool is always in the shade but this is a good way to get out of the sun. The location is close to everything we wanted to see and the MRT is next to the hotel. We enquired about having breakfast but this was very expensive especially as there are several other places to eat nearby. Overall a good quality hotel and would recommend to anyone.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb service iand excellent location
desc: We held a workshop for about 40 people in the conference facility of the hotel. The hotel staff and the conference support staff were most helpful, genuinely friendly and attentive to special requests. The hotel is located in a great location with easy access to both Orchard Road, the city center and Bugis. Rooms are small but very comfortable.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good choice
desc: A large 11 storey building in a great location for exploring. Recommend Club status . That said it’s the most basic Club lounge offering we’ve experienced anywhere. Alcohol only between 6pm and 8pm and even then very narrow choice. Snacks also only available in that time slot . Bedrooms are comfortable. Yes need an upgrade but are acceptable as room rates not stupid like they are around the city . Breakfast room very dowdy in appearance and deffo needs a face lift but the offering was all good with no complaints. Bottom line is Yes I would stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Sevice
desc: My first trip to Singapore and stayed here for 3 nights and must say found the staff so helpful, from check in to check out.and all the way through Really good personalised advice on places to see , directions eating options and transport. Clean well appointed rooms and convenient location

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good choice of hotel in city
desc: A very pleasant stay during my short business trip. Simple and clean room with nice hospitality services. Close to MRTs stations and big shopping mall. One of the very good choices of accommodation in centre of SG.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A cozy hotel with an amicable and home-like atmosphere
desc: It was an amazing stay with Rendezvous Hotel for 2 weeks. The staff is really helpful and friendly; special thanks to Daniel, Sophia & Farah. I stayed in a well equipped Club room which has luxurious added benefits of evening Cocktail with Snacks, free laundry, a City tour and many more. The scrumptious cocktails prepared by the staff in the evening and a personal attention to all the guests makes it a marvelous Stay. The hotel is centrally located right next to bus stop and Bencoolen MRT. There are various eating options nearby with some great multi cuisine restaurants in the Hotel premises. The breakfast has a variety of options and house keeping is well maintained. I would definitely like to stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience
desc: I had a very pleasant stay at Rendezvous Hotel for business trip purpose. It really helps a lot for commuting since the hotel located within 3 MRT stations and a bus station which was a very short walking distance between each of the station. I would definitely come back even for personal trip.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: PERFECT STAY
desc: Right across Art School, location wise, a grocery shop at ground floor, 'halal' certified restaurant, cleanliness of the room, high speed wifi, friendliness & warm hospitality of the staff is making you feel so welcomed. Wonderful stay, I recommend everyone to choose this hotel on their visit to Singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stay Business Trip
desc: Good stay for business, the nearby mall is Plaza Singapore around 700-800 meters. Due to the short trip I didn't use the swimming pool and gym, but look like the swimming pool good quality. Hopefully the staff more warmer and nicer. Pls add 1 staff for the taxi stand.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: enjoyed my stay here
desc: hotel was very clean (rooms, lobby, dining area). my friends and i all had a very enjoyable stay there even though it was only for one night. staff and service were also very good, overall a very enjoyable stay. would highly recommend!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Well Poisitioned Hotel
desc: We chose this hotel for a two day stay before taking a cruise starting from Singapore. We had requested an early check-in as we had travelled for over 14 hours overnight and knew we would be tired. Our room was ready upon arrrival and the staff were most pleasant when checking us in. We found the room more than adequate for our stay and very well placed for accessing restaurants and more. Because of our short stay we were not able to explore as much as we would have liked but did find a variety of restaurants and fast food places nearby. We did have one meal at the restaurant simply because we were too tired to venture out. It was adequate, somewhat overpriced but there were others nearby. A sign right outside the entrance showed a Hop on Hop Off stop. However, the stop

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great welcome, fantastic location and wonderful staff
desc: My recent stay for a week was my fourth or fifth time at the Rendezvous and, as always, I find the hotel a great base (in my case for business). I stayed in one of the Club rooms; they are large, well equipped and well maintained. All staff at the Rendezvous are friendly but I would especially like to thank Sofia and her team at the Club for their attention throughout my stay. The hotel is well located with a couple of metro lines within a few minutes walk, providing easy access by metro to much of the island. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended Hotel
desc: Hotel located at city area, easy to get public transport and restaurant. Staff are friendly and helpful. Service provided meet our requirement and the price is affordable. Environment of the hotel is clean and in good quality.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 2 night stay
desc: Centrally located , medium size clean rooms , fairly quiet, great breakfast with excellent variety. Free Wi Fi of course, which is important these days. Very courteous staff. Highly recommend this mid range hotel .

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Super friendly and accommodating staff - nice location at a great price.
desc: Stayed here for just one night - extended stopover. Staff were super-friendly (especially Diana at reception). Rooms very clean and spacious. Hotel centrally located and great for shopping/exploring. Late checkout and use of facilities appreciated. Wonderful breakfast / restaurant downstairs as well as convenience store nearby.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good room good food friendly staff
desc: We got free upgrade because we wait to long due to some reservation problem..,The hotel let us enter our room eventhouh the reservation problem still not solved..,The staff is very helpfull during check in process and during our stay..,Awesome..,

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wouldn't stay anywhere else!
desc: Just returned from a weekend "getaway" to Singapore, and the Rendezvous Hotel is always my first choice when visiting the Lion City. The location is great and there is a subway station(Bencoolen & Dhoby Gaut to Orchard is a short walk as well) directly outside of the hotel. We only had to change trains once from the airport to the hotel! Super easy! Check in was smooth as usual and the staff suggested a room upgrade to a junior suite when we arrived for just a little more, and we were very pleased we took it. The room was very spacious and comfortable. The beds are always extremely comfy every time we've stayed at the hotel, and this trip was no exception. The suite was stylish decorated (the whole hotel really) and so many little touches for that added little bit of comfort.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great accomodation
desc: Hotel was clean comfy and affordable.Fast and efficient check in.Staff at the Level 11 were helpful and polite.Swimming at night was peaceful and a breeze and pool was clean.Breakfast selection was good too.Overall it was great

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect! Clean and comfortable
desc: Stayed here for 5 days and I will be staying here again. Great room, comfy bed, very clean and staff were helpful. Location is amazing with Bencoolen, Brah Basah and Doby Ghaut MRTs at your doorstep. There is a food republic and 7Eleven super close by. It was wonderful staying here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location,average hotel
desc: Hotel is in good location but needs some work to bring hotel up to good standard .The staff were helpful and provided good service during our stay ,really the state of our rooms was what let down this hotel .Some renovations are needed to improve the quantity of the rooms .Not bad place to stay but i think better value around area.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel and good location
desc: This is second time i stay at Rendezvous Hotel...Very nice location..friendly staff..for food..yoi should try..i love every thing about this hotel..around this hotel so easy find restaurant..close to shoppoing place..

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Hotel
desc: The room had a washlet and a weighing scale and the TV channel included NHK, all of which offered me a nice stay at the hotel. The meal at the restaurant had many ethnic food but didn't include Japanese cuisine.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great central hotel
desc: Great hotel in a fantastic location - central to everything - loved the artwork around the hotel. Within walking distance to Raffles Hotel and Suntec mall. Rooms were of a good size and quiet efficient air-conditioning.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, comfortable clean rooms
desc: Love the location - easy walking to Raffles City Hall area, up to Orchard Road or across to Kampon Glam and Haji Lane. Rooms are very clean, a good size and offer all facilities needed. Staff were brilliant from the concierge to reception to housekeeping and restaurant staff, everyone was very helpful and friendly. Great pool for a refreshing dip and a 24 hour gym.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: NICE PLACE TO STAY!
desc: Good location with nearby food court, nice room, very comfy bed! Lots of food choices during breakfast.. will definitely come back to stay again. Easy access to mrt.. can walk to shopping mall. Check in was smooth and fast too!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beyond expectations
desc: This hotel is highly recommended to stay. It is a minute walk from the accessible blue line. Tip for tourists, this line reaches out the many different lines available so its very convenient. There is a 7-11 at the base of the hotel so you can get a quick bite. This hotel is nearby a few malls too. Staff are always more than happy to answer your question if you need tips to go anywhere. Once checked it at the lobby, I was brought to the executive lounge floor to continue my check in process and relax at the lounge while everything is being processed. I can't recall exactly how her name was spelled but if I was not wrong it was Farah who attended to me. She presented herself very well and was efficient in her duties. Friendly smile and answered any questions I had or had

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My stay was a delight!
desc: All was excellent. I particularly the kindness of I believe her name was Sylvia. The room and amenity's are perfect. Wonderful if not excellent transportation services are available, including excellent public transportation. On site and dry access to the public underground trains.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic service provided by the Rendezvous banquet team!
desc: We held our wedding lunch at Rendezvous in Jan 2019. Even prior to confirming our booking ,our sales coordinator Yan has been very patient and prompt in answering our queries. Post booking, Yan was a great help to guide us through the planning process. On the actual day, Rajan(banquet coordinator) and Mei were ever present and gave us the assurance that we could look our best and enjoy ourselves. We were also glad that our guests loved the food and drinks as well! Would highly recommend couples to consider Rendezvous Hotel as their choice location for their wedding banquet!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An enjoyable stay in a lovely hotel
desc: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights, as a stopover on our way home from Brisbane. The hotel was ideally located with easy access to the MRT, though we preferred to walk everywhere as you see so much more. The club room was comfortable, but only had one chair so we asked for another which they provided. The room was clean with quality bedding and towels and complementary mini bar. The only thing I didn’t really like was the control pad for the lights as because it sits in one side of the bed I did not have access to any of the lights. I like to read in bed but unless I wanted to get up and walk around the bed to turn the lights on or off it was difficult. That said, we enjoyed our stay and loved all the artwork throughout the hotel. We tried both the club lounge and the

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location
desc: Close walking distance to many interesting site's as well as transit options - subway and hop on hop off just outside hotel. Subway system in Singapore very easy, frequent and inexpensive way to get around. Hotel provide iPhone for free to use during visit was great to have to avoid roaming charges on my own device.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable hotel in exellent location
desc: Comfortable hotel, spacy room, good bed, exellent wi-fi, good breakfast. Exellent location for a tourist, many sigths witin walking distance, two metro station within 100m and a third within 450m. Friendly staff

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not value for money
desc: The air con duct is very dirty (room 911). During breakfast staff don't respond to your request. Staff cooking with one hand and the other holding handphone. Housekeeping when ask for additional item took very long to deliver and they are not happy. We paid $350/- per night stay for 5 or 6 nights.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Our experience at Rendezvous Hotel singapore
desc: We found the hotel staff to be extremely helpful and kind. Thank you very much Everlynn and colleagues. They helped make our 1st trip to Singapore a great success!The hotel is ideally located close to MRT, so getting around city is easy.Hotel is very comfortable and serves an excellent breakfast. Overall it is good value.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Great hotel close to everything, only downfall was could hear outside noise even in the 10th floor. Breakfast option provided by hotel was expensive so had to look elsewhere, would have been good to have reasonably priced so guests can way at hotel facilities

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel review
desc: Good hotel but the automated light and power system did not work at all well, requiring maintenance staff to assist us.Otherwise a very pleasant stay. Pool was very nice and refreshing. Breakfast was good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Super friendly stay
desc: The hotel is well placed in Bras Basah Rd to access all the main attractions and a short walk to the super efficient rail station. We particularly like closeness to Little India, and Orchard Road. Also to Chinatown and river side eateries are a dream.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, friendly staff, reasonable rates
desc: The hotel is conveniently located near Bugis area. MRT Blue line (which take you to China Town, etc) is located right at the front of the hotel. 10 Mins walk will get you to Plaza Singapura which is where Dhoby Ghaut MRT is located for Orange, Purple, & Red line. Bus stop is also just at the hotel's door steps. There's a 7 eleven downstairs and National Museum of Singapore and SOTA is just less than 5 mins walk away. We upgraded our room to the Deluxe plus which came with breakfast and late check out at 4 pm. We were able to check out at 5 pm which allowed us to freshened up before our evening flight out of SG. The kids enjoyed a little swim at the hotel pool on the last day. There's also a warm Jacuzzi pool to relax after a long day out. Staffs were friendly and helpful. The

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Jan 2019 Family Vacation
desc: There was error when I first book my reservation online and it was fixed within 24 hours without incurring additional cost. Days before my flight I have informed the hotel that I will arrive very late at night and would probably be checking in the hotel very early in the morning 12:00 am. Upon checking in, our room was upgraded thanks to the courteous front desk clerk. Overall, we had a pleasant experience while staying in the hotel and would be going back again in the future.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb staff
desc: The staff and location , make this hotel all the staff here go the extra mile to help, taking you outside to show the way, giving great advice and generally bending over backwards.Accessible hotel in. Great location 5 minutes to MRT which is all wheelchair accessible.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointing Breakfast
desc: The rooms quality was superb. Everything works electronically. Even though most hotel room have master switches, Rendezvous was exceptional. However the Low quality breakfast was a disappointment, satisfactory for kids but not for adults. Besides the insults of having to have my room key to enter the restaurant for breakfast after asking for my room number, it was the first time for me having to provide a room key too at breakfast. I understand the rationale, but you should not have insulted your guest that way. Upon check-in, you should have alert me with the information to avoid feeling insulted. Other than that, my stay is pretty seamless, gym was clean, towels and water were provided. The pool was satisfactory nothing amazing to comment.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb across the board
desc: I’m never one to give praise unless it’s fully deserved. Location superb- right in the middle to access the main areas. MTR sites right outside. Bus stop right outside Rooms- clean modern and spacious Staff- really friendly helpful and professional. Stayed one night prior to flight back to uk and were given a complimentary late checkout which was really appreciated. Food- excellent multinational breakfast buffet. Hot fresh and a real good choice. Plenty of seating and an unobtrusive check system.Basically your room key checks your status. Pool- clean and well appointed. Not huge but it’s not the kind of hotel. Nice just to chill for a short while and cool off. Value for money- in this respect probably the best I have stayed in for many years whilst travelling extensively.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First timers to Rendezvous and very pleasantly surprised
desc: Location superb. Staff welcoming. Probably one of the most comfortable beds I have slept in while travelling, and the AC perfect for a great night's sleep. The rooms have bar fridges, a plus. And the TV was simple to operate, which is not always the case. The only negative for us was the cluttered area outside the formal entrance to the hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, excellent staff, really good location
desc: Can recommend this hotel. Very clean, staff extremely nice, Club lounge facilities great, locatoin really excellent for sight seeing. Only issue they do need to do something about their wifi speed, not really fast enough for business travellers. Otherwise everything was great.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Convenient Hotel
desc: First time here and am very impressed with the suite. Great room facilities, location (within walking distance to Dhoby Ghaut and City Hall) and excellent service staff. They are good at preparing surprises too! Farah was very professional and prompt in assisting any issues faced. No regrets staying here and would recommend it if you need a nice quiet place for a getaway with friendly faces.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: No complaints
desc: Husband and I stayed here for 4 nights on way to Australia. Room looked over the pool. All very clean and in a very convenient position. Not a great selection at breakfast for the UK palate but always worth trying different things. Helpful staff at desk . We enjoyed chilling at the pool. Bus stop right outside hotel. Can recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel with everything close by
desc: Awesome hotel, location is so great. Walk to shops, train station is around the corner from the hotel. Service at the hotel was great as well. They recommended some places around that you can get lunch

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Hotel
desc: Stayed for 3 nights at the end of January. Our travel consultant had booked us a double room but as we arrived early, we were quickly accommodated in a twin room which we were grateful for after a very long journey from Europe. The room was very nice, the staff were helpful and the room cleaned to a very good standard. Location is great and the local transport system makes it easy to get around. The Hop on/Hop off bus stops right outside. There are so many eclectic places to eat locally. Raffles is about a 10 minute walk and just opposite the NCO club which we found quite by accident and worth a visit if you believe in Mermaids! The main shops are not too much further. Would recommend and use again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Courteous and efficient staff!
desc: This is my second visit in 6 months. This hotel just ticks all the right boxes for me. It is centrally located. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Concierge, front desk and cleaning staff are really pleasant. Pool is clean. The hotel does show its age but it is well maintained. Breakfast has enough variety for any palate. Will certainly return.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Singapore
desc: Nice hotel in a good location. Short bus or metro ride from main attractions. Rooms ok as standard goes. Has a pool and gym very minimal. Breakfast limited with only basics. Staff were nice but, not very helpful. Ordered breakfast to go on departure day and it was forgotten! Location is the most positive feedback.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay
desc: I and my friends stayed here for couple nights during our conference in Singapore. The hotel is conveniently located right in front of Bencoolen MRT station and there is a bus stop just in front of the hotel. This is not the most luxurious five star hotel but compared to the price you’ve paid, i think it’s just worth it. Service is good, you get the most comfortable bed and the room is at good size. Everything reached my standard and really can’t fault anything.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly service and good location
desc: Spent five nights at the Rendezvous in a deluxe club room on the 11th floor. The room was quite large with good views and a large, comfortable bathroom with a walk in shower. Having access to the Club lounge, with the very helpful and friendly hostesses, was a plus. The food selection, though limited, changed daily and the beverage on offer included South African red and white wine, spirits and cocktails. Great location for transport, with stations for three of the main lines just a few steps away, make this an ideal place to use as a base to visit the city. Great value for money. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent 3 days stay
desc: Excellent 3 days stay for Business Trip. Breakfast buffet is excellent. Location is convenient, after Bencoolen MRT station was constructed. Can take direct BLUE line to Downtown MRT station with no transfers.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Location
desc: We chose this location because we wanted to be on the hop on hop off bus route as well as other bus routes as buses are such a great way to get around Singapore. We booked Club Rooms for all the benefits. Early and Late Check-in. Club Lounge. Very happy with our choice.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: John & Lesley Holiday
desc: We had an excellent holiday in the Rendezvous Hotel and enjoyed every minute of it. The Staff in general were very friendly, efficient and helpful. Our Club experience was excellent and well worth the additional cost. The Club staff were especially friendly, welcoming, helpful and efficient which made our stay even better. The only negative being that our Club room decoration was a bit dated and tired.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel with two metro stations nearby.
desc: I went to this hotel for short vacation. I picked this hotel because it offer generous late check out time . I had no intention to book club room which I usually do during my other short vacations. Reservation team offer Junior Suit ( for a small fee) because Deluxe Plus don't have Nespresso Coffee Maker (I prefer gourmet coffee without sugar ) . I accept the Junior Suite. When I checked in yesterday, I was impressed with the room, and hotel facilities here. I love the swimming pool there. At night, I went to Food Republic for single Chinese meal and then went back to hotel to have Singapore Sling cocktail at the hotel bar (SGD 13) - The Library. Next day morning, I went for breakfast at Straits cafe, ( standard fare only but no bacon or pork sausage because it was halal

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Weekend in Singapore
desc: Fantastic location but that’s where it ends. The hotel is extremely dated. (Cupboard doors falling off, holes in walls, filthy glass shower screens) We booked a city view club room and were allocated a room next to the service area facing a blank hotel wall. Extremely disappointing though they did finally offer a city view down on level 10 in a much smaller room with 1 night to go! Food in the club lounge for breakfast and afternoon drinks was cold, stale, over cooked or just non existent. When booking make sure you insist on a room facing bras bashi road. Anything else has absolutely no view. The pool gets no sunlight and is FREEZING!!! Even in Singapore humidity!!! The staff are amazing and polite except if you check in after midnight and then they are downright

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel
desc: A very friendly hotel, staff very efficient. Breakfast buffet selection great choice. Near to MRT stations bus stop outside hotel. Great location. We stayed in the club rooms, which were situated on the 11th floor, lounge had a lovely selection of nibbles cocktails spirits and beer in the evening from 6-8, and from 7am to 11pm had fresh fruit soft drinks coffee and teas. Nuts and crisps. Overall we would recommend this hotel, and will return if in Singapore. X

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cozy hotel in the city
desc: I managed to stay only one night at this hotel, which was fine. Check in was smooth and easy. I got my key card and went up to my floor and almost got lost. Here's why. If you are taking the left-est (is that even a word) lift, when you exit the door, you cant really see any signs pointing to your room. So human nature dictates that you turn towards the exit closest to you (I don't really know if its a scientific fact, but lets go with that shall we) So I turned left, and well, the numbers on the doors just did not tally up. So came back to the lift lobby and went via the other exit. I did not discover the sign until I checked out. Basically it was beside the big giant floor number design thing, and if you had come out of the lift on the right, only then would you be able

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent hotel
desc: I stayed at the Deluxe Plus room. Booked two rooms for family. Spacious room with nice bed and toiletries. The staff are nice and friendly. However, I felt the furnishings are a bit dated or old. Breakfast is decent too.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel in ideal central location
desc: Excellent location right beside MRT & bus stop but pleasant & easy walk to most areas too and a lovely park nearby (Fort Canning). Very pleased with the overall experience and all staff very friendly & helpful (except the waitress at the far end of the breakfast restaurant who was always miserable and also put out the 'station closed' sign at 09.55 even though breakfast doesn't finish until 10.30! So we specifically sat near the entrance instead as that waitress was delightful. Sadly we did find the breakfast coffee very bitter. Recommended by Receptionist to upgrade for S$40pn to include breakfast, 1 x 24 hrs bus, higher floor room, wifi & free minibar. Disappointed to find the S$40 was in fact PLUS TAX, as that wasnt mentioned :-( Only other complaint is not enough loungers

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely stay
desc: We have just spent 6 nights here. We opted for the junior suite which was a great size room, extremely comfortable bed and included access to the club lonuge which offers snacks all day and 2 hours drinks package with nibbles of an evening. The staff were wonderful. We arrived at 10am and were able to check straight in and with the suite you get a late checkout which they let us extend from 5pm until 7pm. The hotel has a beautiful aroma that hits you when you walk in the door. The only let down was the breakfast, very average and everything was cold. We went across the road to the food republic for an extremely cheap and tasty breakfast. The position is also very convenient with an MRT outside the front door. I would stay here again if I was to return to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pricey but worth it!
desc: Pricey but worth it for a short leisure or business trip in Singapore. Lovely looking foyer and rooms, very good service and (especially) good food. Excellent location near restaurants and cafes and MRT

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Mixed Emotions
desc: This hotel hovers between a 3 to 4 star, probably a 3.5. Great location and the facade of the building is eye catching. However it is quite dated inside, although the rooms are perfectly adequate. Bathrooms were good (We stayed 2 nights in different rooms). I would avoid the buffet downstairs. At $60 (Sin) a pop it seemed expensive, so we didn't try it. Mind you, there's a 7-11 nearby where you can get a sandwich for a few bucks! Last but not least. Avoid the $40 room upgrade. The mini bar consists of 2 cans of beer and 2 cans of soft drink.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Mrs Dallas Haase
desc: Stayed one night at this hotel. Altho it needs an update it was very comfortable and clean. Staff were so helpful and pleasant. It is so close to lots of restaurants and shops and MRT . Would stay there again .

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb staff made our Singapore break brilliant
desc: The Rendezvous Hotel is perfectly situated in the middle of Singapore, within easy walking distance of the excellent Museum and Fort Canning, and with straightforward bus and rail links to all parts of this impressive, vibrant city. The rooms may be on the small side but contain everything that one needs and are clean, quiet and comfortable. What sets this hotel apart however, is the attitude of the staff, who we found to be fantastically welcoming, helpful and friendly. There was nobody who did not have a smile on their face, and we were touched by their determination to make our stay as enjoyable and as memorable as they could. From Samsudin Bin Ahmad who dealt with our luggage, to the delightful Huda and Kiki and their colleagues on Reception, to the brilliant team of

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Wonderful hotel, clean and located near the Douby Ghaut red line MRt, Bencoolen blue MRT and many food stops. The hotel is at the end of Orchard road, within walking distance to Chijmes, Raffles hotel, next to Food Republic (great food court), Starbucks and Din tai dung. The hotel staff were very accommodating, professional and friendly. The room has a refrigerator, hair dryer and water heater for coffee and tea. Competitively priced!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Hotel in town
desc: Had a really good stay at the hotel with a nice and good equipped room. The staff is quite friendly and supportive. The pool and the pool area welcomes to relax even in the evening. The location is central. The only reason why I didn’t give full points is the breakfast which is not at the same standard as the rest of the hotel

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, comfortable rooms, great Club Room service
desc: We stayed at this hotel for three days and found it excellent. It is in a sentral location in the city, with a metro station just one minutes walk from the hotel (and several others on different lines also close by). The room we had was clean, comfortable and had everything we needed. The hotel has a well-kept small gym and outdoor swimming pool. We arrived around 8am (long before official check-in time) but the staff were able to give us a room anyway - much appreciated after a long flight. The room type was not exactly as we had ordered, but we were able to switch to the correct type of room in the afternoon. This caused extra work for the hotel in terms of room cleaning, but this was not a problem; such flexibility is much appreciated. We had ordered Club rooms, and

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay here in Singapore!
desc: We upgraded to a junior suite on the Club Floor. The room was graciously large and very comfortable. (In a suite I really expect some separation of the space -- this was just one big room, a little disappointing, but only a little.) Large bathroom with a huge window and a view of the National Museum. The Club Floor was fantastic, with breakfast, snacks, wine in the evening, and a free hop-on-hop-off tour that stopped right in front of the hotel. We appreciated the late check-out. The Rendezvous is an easy walk to Orchard Road, the main shopping street. Subway stations are right on the corner. The one downside--the concierge. Both times I asked him a question, he tried to sell me a tour. The next time I had a question, I just asked at the check-in desk and they were

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Service with a smile
desc: This hotel was fantastic, we stayed on the club floor, enjoyed cocktails and other drinks and snacks during happy hour, the hotel was very clean and tidy and in a great location. The staff were more than happy to help with any requests. Sofia on the club floor made us feel very comfortable as she was very friendly and accommodating to any needs. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel with a warm heart
desc: Highly recommended for a stay in Singapore. This hotel welcomed us with open arms. Great location next to metro, lovely rooms, great breakfast and excellent service. Top class staff - Melvine Lumaque, Manager on Shift, a very special thanks to the amazing Yi Sheng and Huda.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Will not be dissapointed
desc: We stayed at the rendezvous hotel in February and could not fault anything about the hotel or staff. Kiki on reception was extremely friendly and helpful. We had a very late flight to get 11.55 and although our check out was 4pm we left our baggage and were given a key to the pool changing area to shower when we came back to collect. Room was lovely and we upgraded to have a few more perks. Close by metro and everywhere was close by. Housekeeping daily went out of there way to clean room and all staff chatted to us. My only complaint was breakfast as the food was not what you would expect and only Luke warm. Pool area lovely and both times we went we had the pool to ourselves. Overall a really good experience and we would recommend. Keep up the good work rendezvous

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Nice hotel in great location. Had the club room. The nightly canapes/cocktails were nice, would like more choice for those with gluten intolerance. Staff were excellent, very friendly and accommodating.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Top notch service
desc: Good rooms, good bourbon, great holiday. My friends and I stayed here for a short holiday so we decided to splurge for the club lounge privilege. Best decision ever. Not only for the complimentary breakfast, comfort food served and free flow evening cocktails, but the service there was amazing. Daniel and Sofia went above and beyond, always making us feel welcomed and relaxed after a busy day shopping and travelling around Singapore. Definitely think I've found my go to place to stay in Singapore now.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great hotel and location for exploring Singapore
desc: This is a very comfortable hotel with excellent rooms and friendly, helpful staff. Very good breakfast choice and quality. It's in a great location in the centre of the city - within walking distance of Little India, Clarke Quay, Raffles Hotel and only 3 stops on the MRT to Bayfront/Marina Sands and Chinatown.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value in a good location
desc: We stayed in a club room and were very satisfied with our experience. Staff were friendly and helpful and we especially appreciated the late check out. The hotel is conveniently located only a short walk to the Raffles, and with a MRT station outside the front door it is convenient to explore the sights of Singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A gem of a place
desc: spacious rooms, light and airy. More efficient and relaxing than the large hotels for the business traveler as not packed full of coach trips. Small but varied restaurant for breakfast, with daily changes to the options. Great location for exploring on foot, and seemed well connected for public transport. Staff were helpful and very cheerful, but unobtrusive. Lovely little gym and pool. Strongly recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: Hotel was in a really good location, very close to MRT & shopping plaza. The hotel itself is a little tired and missed some of the basics, mini bar, face cloths & the lighting in our room was not great. Having said this the bed was really comfortable, the room was clean and tidy.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Our 2 night stay!
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights. The room was clean and very spacious. Location was perfect for the traveling around we had to do in that short time. We were able to visit the pool for a few hours which was nice. The. breakfast was great in that there was a lot of variety. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, perfect location
desc: This was my second visit to this hotel. First time was for 6 nights, this time I chose to be there for close to 3 weeks. Why I chose this hotel again? To start with: location, location! But also: the staff made me feel really welcome and are very helpful. The rooms could do with a little touch-up, but are comfortable - and so are the beds! When I go to Singapore again, I'll definitely stay in this hotel again!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 2nd Visit
desc: We choose this hotel again for stopover and once again did not disappoint . Club room booking on 11th floor with all its benefits with Sophia and her staff were so friendly wish we could have stayed longer . Excellent hotel with great transport location we used free hop on , hop off trip from hotel to sightsee again . Club room very spacious , breakfast in Straits Cafe for cooked breakfast or peaceful continental in Club 11 . Free cocktails in Club 11 5 to 7 as well .

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The most cost-effective hotel in Singapore
desc: I used to visit Singapore for business rather than holiday. I choose this hotel for its excellent location. There are 2 SMRT lines - Bencoolen (DT) and Bras Basah (CC). The most of tourism sites are within walking distance or less than 20~30 minutes by public transportation. I stayed in Club Level room because of its excellent cost-effectiveness. It includes breakfast, 2 pieces of laundry per day, late check-out, free-of-charge mini bar, and happy hour services. Club lounge was very cozy and opens until 11:00 pm. The front desk and concierge staffs were nice and seems to be well-trained. Among the lounge staffs, I'd like to appreciate Ms. Sofia. She was so kind and help me for my several requests. Owing to her assistance, my stay were delight and comfort enough. 2개의 지하철 노선이 있어

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hidden Gem
desc: I needed a clean and comfortable room for a 4 night stay and the Rendezvous was perfect. The location is extremely convenient and although the room was not large it was fully equipped, with an extremely comfortable bed. There are a number of MRT stations in easy walking distance and numerous dining spots quite nearby. Breakfast was included - a simple buffet, but a good way to fuel up for the day.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent value at an excellent hotel
desc: Reserved room on Club floor. Arrived at 7.40 am from early flight and room could not be ready until 10.30 am. Paid a little more and took a suite on Club floor. Ate meals in Club Lounge and had drinks as well. Rate also included 2 items of laundry. Suite was very comfortable and absolutely quiet. Wonderful stay and this has become my choice of hotel to stay at when in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location, Great Service.
desc: Fantastic location, so easy to access trains and buses from right outside the door. Buffet breakfast was outstanding and so much choice, was busy at times but service great, always kept clean and stocked. Club lounge was enjoyable, very friendly staff. Great pool and gym. Would highly recommend this Hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stopover
desc: As usual, excellent hotel. Have stayed before and will stay again if ever in Singapore again. Staff very friendly and helpful, especially the hotel porter on arrival at the hotel. Breakfast food was not very western friendly and the room temperature of the restaurant was far too cold.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Top Notch Experience
desc: I stayed five nights at this wonderful hotel while in Singapore last week. I had a room on the 11th floor (club floor) which included a great breakfast, two pieces of laundry washed daily at no charge, and everything in the mini bar was available at no cost. The room was great and the staff obviously well-trained. Staff was professional and accommodating. I recommend this hotel to anyone and I will certainly make this my first choice when I return to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel location
desc: I stayed 2 weeks at this hotel. I got a room at the 7th floor where it was so quiet and peaceful. The room was so great and staff are so professional and accommodating. Since it is a business trip they also offer shuttle from hotel to the office. I would recommend this hotel for their quality and great location.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Check out extension
desc: This time round the Rendezvous Hotel was rather parsimonious abt extending our check out time. Extended it by only an hour despite the fact that the rooms were not at full cap. On a previous occasion, they had extended check out time by 3 hrs.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Would not return
desc: The whole hotel needs cleaning, towels are torn, beds are hard, linen smells of smoke and bathroom exhaust fans do not work and the bathrooms are full of mould. I stayed here previously and could not believe the drop in standards.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: FLOP
desc: Have your room attendants report all necessary things missing that need to be repaired and replaced before guests move in the room. Guest need not waste their valuable time to complain and report on things that should have been taken care of by the room attendants in the FIRST place. At the end of the day it is your responsibility to make sure that all run smoothly for the good name of your hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Club Room - please do yourselves a favour
desc: Have just returned from a wonderful 6 night stay in a club room at the Rendezvous Hotel Singapore. We caught the MRT from the airport (with one change at Expo) to the hotel - quick and easy. From the moment we walked into the hotel to the minute we left we felt like family. Upon arrival we were quickly scurried away to the 11th Floor 'Club Rendezvous' to check in. An extremely warm welcome by Sophia made for a fantastic first impression and the hospitality that was to follow. The team at the Club lounge were absolutely fantastic - eager to please, forthcoming with local knowledge, information and recommendations of places to see and visit. Every single staff member looked like they enjoyed their job - management should be proud of the team they have on the 11th floor.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel near between downtown Singapore and Orchard road
desc: Centrally located hotel with good connections and a friendly staff. The room was not big, but the bed was very comfortable. Nice modern bathroom with a "rain shower" and a Japanese toilet. Breakfast buffet had many different food choices.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: The hotel is between Bencoolen and Dhoby Ghaut MRT stations, so very convenient for transport. There are eating options very close from the hotel. The rooms are comfortable and well-equipped. The staff is nice, helpful and efficient (special thanks to Siti and Ifa). If you are sensitive to noise, ask for a room at a upper floor and facing the street.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding!
desc: Great hotel with very friendly personal! Big thanks to Sofia and Daniel! The finishes are top quality and i felt like a bit of royalty thanks to Daniel and Sophia!! Location is very central with great Parks and shoppingcenters nearby.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location just that bed is small
desc: The hotel location is amazing. But the overall experience of my trip was disappointing due to the bed that the hotel provided. The bed we booked is double but was given twin bed. The hotel single bed was smaller than other hotel, the bed cant be move to combine. Due to working my partner and i only meet 6 month once. So we cherish every moment together but this trip we have to sleep on seperate bed for this trip. Which is kind of disappointing.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Dinner with family
desc: Enjoy our family's 1st dinner at straits cafe! With all good food spread and service especially by Mr Marco. Not forgetting the rest of his team...Thank you and will sure be back again! Maszalan and Family

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Visit to Singapore
desc: A super hotel, recommended by our travel agent in Germany. The pickup and delivery to the airport, organised by the hotel, were punctual. All the staff were extremely friendly and helpful. I would recommend the Club Rendevous upgrade.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, good location, fab decor
desc: Only a one night stay but would return. Great location right by the MRT, decoration was excellent with lots of quirky art. Spotlessly clean with all amenities in the room and a good breakfast in the morning. Another good hotel by Far East.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Stay
desc: Clean Rooms, Friendly staff. Nice breakfast with loads of choice. Decent location. About 10 mins from Financial district. Check in and check out was quick. They would arrange for cabs whenever required and very quickly.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: We enjoyed our stay. The bed was comfortable but the pool was freezing. Hotel is ridiculously close to the MRT. Best hotel we have stayed in Singapore. Pillows were not very comfortable. Most of the staff were attentive and helpful. Highly recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First visit
desc: A nice hotel to stay, affordable price. Our room was clean. All in working condition. Staff responsive and prompt. Many restaurants, shopping malls and transportation close by. I would come back and stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location & Hospitality
desc: Perfect location for walking and transit. Staff welcoming, and helpful with local eateries and detailed directions. Upgraded to Club level and did not regret, a great all round value. I will stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Welcome back
desc: My sister and I recently stayed at the Rendevous Hotel. We had stayed there before a few years ago in one of the club rooms. We were warmly welcomed by Danial Rodrigues the Guest Service Executive. Danial and Sophia took great care of us we felt very special. The rooms, facilities and the service is great and the location is central.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay in Singapore
desc: The hotel has an excellent location. It is in the heart of city. An amzing location if you want to explore prominent places on fot. Rooms are spacious and well furnished. Hotel is neat and clean, quality of food is good and service is good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Stay!
desc: Spent two nights here in Singapore. Rooms are excellent. Bed was very comfortable. Had a few hours at the pool which had some shade and sun. Hotel is located in a very good area. The breakfast included had lots of selections. I would recommend this hotel for your stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding stayover
desc: Held my wedding here at Rendezvous Hotel on 10/03 the ambiance and banquet crew was excellent, wanted to thank the friendly banquet manager and the captain for the guidance and help throughout the whole course, sorry I forgot to take down their names but good job. During my stayover with them I visited the lounge and the staff by the name of Sofia was warm and friendly always ready to render her service to us and even congrats us on our wedding even tho she may not require to do that going the extra mile, definitely the face to represent rendezvous hotel. Wonderful experience

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Daniel and Sophia!! Amazing journey you took us on! 100% grateful!
desc: We cannot thank these two amazing people for making our stay at Rendezvous hotel just spectacular,we felt right at home! Thank you,will be back later this year! The hotel was great, clean,food was great and location amazing! Thank u again!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, great Club Floor, welcoming staff
desc: This is my third visit to the Rendezvous Hotel staying on the club floor. Each visit has been excellent, nothing is too much trouble for the staff in the club lounge and the friendly welcome you get when getting out of the lift makes you feel at home straight away - special thanks to Sofia for sorting out my early arrival. The location at the foot of Orchard Rd makes it great if you feel like shopping glitz and glamour while scenic Clarke Quay and Fullerton Hotel are a 25 minute stroll away (20 minutes if you walk but it is a bit hot for that!). It is also close to the MRT for getting further afield. The only downside is the in house eateries, there is not a lot of choice but at least that gives you a reason to get out, explore and experiment!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious Room & Convenient Location
desc: Compared to the other hotels I've stayed in Singapore, this hotel has much more spacious rooms that didn't make me feel cramped, for the same amount of money. The bed was really comfortable, and the room had a smart TV (which you would think every hotel has, but no).
