The wifi speed was good and the desk was a good size to comfortably sit and work on my laptop (as opposed to the more compact versions in hotels with smaller rooms). But what I really loved about my stay was the location of the hotel. It's right by 2 train stations (Bencoolen and Bras Basah), there's a bus station right in front, and a never ending supply of taxis. This location made it so easy for me (and I tend to wander/get lost a lot) to go around. Definitely will come back to stay here again on my next trip.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Our Rendezvous Stay
desc: We totally enjoyed our stay at Rendezvous Hotel. (6 days) Room was great as was service and food. The staff were really friendly and the Concierge very helpful. We will stay there again sometime and we have already recommended the hotel to others.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore the clean and organised city
desc: I flew from Columbo to Singapore on a Singapore airlines flight and that arrived at 7.15am. Arrived at the hotel at 8am and very tired. I had requested an early check in but was advised by the receptionist Nasuha that there were no rooms available at the time. She provided me with 2 options and they were 1. Leave my luggage with the concierge and come back at 1pm when the room would be ready or 2. As per 1. above they would call me if a room become available earlier 3. join the Club at a small increase in premium [$50] and I could have a free breakfast immediately and a free breakfast the next day, mini bar was free and happy hour the same. Breakfast was $30 on the menu so I felt that was a great deal and I needed breakfast as well as a shower and sleep , so paid the extra

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Business trip
desc: Beautiful hotel and great convenient location. Great shopping and food options and access to MRT. Staff very helpful. Really enjoyed my stay. I will be back in a few months when I next need to be in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good deal
desc: We booked at this hotel because there was a good deal for the quality. Very happy with our choice. Room was nice (a bit old but still ok) good mattress, good aircon and very quiet. We will come back if the price is as good

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Super Visit
desc: I really wanna thank Farah at the club floor for making my visit so comfortable, she made sure she could carter to all that i needed, thank you for being such a wonderful Host. I would surely recommend this to all my friends and family

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday
desc: A very nice place. Lovely staff who are very reserved, but who are very pleasant if you make an effort to engage.. kind of old fashioned, very tastefully decorated, but arty too. Breakfast is superb. Noticed to need up dating... but not change essential style.. please. Particularly nice guy working in the library when I was there. Very central... 3 MRT (train) stations extremely close, lots of bus connections at front door.. Very easy to get around from there.. all SG highlights.. including airport. Pool is very pleasant.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Location, Service & Food
desc: Location is splendid as it is within walking distance from many museums such as Singapore Art Museum (upgrading now), National Museum of Singapore, Peranakan Museum and National Gallery (a little further) etc. Perfect for museum lovers. It is centrally located with many food choices too. There’s a Food Republic Food Court just beside the hotel which is very convenient for tourists who want to enjoy local food. There’s 7-11 and Starbucks just around the hotel too. Shopping Malls like The Cathay, Plaza Singapura (PS) and Raffles City are within comfortable walking distance too. Great variety of food choices are available at these malls. Not to forget Chijmes which is a really good place to chill and dine in the evening and it’s so near. Bras Basah MRT station is just beside

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Location was superb.Food court round the corner and MRT is just less not a min away, room comfortable and modern facility . Staff very friendly and knowledgeable. Fast check-out and will sure to return again for my next staycation.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Well .......
desc: Arriving on a rainy afternoon, very tired, makes it necessary that the hotel you arrive to, looks nice and friendly. I think there is room for improvement here. Our room was a strange kind. A double room with 2 huge beds, and no room for our huge suitcases. We could clearly smell the cleaning chemicals, and it was way too wet outside to even try and open the window. The temperature was also too high to try that. Luckily it was only for a single night. But we had a booking on our return tour. A different room, but same problem. So my opinion is: that was standard. If you like that, you can go for it. The restaurant was under average.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Another great stay
desc: We stayed here 13th April to 18th April 2019 and booked a room on the club level. our room was brilliant, heaps of room. The concierge service cocktails and canapes from 5pm to 8pm is a great idea and available to club room guests. The staff on the club deck Kathleen and the very well spoken Indian Lady (sorry i cannot remember her name) were so helpful and nothing was a problem for them. The hotel is very well located, MRT, bus stop and the hop on hop off sightseeing bus out the front. There is a food republic across the road for dining. Also have to mention the concierge staff who were always helpful in getting taxis when needed. Would highly recommend this hotel for its service, location, room types and friendliness of staff

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good quality hotel
desc: Good quality hotel and great location, very friendly staff. We had a very good stay at this hotel and would recommend highly. The MRT station being outside was great for us as we travelled on the train system around Singapore for our entire stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very well located
desc: We stayed here for five nights. I work in Singapore for a couple of days in April every year, and the company booked this hotel on my behalf. The location is fantastic. The hotel is adjacent both the Bras Basah (Circle Line) and Bencoolen (Downtown Line) MRT stations, as well as walking distance to the North South Line, East West Line and North East Lines. It's very easy to get anywhere on the island. The hotel is also in the middle of the arts precinct, so there are a number of galleries and museums close by. The standard rooms, while smallish, are well appointed and spotless. We didn't use the pool, but it looked pleasant. We found the staff to be very helpful. I had the buffet breakfast on three mornings, which had a variety of food options, including western style eggs

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Strategically located Hotel
desc: Downtown MRT station and bus stop right next to the hotel. Good republic food court and cafes just around the corner. Comfortable bed and good room size. Do I need to say further? Is so convenient and I have no complains at all. This is the hotel I am coming back for sure!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: We stayed at Rendezvous for a 3 night stay on the last leg of our Asian tour. There was really nothing I could complain about. The service was excellent. We got offered a room up grade which put us on the 10th floor. The room was a good size and the bed was very comfortable. We had a toilet with a bidet and heated toilet seat which was nice. The room also came with a mobile phone that you could use with unlimited international calls, texts and wifi. We would definitely stay there again

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Mo and Chris Singapore trip
desc: Location was perfect for two Seniors visiting Singapore for the first time. Bus stop at front door and train 1/2 block. Walking distance to shopping and several major attractions. Room was very nice, clean and comfortable. Service was excellent.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice hotel
desc: The hotel is very nice, this is the second time we stay there. The room is nice, breakfast is good. As we stayed in the club room, we had an access to the club lounge, which is very convenient for business trips and meetings. They also provide breakfast with smaller choice that in a main restaurant, but still very good. Sofia, the administrator of the club lounge was very very helpful and kind. We were glad to see her smiling face every morning :)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good location
desc: Very good hotel, perfect location, easy to go anywhere thought the bus just in front of the hotel, I would like to say the overall experience better than the Sands, highly recommended but The swimming pool is smaller than I expected and the washroom do not have a hanger.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Experience
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights mid April ‘19 and were very pleased with both the location of the hotel and the accommodation. Close to MRT station and Food Republic. And it make our short break very comfortable. Big thanks !

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rugby sevens trip
desc: Stayed here as booked in by Living with the lions Tour Great hotel and very good staff, they were very helpful during checkin and answered all questions regarding the area and transportation Very close to the MTR station that took us to the stadium The locality was incredible, so clean and the people were so lovely

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First time in Singapore
desc: Rendezvous is centrally situated with everything a fist timer needs within walking distance. Room was clean and tidy. Any issues I had were promptly rectified e.g. fridge wasn't very cold, new fridge brought to the room. Staff were friendly and helpful. Pool was never overly busy

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Three days stay for business trip
desc: The room clean and comfortable and the food was very good throughout with plenty of choice. The staff are very friendly and helpful and the hotel location allows guests to explore the area with ease..

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing service
desc: Team Rendezvous, I had an amazing night, many thanks to your team who managed our requests so well. We chose Rendezvous because it was near the town area and with many options to celebrate my Girlfriend birthday. We were glad to have been upgraded to the Club room where there were various complimentary services including the lounge service and cocktail bar. We had several requests to have champagne glasses and rock glass and was served within 5 mins of the call. When my gf wasn’t feeling well and the breakfast platter didn’t serve any porridge, the team took effort to check with the restaurant and brought her a bowl of it. The staff made the place feel more like home than a hotel. Would like to thank all who contributed to that wonderful stay! Thank you!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Looking forward to our next visit.
desc: There are so many options in SG and we have tried a few over the years. We find ourselves coming back to Rendezvous. Real hospitality. Any fancy features that are missing is made up for in the quality of service. We stayed in a club room last time and it is worth the extra money. Access to the Club Lounge is great with quiet breakfast and evening cocktails as well as being able to bring a client up for a meeting when needed and the hospitality is extended to all of your guests. Sofia and the crew of the Club Lounge will look after you like family. The hotel describes itself as your extended family when visiting SG and its true.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful hotel with helpful staff
desc: We stayed only one night but it was just perfect. We came to this hotel looking for an alternative after we spent a terrible 24 hrs at Hotel Becoolen around the corner (see my review). We were given a great deal that saw us upgraded to a junior suite and we were offered a late check out on the following day which was immensely helpful to us as our flight was only very late that night. The hotel is beautiful - the lobby showcases interesting art and there is a chilled seating and bar area on the ground floor. Also on the ground floor is the restaurant (Straits Cafe) that we used for the included breakfast. The variety and quality of food was fantastic - lots of choice for Western and Asian tastes. The suite was great - tastefully furnished with a grand view. The seating area

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendez vous hotel Singapore
desc: Great hospitality, amazing people, especially Mr. Samsudin Ahmad at concierge who knows everything you need to know to have a great time around Singapore! We got great tips to discover the most interesting sites like the bird safari, the awesome Singapore zoo and the night life at the Bay Area.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended
desc: Perfect location. MRT (Bencoolen) is adjacent to the hotel entrance. MRT (Bras Basah) is only 100m. MRT Dhoby Ghaut only 500m away. Orchard road is only 500m or 15 min. walk. Hotel staffs are very friendly. Room is clean.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Just wow!!!
desc: I come every year to Singapore for work. This year I am staying in Hotel Rendezvous. It really is one of the best places I have ever stayed in - in Singapore. The rooms are big and spotlessly clean. The hotel is conveniently placed at the corner of Oxford STreet and Bras Basah Road, and 17 minutes walking distance from Little India. The area is full of coolest of coffee shops and beautiful eateries.. This is a Deluxe room, and it is lovely.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cosy Anniversary Staycation
desc: The hotel room was good for staycation. Just the water temperature and pressure not ideal. Breakfast is excellent. Facilities are still alright. The location is strategic for places of interests. We will be back in the future!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: In the heart of town
desc: I led a tour group from Ghana to Singapore and we slept in this hotel, well it’s one of the spacious hotels I have been to in singapore. It’s bang in the city, a walking distance to Clark Quay and our favorite street “Bugis” 😍; and oh it’s well decorated

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Well located and comfortable
desc: I slightly busted my budget to stay here once I discovered its biggest advantage, location. Right beside Bencoolen MRT and just 5 mins from Dhoby Gaut MRT, with a further 5 min walk to Orchard road, and 10-15 mins the other direction gets you to teh Marina area of the city. It served me perfectly for the week I spent, as everything I wanted to see and do was either withing walking distance or on one of the 4 MRT lines I could get to. The hotel itself was well appointed, quiet (apart from a persistent crashing noise on a few early mornings, which I never discovered the source of) and comfortable. Slightly awkwardly laid out bathroom, but everything else was great. I used the well reviewed attached restaurant once for a breakfast which while huge was quite bland in

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: UNEXPECTED EXTENDED STAY
desc: Unfortunate to have an accident in Singapore and spending a week in Hospital , and an extra week at the hotel. The support show to my husband while I was in hospital and myself on returning was nothing short of amazing Sofia and colleagues on club lounge certainly made our stay more comfortable thank you heaps

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service and fantastic bar
desc: Dayang and Daniel Were very warm and hospitable with their service. Their Moscow mule (in house mix) was really impressive. Specially created by Daniel their mixologist and perfectly executed by Dayang coupled with their excellent service, we had a great time at their evening cocktail session ( complimentary with the club room package) A visit worth coming back for.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycay
desc: Check-in was smooth. Room was spacious and good enough for 2. Clean and comfortable. High comfortable bed. View from room is good. Received complimentary birthday cake and simple deco for a birthday celebration.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant staff and excellent location
desc: We stayed in the club room and were absolutely blown away by the incredible staff. Nothing was too much trouble for them and they couldn’t help enough. Really convenient location, right beside rail and buses.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singacosmopolitan
desc: Well I didn't know what to expect of Singapore and I wasn't disappointed. The streets were exceptionally clean. The money was easy to understand and the people were so open and friendly. The hotel was exceptional- all amenities nothing short of excellent. So glad I visited another visit is on the cards.i didn't get a chance to see the underground shopping areas and botanical gardens to name two ...so I guess I'll need to save cos Singapore here I come.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good & Nice to stay at Rendez Vous Hotel. Thank you and I will return to your hotel while I am travelling to Singapore.
desc: Good location Great food Nice service Comfortable bed Clean hotel Quick response Familiar staff Good food Great sevice Good location Clean hotel Well Good Nice Great Clean Location Food Service Staff Good

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay
desc: Stayed for 2 nights inbetween UK to NZ flight. Hotel lovely. Staff friendly and helpful. Pool area nice. Good singapore slings in the library bar. Breakfast was really good, the vegetable curry was one of the best ive ever had. Good location..

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic service
desc: Arrived exhausted and was totally looked after. Informative helpful nd so close to everything including transport. Would recommend to anyone visiting Singapore. Room is great. Beds comfy and inclusionsmean you don’t have to think about anything.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: The hotel is in an excellent location, close to many sites, walking distance to the lake for half an hour, recommended to do on foot, enjoying the beauty of buildings and sites. The rooms are large, the internet is good, the service courteous and courteous. The hotel is very close to two underground stations. The hotel has a wide area of cheap restaurants, where you can eat breakfast, lunch and dinner.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A memorable stay
desc: I would like to commend Sophia, Kathleen and Yi Ting for their efforts in making my birthday staycay a welcoming one. I was lucky to have been given a room earlier than the check in time and while exploring the Club Lounge, Sophia was aware that there was a "birthday girl" checking in & enquired if I was the one. By this time, I was pleasantly surprised and thanked her for wishing me a belated birthday. A few minutes pass & I hear a birthday song along with a Tiramisu cake. I truly appreciate this lovely gesture. The Team over at Club Lounge has made me feel special and their service should be highlighted. Thank you so much!! Would definitely stay at the hotel again, :)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent business hotel near eateries
desc: Had been returning to Rendezvous for the last 10 years. It's a decent hotel within close proximity to nearby malls/eateries. The stay now is more pleasant due to the completion of the downtown MRT line.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location good
desc: We were slightly disappointed with the service at the rendezvous. Concierge service was poor. When we asked about the hop on hop off bus service he didn’t know what we were talking about. After a lengthy discussion he finally gave us the right information. Lobby service was poor. We did upgrade to Club room and that was quite good as you could have your breakfast there before you went out for the day and pre dinner drinks was nice. The staff up there were nice and helpful. We just didn’t feel it was a very welcoming hotel and a lot of times when we asked for information about tourist attractions no one really seemed to know much. Not sure that we would go back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Dream holiday
desc: Nice and clean room , very friendly and professional staff ,Highly recommended GREAT LOCATION.We had a late check out (4pm) our request to extend our check out was granted without any hesitation. Well done>

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Mini break Singapore
desc: Excellent hotel in the heart of Singapore close to shops,restaurants, transport, bus to airport leaves just outside of the hotel for those with limited luggage👍 The rooms are clean and comfortable nice pool area although the pool furniture is in need of repair or replacement. We enjoyed our stay very much and are looking at a return visit in November.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location but quality of the room is lower than average
desc: I booked a King size bed but they gave me a Queen. The AC in the room seems to be set at a certain temperature. I lowered it to 16oC and on high but the output is the same and never reached that temperature. The shower pressure is weak and the water is SUPER HOT. It takes minutes to find a comfortable temperature.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location and efficient and warm service staff.
desc: Rendezvous Hotel at Bras Basah is our favoured hotel because of its spacious rooms and excellent location. Service staff - the concierge and F&B in particular - were warm and helpful. It is a good hotel for families and tourists.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Entirely met what I wanted in a hotel
desc: A 2 night visit. Excellent service, good wifi, great shower, comfortable bed. Located in a part of town where I could get to the tourist destinations I wanted to see easily. What more can I say? Why do I need 200 characters?

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not as espected
desc: The stay started off bad as the room that I booked was not available. I find that curious: how can you confirm a booking and not have it available on the visit date? That can only mean it was activel given to someone else. Rain shower also did not work

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: To eat
desc: the food is great and delicious but if you guys were to have scallops it will be great . The spread can be wider but the quality is good nontheless. Wider selection of different cousines will be better.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing place
desc: Oh My Gosh...this place is amazing...Sofia the lovely guest services is awesome with us! We are definitely coming back to stay for another holiday! The rooms are immaculate and the food is fresh and hot. The bed is very comfortable to sleep in. Thank you for making us feel welcomed...

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic stay in Club Room
desc: Came over for the Singapore Rugby 7’s. We stayed in a Club Room each. Well worth the extra money! Rooms comfortable (great “rain shower”) king-size bed, large tv, great wifi. The club benefits are fantastic. All club rooms are on the 11th floor with access the ClubLounge. Sofia made us very welcome as we took full advantage of that lounge😀 Happy Hour between 6-8pm with free food and drink 👍 And after enquiring about a late check-out Sofia sorted that for us very promptly. Thanks Sofia - we will be back 👍

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Club Room
desc: We had King Bed Club Room. Excellent stay. Club room suited us well as it provided relaxed atmosphere after trips out and about. Club room staff were very friendly and helpful. The pool had no tables to use when pool side drinks and food were ordered.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and nice location..
desc: Nice and clean room. Superb location easy access to MRT. The hotel staff were friendly and accommodating. Like the art paintings in the hotel. The breakfast buffet was just ok. Not many choices but good food.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel, excellent location
desc: Very nice hotel. perfect journey. The breakfast and the lunch were excellent. I didn't have time to try the swimming pool or the SPA... The Hotel is very well placed at few meters from everything. I highly recommand it

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Retreat
desc: This is our first with Rendezvous Hotel (Bras Basah). We were looking at others Far East Hospitality hotels and was attracted to their reviews and why not to give it a try as my birthday treat. The moment we got to the front desk, we already knew we're in for a treat. The front desk lady greeted us with a warm smile and we were led to the Club Floor for a welcome drinks while they process our huge room. They're more but I'll finished this few more words, go check them out!!!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel in a perfect location, bus direct to the airport, very clean.
desc: We choose this room because a freind recommended this hotel.Perfect location, very clean, very good staff, booked with breakfast, a lot of varietys.We got a free upgrade for a club room. We would definitly book it again!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent on All Counts
desc: My experience was excellent throughout my time with the Rendezvous Hotel. In particular, I really like their location (central, but not deep in a concrete jungle), their design and artworks, and the staff. Rajan in particular was an exceptionally great asset in my time there. The food in the Straights Cafe was delicious, and the conference space was well lit and had great acoustics. Will be returning.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly Staff and good location
desc: The staff are friendly. The hotel is in good location. MRT station Bencoolen is just one minute away which is easy to go to most of the attraction. We have been up grade to Club room and liked the fast separate check-out location service. The room is big, clean and comfortable.we enjoyed to stay in this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect location to suit our needs
desc: Although we didn't use the hotel facilities or breakfast offer , we found the hotel perfect for our needs. Clean and tidy rooms , friendly staff. We stayed here due to the location and familiar surroundings, There are two MRT stations close by (dhoby ghaut 350m) and bras basah (100m), also lots of local buses out front of hotel to get around including airport express (Allow 1 hr due to traffic).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic home base for a fantastic trip to Singapore
desc: Learned of this hotel from friends who stayed here last year and decided to book into the Rendezvous for our first trip to Singapore. Good decision! The hotel is very well located for all the tourist activities that you might want to do and very well run. Nor', Sofia and the entire crew here took great care of us, ensuring that we were well fed and watered in Club Rendezvous for breakfast and happy hour and had the best activities included on our 3-day itinerary. The art work in the lobby is very eye catching and the rooms (we were in a junior suite) were very comfortable. Thank you Rendezvous for introducing us to Singapore! We fell in love with this city and will be back - staying at the Rendezvous, of course!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday
desc: Staff excellent .Hotel central to everything mrt station out the front makes it easy to get to airport cost $ 2.60 Australian close to Little India ,China town , marina bay ,marina bay towers and just about everywhere you want to go

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: just fantastic
desc: great service by all staff and especially Christine , I am in love with her! She in is the Café dining room Hotel cleaning staff were great as were those lovely girls in Reception Very efficient ladies

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great central location, convenient for walking, buses or MRT
desc: This is a great location, with easy access to buses and 3 MRT stations. Provision of a smartphone for use during our stay was a bonus. Reception was particularly helpful in sorting transport to the airport. The rooms are on the small size, with ours being the smallest room of the 4 we stayed in on our holiday in SE Asia. There was no opening window and the air-con had little effect it was difficult to control the room temperature, which was either hot or cold. Towels (and clothes) stayed damp. The hotel decoration like the hotel seemed rather dated.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic location and well appointed
desc: Our travel agent booked us into this hotel as part of a stopover package. The location was perfect, just a few metres from the MRT station and therefore an easy transfer in from the airport. We arrived very early and we were well looked after, with a key given to the pool area. Unfortunately the showers were cold at the pool/gym but they did wake us up! Our rooms were lovely and the bathroom in particular was fabulous old time grandeur. Everything was immaculate. We had some difficulty sorting out our breakfast, but eventually I managed to convince the hotel that we did have breakfast included by producing an additional copy of our documentation. This took some effort however and is why I haven’t given five stars as it was clear in our voucher. The staff were very apologetic

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: We enjoy 4 nights stay at Renderzvous Hotel
desc: We spent our holidays there and hotel service is very good. It's located near National Museum of Singapore and from hotel we can walk to down town Orchard Road or to Marina Bay within 20-30 minutes. We enjoy our daily breakfast with variety of choices. Staff is helpful and accommodating. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service, friendly staff, yummy breakfast and great location
desc: We loved our stay. We were greeted by Radha each morning at breakfast who was so bright, happy and made us welcome. What a great way to start our day along with the Chefs yummy omelettes. Great location. Highly recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: Great location with bus stop and metro station just right outside the main door. Breakfast food is diverse and good quality. Swimming pool and Gym room is fairly good. Room amenities is adequate and have everything you need. The mattress have not enough support in the centre, perhaps it is a bit old.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Love it all three times here. Friendly staffs, good services and food. Central location with easy access to public transport. Good food choices around the vicinity. Would definitely come back again...

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Okay at first
desc: Hotel lobby good, but room service lousy to the point of getting our own ice for our room, no face washers for the room and food very expensive for lunch and dinner. carpet and features of the hotel on the room floor run down and dowdy.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Memorable Birthday Staycation Experience
desc: I had stayed at this hotel from 25 to 26 May 2019 at one of the club rooms as part of a birthday deal. Firstly, this hotel is situated in a central location close to the major shopping malls. Therefore, I was able to enjoy a great view from my hotel room especially of the central business district. Secondly, the room which I had stayed in was clean and tidy. I have especially loved using the toilet bowl which has similar features as a Japanese washlet and which I don't see in other Singaporean hotels. As for the club lounge, the selection of food and drinks being served was very limited but it will be a good haven for travellers who prefer a private and quiet space away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Lastly, the staff were very friendly and polite throughout my

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Horrible experience. Unfriendly and arrogant receptionist and staff. You should treat your customers with respect.
desc: Your receptionists were unfriendly and arrogant. They should be sensitive with the words they spell out of their mouth, specially when a father is infront of his family. It was a traumatic experience for my kids and my wife as well.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quality of Rendevous Hotel
desc: Facilities are very good and also comfortable bed to sleep.Room is neat and tidy.But for me need more soft tissue and water pump for toilet.A little problem about that.If I have to say overall,this hotel is excellent and I want to come again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Value Hotel
desc: Stayed here for 4 days for a business trip. This is one of the old hotels in SG but very well kept. Its clean and the location is perfect. Its near the MRT station and theres a bus stop when you step out of the hotel. Its walking distance to SMU and the National Museum. Price for SG standards is not too bad also. Breakfast menu needs improvement but overall, its a great hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Two night comfortable stay
desc: We stayed for only two nights and this was a good venue. However it was more of a business hotel than a holiday venue. Lovely pool. No alcohol allowed in cafeteria-only in Bar. Staff very good and helpful.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel, Location and Value
desc: We spent three nights at Hotel Rendezvous in May 2019 and thought the location was great as was the staff and the rooms. It is a short walk to the National Museum and great shopping as well. There is also a 7-11 in the hotel which made it convenient for a quick beverage or snack.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel with quirky decorations
desc: The location is superb, just at Bras Basah MRT exit. Handy location to take a short bus trip to Orchard Rd. The reception staffs are helpful, the room was clean, love the hotel decorations (very artistic), and love the breakfast as well.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding location + great staff
desc: After London, Singapore is my favorite city in the world--from the minute I arrive at the airport to the point where I'm craving Singapore's famous chicken and rice at Tien Tien. This hotel, along with its staff, is a microcosm of what Singaporean society is all about--multicultural, efficient, effective and friendly. For these reasons and others, I couldn't recommend you more to stay at Rendezvous, not just because of its strategic location in the heart of Singapore but because of the friendliness of its staff--I look forward to returning to this great establishment! Love from Guatemala

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business trip with family
desc: Had to travel for busines meetings, my wife and kid came along. In total we were 3 families and trip was almost a week long. Had to book hotel to ensure while I was away, my family have safe and best place to stay back. Read all the reviews and was super nervous at the time of booking. Sent a note to hotel with my concerns basis the reviews. Before my travel, I spoke with Pushpa (Manager) and she answered all my questions and also gave us a free upgrade to club rooms and best was she ensured we get pure veg food all the time, which wasn’t available in variety. When we reached, we got warm welcome, room were ready with gifts for our kids and we were introduced with all the staff members. Few take aways: 1) Staff -5/5. Always ready to help. Kids were happy as every now and

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best STAYCAY Hotels in Singapore
desc: As Singaporeans, we're always busy working and can hardly go overseas. Therefore, we adopted the concept of 'Staycation'. And Rendezvous Hotel is one of my top spots for a 'Staycation'. The location is superb. Within walk distance to the MRT station, Malls (Plaza Singapura), Pubs and the best Mac & Cheese joint, The BIG Cheese. The rooms were huge. Bigger than the other hotels around the vicinity. The rooms were clean too. I've experienced both the Club and the deluxe rooms. Definitely worth topping up for the club room. The service was awesome too. Friendly and professional staff through out. However, was a little upset that they don't acknowledge returning guests like myself. Anyhow for the price, totally worth it!! Would definitely come back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding banquet
desc: My wife and I had a wedding banquet at rendezous hotel. The service was fantastic and I had a very pleasant time. The banquet manager yan huang and her team was very flexible and actively seeking ways to accommodate our requests. What I love about them was the prompt clarifications. Highly recommended

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: fails to deliver
desc: I called the front desk repeatedly, the concierge, the operator, this went on for an hour no one would answer.. Finally I walked down to the front, desk. There were 2 staff doing nothing,no one on the phone, no guests in the lobby, yet they would not pick up the phone. This same thing happened again 2 days later. The staff was also the least friendly of any of the hotels I stayed at in Singapore. There are so many good hotels in Singapore. Do yourself a favor and skip this one

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not bad
desc: Great location (near MRT stations, 7-11, eating options, money changer), friendly and helpful front desk staff, rooms are good size, nice pool, 24-hour gym Breakfast buffet so-so (lacks usual Western choices)

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Great service from the staff especially Sofia and Kathleen. They were very meticulous in attending to our needs during our stay there. Sofia had been liasing with us way before our stay there. She was also there when we checked out to ensure that we had an enjoyable stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable weekend staycation
desc: My wife and I just had a good weekend staycation in Rendezvous hotel. It was our second time there, and the staff is, as usual, friendly and service-oriented. I even received a complimentary birthday cake from the hotel. The club lounge is a relaxing and private space for afternoon coffee as well as evening cocktails. We hung out in there for a considerable time. We will definitely celebrate special occasions in this hotel again. Thank you, all the staff, who made our stay fantastic.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore
desc: Except at peak times this is hotel is great value and the staff and service are very good. The central location means easy access on foot to most of Singapore's sights and its right next to a MRT station if you want to go further away.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Overnight Recharge
desc: Great place to stop over on a flight. Close to the MRT and has lovely amenities and quality. Worth the extra to upgrade to the club suite. Big beds and access to Happy hour and a less busy breakfast area take the hassle out of a quick trip.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel with exceptional service
desc: The location of the hotel is very conveniently along the Orchard/City Hall Shopping belt. The Club Lounge serves decent evening tapas, along with a good selection of happy hour drinks. Stayed at this hotel on several occasions and the service received is consistent. Staff are very welcoming and are always ready to help. Ms Sofia from the Club Lounge, went the extra mile to ensure that my stay was a memorable one, as I was celebrating my birthday. Thank you Ms Sofia and team for the great experience!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 4 star hotel.....5 star staff
desc: The hotel is located in an excellent spot - close to MRTs, buses, eateries and the shopping belt. Once you get accustomed to the heat, it is easy and quick to walk to places such as Little India, Arab St, Bugis, The Raffles, Chijmes, Fort Canning Park, Emerald Hill Road, and Atlas Bar. The hotel has lots of groovy art pieces which jazz the place up, and a lovely relaxing pool area. We stayed in a club room which was well worth it. All the staff (Dayang, Dhivyan, Sofia, Kathleen, Jack, Daniel, Kiki and the concierge staff) were equally outstanding. The surprise birthday cake I was provided was very nice. The club room was the perfect spot to chill out with an evening wine and chatting away with new friends! Other complimentary benefits of the club room included a laundry

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous hotel
desc: We had a fantastic stay at the Rendezvous hotel in Singapore. We stayed on the 11th floor so had our own concierge for our floor. Sofia was so welcoming and friendly and made us feel right at home. We also had 24/7 access to a food and drinks buffet and as I am coeliac Sofia ensured I always had something safe to eat.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome stay
desc: great location! Near to 3 mrt stations. Airconditioned hawker just across the street. There's 7-11 near the entrance. Great value for money! Will definitely come back and refer to my friends and colleagues.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Location
desc: Good location with many options of public transport. However, in room lighting is a bit dark. Carpet is old. Concierge and Front Office team is very friendly and helpful. Love location of this property.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A relaxing anniversary stay
desc: I booked a one night stay at the rendezvous to celebrate my marriage anniversary. The room provided was clean and quiet. The layout was functional and the room was generously fitted with a large TV, easy to reach controls at the bedside and a minibar. The hotel has a 24 hr gym and a small pool. I would say that this hotel fits better for travelling couples and couples looking for a quiet oasis in a busy stretch of orchard road. Yet it is within walking distance to 3 train stations(one literally at the doorstep) which ensures that you get to where you need to with ease. Again, far east hospitality did not fail to provide a generous welcome by upgrading us to the next room class upon check in and a complimentary cake was given during the stay as well which made this stay

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One night in Singapore
desc: The rendezvous hotel is a great place to stay. The hotel rooms were nice and well kept , although somewhat dated and we had no issues with the wifi. The beds in our 2 rooms we booked were incredibly comfortable Location is also very convenient, 2 minutes to mrt , food republic, subway and there's a 24hr , 7/11 on site. Overall a great place to stay with extremely comfortable beds for a great nights sleep

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Location, clean, friendly and courteous staff, great club level facilities.
desc: Central location, 3 underground stations (MRT) on the doorstep. Bus stop literally outside the door We stayed in the club level floor - very good value for money. Generous. Great staff - very friendly. Very clean. Large comfy bed and terrific shower with overhead and jet facilities. Quality toiletries, replenished often. We considered trendier Hotels, but chose the Rendezvous because we had better value for money. Delighted with our choice - we had a great holiday and the Hotel really contributed to that. There was a huge outdoor pool which we didn't take advantage of and a gym.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: GOOD
desc: Bed was nice and pillow was good . I would love to visit again. breakfast was quiet enough. access area was good too. staffs are friendly.Bar is not so cozy . surrounding was nice. nice bar and clean environment.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Three day Club Room Getaway
desc: My wife and I decided on a short three day break to Singapore after a busy start to this year. We chose the Rendezvous, on Bras Basah, Road for its location and a Club room in anticipation of a good deal. We were not disappointed! Our Club room, while not overly large was very comfortable, with king bed, ice cold aircon, free minibar (nuts, chips, beers and soft drinks,) a shower with choice of delivery (rain or normal), large flat screen TV. Included also, laundry of two items per day. The toilet proved an interesting alternative with access to wash modes from different angles and methods and warm air dry after...cuts out paper usage if you so choose!! The Club lounge was accessible all day, intimate and the staff superb. Happy hour 6-8pm, excellent and good choice of drinks. A

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A good place to stay in Singapore
desc: We could not have received a more welcoming and friendly service during our 10 day stay. The Club Room benefits and facilities were excellent and good value and the hotel location we found to be very suitable to our requirements

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service
desc: Staff service is excellent. Had check out time extended by a good 2 hours. Kudos to Andrew at the front desk - he was alone when I was checking in and he was handling multiple guests yet he did not get frazzled. Love the location. Many entertainment and F&B options within easy reach. Will certainly be back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay
desc: It was such a pleasant staycation, we booked a room to celebrate our anniversary. Started out just for a night and we decided to extend another night, we love the high bed which was very comfortable, the hotel room was clean and cosy. We extended our stay with the hotel manager asisstance, her name was Ms Iffah. And the service she rendered were splendid and heartwarming, after settling our booking and making small chats during the wait, she found out tt we were celebrating our anniversary, and prepared a nice surprise for us, as soon as we were back tt evening. It was so heartwarming and made the stay extra special. I will definitely come back, and for the exceptional service and experience , rendezvous is definitely my first choice for a staycation within singapore. The

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Made a huge mistake booking this hotel
desc: Rendezvous hotel has some of the best staff in the world but the hotel is ridiculous. I stayed in the hotel for 5 days but I don't think I will do it again. The bed was of a low quality. Same bedsheet for the whole period - they just re-laid it. the towels were old. Bathroom? Horrible! Water would sip out of the bath; wet floor; a gate to a terrible slip and fall. The rooms were noisy - you could hear everyone walking in the passage. But the TV is good. The internet is good but it fluctuates. Help desk is good. Check out was quick. Wont return there again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Go for the Club experience -- by Kee Thuan Chye
desc: The Club room in Rendezvous is definitely worth staying in. The room itself is not particularly big, but the club facilities are excellent. You'll feel well taken care of. The staff posted at the club lounge are helpful, friendly and accommodating. During cocktail hours at the lounge from 6-8pm daily, they'll even fix you drinks from wine to whisky, cocktails from Moscow Mules to Margaritas, to accompany your indulgence in the small bites, which are generally of good quality and taste. Throughout the day, you can help yourself to snacks, fruit, tea and coffee at the lounge. Until 11pm. Dayang, Jack, Sophia, Dhivyan and Kathleen (by rotation) did a marvellous job of making guests feel at home during my stay. Breakfast is of course complimentary, and you can either have it at

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location, location, location!
desc: When I was living in Singapore I used to live near the hotel so am very familiar with everything around the hotel. Great location, close to 2 MRT stations with multiple lines, big shopping mall (Plaza Singapura) just a block away, and tons of eatery options from food court to restaurants nearby, SUPER CONVENIENT! Room is clean and very spacious. Service from staff is excellent, and price is reasonable for what you get (I got a weekend deal so even better!) The only small issue with me is that the toiletries could do with some upgrade - a 4-star hotel like this still uses the cheap 2-in-1 conditioning shampoo? But overall, great value! I will return next time when I visit Singapore and will recommend to anyone who doesn't want to spend too much money on a 5-star hotel!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Absolutely enchanting!
desc: It was not our first stay and certainly not the last. Strategically located in the heart of town, it maintains its tranquility from the crowds as well. With accessibility to good food, good parks and shopping, you will not be less entertained. The crew is committed to service and the upkeep of its facilities and room. We had a great time!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Stay
desc: What a beautiful hotel in such a central location! The suites we stayed in were immaculate but what was the most impressive was the staff. They are so lovely and helpful and truly made our stay at the hotel an enjoyable one. Special thanks for Sofia and the team for being so accommodating and helpful. Such helpful and friendly staff made it seem like we were being treated like family. Will definitely stay there again during our next visit to Singapore. Nath Family

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best service with a smile
desc: We had the most amazing stay at the Rendezvous Hotel. The service was amazing. Nothing was a problem. Even getting 2 pieces of free laundry done per day was a bonus. When we needed anything it came in no time. Have booked to go back in June. Can totally recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly Recommend
desc: Great service, friendly staff, location is perfect. Hop on, hop off bus directly outside hotel. Walking distance to china town and gardens by the bay. Plenty on bars and restaurants on your doorstep. Rooms clean and comfortable. Highly recommend.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First time to Singapore and not the last
desc: My husband and I stayed at the wonderful Rendezvous hotel for 4 days the beginning of June ...The location is great as directly outside you have Ben Cooling tube station which gives you access to the fantastic rail network the city has...As a first time visitor we wanted to see lots of places before we left for Bali and as the rail network is easy to navigate , great value for money , and trains come every 5 minutes or so and are exceptionally clean we used this service during our stay as no need to get a taxi. We stayed in a Club room which gave us access to cocktail hour in the club lounge between 5pm- 7pm wine along with spirits , cocktails and hot and cold food was available. Breakfast was also available daily in the club lounge or the hotels restaurant down stairs , we

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome location and service
desc: Club Lounge services and room are awesome. Room is spacious and the personalized service was a plus point for this hotel. Staff are friendly and helpful. Would like to go back there again but since I am a local so perhaps chances are low. But I would definitely recommend to friends who are visiting singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: Location is near to MRT and 5-10mins walk to shopping areas, foods are easy to access, 7/11 is just downstairs. Room we stayed is a king bedded room, TV is big and a number of channels to watch, room is pretty spacious. Requested a quiet room, it is indeed quiet, maybe some sounds when ppl walk by but still ok.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore stopover
desc: If you love walking, shopping as well as sight seeing then this place is ideal as it's central to everything. We had a room on the 6th floor which was extremely quiet. The library bar downstairs is a great place to sit and relax with a quiet drink at the end of the day.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Deal in the middle of Singapore
desc: After another hotel was unable to honor our recommendation we booked this hotel on Expedia day of. It was a seamless experience checking in and the rooms were spacious and clean. We only stayed for a night but the location was great for nighttime activities and the bed was extremely comfortable. By the end I wished I had more time at the hotel!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb Location
desc: Hotel was filled with pretty interesting artsy items that was nice. Location was excellent, had 2 MRT stops (1 besides the hotel and the other, just the next road) and a bus stop that's at door step! You could even walk to Orchard Road! There is also Food Republic opposite, a 7-11 at the hotel itself so it is really convenient. The rooms are decent, clean and comfy though I would prefer it to be a little brighter. Doing make up with warm lights in the bath room is challenging! Overall, a lovely stay, value for money!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel.
desc: Wonderful experience. Great location - MRT at doorstep. Walk to raffles shopping centre. Chinatown 2 stops away on MRT and all other attractions so easy to get to. Restaurants in area brilliant. Pool at hotel amazing. Staff accommodated everything including ice-bucket with ice and champagne glasses when requested. Late checkout accommodated too by extending for 2 hours which was an enormous help with the later flight. Would definitely stay here again. Amazing hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday to visit newly born grandaughter
desc: Checked in to Rendezvous on 1st June for 9 nights. Was allocated a very nice room on 6th floor. Had a small issue in the morning. Spoke to the manager at front desk & he immediately gave me an upgrade to a club room on a higher floor it was lovely good sized bed & huge TV. The staff there are amazing. They can’t do enough for you. The location is amazing. Bus stop outside the front door. Food Republic close by. MRT close by & my favourite Starbucks close by. Would not hesitate to go back again. Wonderful hotel & location. Try the breakfast at Food Republic.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: nice stay and experience
desc: Good location and quiet though in the downtown. Comparing with other hotel at the same level, the room is big and clean. There are some resturant opposite to the hotel, including food republic, so it is easier to find food if you do not want to have breakfast in the hotel or just want to enjoy a afternoon tea outside of the hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay at the Club level
desc: A very good hotel , perfectly located at the city center with one minute access to public transportation. Staying at the club level is really great. The staff is amazing and would do everything to make your stay as pleasant as possible. There are many advantages to stay at the club level, like free laundry (2 pieces a day) and free drinks & snacks throughout the day.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Shopfronts and Colonial architecture with silver service
desc: I thoroughly enjoyed staying in the Club room. The room was not as large as I expected, but there was adequate space in the room to accomodate the twin single beds, which were super comfy. All our needs were catered for in the club lounge, with superb service given by staff, great selection of breakfast and afternoon tea, and a tempting swimming pool downstairs adjoins the gym (which I didn’t try). A big advantage of this hotel is the transport options right at the door. We had no trouble getting to any of our destinations using the MRT at Bencoolen, or the buses outside the door. Little upgrades in the Club seating area are needed, but the old hotel is otherwise in great knick. Very special memories here, especially with the accommodating staff.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location, lovely hotel
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights before joining a cruise ship. The hotel is clean and the air conditioned rooms were lovely and cool. We used the pool daily but no other of the hotel facilities as we spent a lot of time sightseeing. The concierge was helpful in giving us information in reaching Kanji and using the MTR, which I would recommend to visitors as its a cheap, clean and very easy we to get around. Would say again if visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Another fantastic stay at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore
desc: This was my fourth stay at this beautiful hotel. I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. We have always chosen to stay in a Club Room and have never been disappointed. Kathleen, Sofia and the team in the Club Lounge deserve high praise for the wonderful customer service they provide. Nothing was too much trouble for them and they treated everyone like a treasured member of the family. We were so touched to see Sofia from our previous visit 14 months ago and that she remembered us which is amazing with the amount of people she must see in her work. Our room was beautifully maintained, the food delicious and we cannot fault any aspect of our time at the Rendezvous Hotel and will definitely be staying here again on our next trip to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Tired, broken down room
desc: My husband and I were returning from a month's European trip & decided to spend our last few days here. I wish we hadn't. We arrived early in the morning, & were happy to leave our luggage until book in time. However staff (very kindly) offered us a room early as well as an upgrade. As we were so tired we accepted the offer & I acknowledge the staff for this. We had originally booked a Deluxe Plus room. However the room was tired and much in need of an upgrade. There was wallpaper falling off the wall, the bathroom was in need of a good clean with rotten boards around the shower & door. The mirror had black (chipped) marks on it - I would suggest replacement. The door leading into the room (from the corridor) had chips out of it. One of the cabinets next to the bed was

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday
desc: We had a wonderful time albeit a quick two night stay at the iconic Hotel Rendezvous on Bras Basah road. From the time we checked in at the club lounge, though it was our first visit, we were treated like old friends of the hotel by Kathleen and Sofia. They made our stay fun with lively conversations with their warm and friendly personalities. Their team in the lounge also needs to be commended especially Divian. The politeness and friendliness also extended to the lobby of the hotel especially the security person at the lobby and the bellhop(sorry couldn't remember their names), who one could make out that they have had many years of association with the hotel. My observation is this quality of having young and old workforce not only adds to the character of the hotel but

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice to be back
desc: Great to be back again at this hotel, feeling of comfort was the same, like meeting an old friend again. Concierge was very attentive and friendly. Had a great time at the pool, especially the jacuzzi - fantastic! Thanks. Hope to be back.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Immaculate and comfortable hotel
desc: Great value luxurious hotel. Very clean hotel, with a very comfortable bed and right next to Belconnen MRT making getting around Singapore a breeze. Staff were very helpful with luggage and friendly - will definitely stay here next time I am in Singapore

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Family break
desc: This is our favorite hotel in Singapore. Rooms are clean it’s definitely up to everyone’s standard. Location is superb, friendly staff especially Ms Ning Diana who’s been very warm during our entire visit. Everyone is accommodating and helpful to all their guests. A job well done to Rendevouz staffs. Looking forward to our next visit and will be at Rendezvous again!!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location & service at its best.
desc: We arrived to Singapore, Rendezvous Hotel from a 7 day 5* luxury location for a short 5 day city break. We were met with front desk staff members Evelyn Goh & Siti Mahmood. Our check experience was swift, warm and made pleasant. Without any pressure we immediately decided to upgrade to a club room and take advantage of the private club lounge facilities. We were located up on the 10 floor, with an amazing city view. This hotel is in a great central location, with outstanding hospitality, fun decor and warm ambience. The staff here cannot do enough for you. A big thank you to staff up on the 11th floor club lounge. Sofia, Jack, Shafiq and Daniel went out of their way to provide us with information and advice on places to visit to transportation services. Deputy Manager-

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Accomodation
desc: This accommodation is excellent in terms of location, cleanliness, value and service. The staffs are very helpful and courteous. The hotel is perfect for guests who wish to have a quiet stay in Singapore and away from the busy streets of Orchard vicinity. It is only 6 minutes drive to Orchard Central and 10 minutes drive to the financial hub of Singapore. Also, a walking distance to most of the major universities in Singapore. I strongly recommend Rendezvous Hotel Singapore at Bras Basah Road for visitors coming to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Chuan Kai's review
desc: I stayed at this hotel for a staycation and was really impressed with everything. Room was quiet, lights were good, comfy. Cleanliness. Service was so fast and quick. The only vibe I had was I couldn't figure out how to turn off the lights at the condiments section. And wifi speed will throttle with multiple devices.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Location and Awesome Service
desc: What Magnificent Service. We had just been travelling for a month and it was a delight to have fantastic service. Singapore itself is also very beautiful. The location of this hotel was perfect for tourist as the train and bus depots were right outside. Did I say the service was amazing. Thank you for ending my trip perfectlu

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay @ Rendezvous
desc: Great Hotel with good location, 5min walk to MTR, 2 stops from Orchard Road (Shopping mall), other attractions around city (Esplanade, Marina Bay etc). Entertainment outlets are around the corner , walking distance from Hotel. Rendezvous Hotel team deserves good accolades. Front Desk Guest Services / Concierge are very helpful, pleasant and friendly during check-in, out, and guiding us with good information that has saved us time planning, and moving around city, Hotel is well maintained, and undergo refurbishment at the lobby and bar lounge which offer great ambience, and trendy as well. Good for all ages. Room is great, Deluxe (2pax) are good-size, and amenities are adequate. Junior Suite is a good option for honeymooners, and for us, with a small TV/living area

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Home
desc: Delighted to choose to stay at Rendezvous on my recent trip to Singapore. How lovely that I was complimentary upgraded and enjoyed the club Lounge on the 11th floor. I found it easy to get to everywhere from the front door of the hotel. Really great location. The biggest assets of the hotel is the stuff especially Sofia from the front desk department and Vejaya from the housekeeping department.’They really went extra miles to make my stay unforgettable. Nothing could be more special then to feel like I were treated like family. Wow! I think it is “Great” that I chose to stay with you. They met all my expectations and more. I hope to have the opportunity to come back on a future visit to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Warm and welcoming
desc: Thankyou to Sophia, Daniel and Dayang at Rendezvous. The staff are always so welcoming and accommodating. Love relaxing in the Club Lounge and all the services and facilities that Rendezvous have, especially the free laundry service each day! What a plus! Everything happens seamlessly and quickly. This is great when you are there for business especially when you are so busy. A fabulous experience every time!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and friendly
desc: We had a lovely visit to the hotel, only one night as a stopover, but we wished it could have been longer. The staff were friendly, the rooms were clean, large and well appointed and the pool was really nice.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect!
desc: I’ll write this review based on points that I thought were helpful for me when selecting this place: Location: 10 stars for location!! The hotel is in the heart of the downtown area of Singapore. There are two metro lines within footsteps of the hotel, plus a bus stand right outside with excellent connectivity to the city and airport (bus #36). Cleanliness/room: The room was excellent - good size, comfy bed, with all standard amenities. Service: Great staff - very nice and helpful. Breakfast - Didn’t try it. Way too expensive at $30 per person. There is a Food Republic (food court) right next to the hotel. Toast Box is amazing for breakfast. Overall, this is an excellent hotel with so much value for your money, especially with the location. For reference, you can take

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Experience
desc: I traveled with my two young daughters. The service was excellent. Our requests were entertained the best the staff could. Service in hotel made our stay very relaxing and enjoyable. The room service we ordered arrived within a very short time. This helped us speed up our morning routine and we were able to spend our days efficiently. To be picky, there is room in improving the hardware in bathroom. e.g. the tight closing of shower cabinet, the cleanliness of the wall inside the bath cabinet....etc. We are very happy with the services and friendliness of staff. We also slept well. This gave us a very good impression to Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended!! Polite and helpful staffs.
desc: We had a great stay again in Rendezvous Hotel Bras Basah. Location is also covenient. Its just beside Bencoolen Mrt. It is also a walking distance to Dhoby Gaut Mrt and Bras Basah Mrt. There is a bus stop beside the hotel. But we didn’t travel as everything is within the hotel unless you are a tourist and wanna go for site seeing or shops in Orchard. Check in and check out was fast. Room is spacious. Internet was fast. My girls enjoyed the swimming pool area. My family relaxed in the warm water in the jacuzzi too. We had a great time with our club access. My girls ate the bites and biscuits. Ms Sofia and Kathleen in the club is so welcoming. They had their smiles in their faces all the time. They are friendly to everyone. Mr Jack assist us during our 6-8pm complimentary

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Worth the price
desc: location is good, walking distance to orchard road and bugis. with lots of food at night. hotel room is clean. I don't mind come back for another staycation. My deluxe plus room was revamped so nothing to complain about just that I thought it was a city view. however, I am seeing the opposite building. a little damaged of wallpaper. besides, these two everything is good. gym facility surprisingly look new too. will recommend the hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great teamwork! Well trained staffs.
desc: I've been here last March and there is big difference with the staff's hospitality and performance. This must be due to their hotel manager, Mr Douglas. I did observed that all of us, guests, are enjoying our staycation and food which most of us are looking forward to. Staffs helped made us feel comfortable. I will sure be back again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Top Notch
desc: The Rendezvous hotel staff were fabulous in every way. Nothing was to much trouble. The room we were in was clean and comfortable. Highly recommend floor 11 for the Drinks and hor d'oeuvres. My only complaint is a choice of teas in the room and better quality coffee.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value hotel
desc: Stayed at Rendevous for 4 days. It's situated at a convenient location close to public transport and shopping districts-orchard and bugis are within walking distance. The room was clean, very comfortable, and had great quality linens and toiletries.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent!
desc: We stayed here based on Tripadvisor reviews and are glad we did. The Rendevous is modern, clean and attractive. The staff are very helpful. It is adjacent to the DT line and a few steps away from the CC line of the MRT. Housekeeping services were top notch and the room was always comfortable and quiet. t is a gem and we will stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Centrally Located
desc: Great Location, big room, comfy beds & friendly staff. (& thats about the best I can say). From there the rooms are not cleaned daily, the floor was not vacuumed the whole time I was there... the skimpiest of cleans I have ever experienced with my bed was just made & that was it! I was lucky I got a change of towels. It took me 3 days to find the magic card to request a change of sheets. A small conference room, but nice, however the technology is old & the projector screen is poor quality. Don't eat at Straits Cafe its expensive. An awful buffet breakfast, buffet lunch & dinner is no better. Desserts look like you would find at a 3 yr olds birthday party. This is a tired property that does not have any soul. The only good thing was the Wifi

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous is OPTIMAL! WILL DEFINITELY STAY HERE ON FUTURE VISITS.
desc: Rendezvous is OPTIMAL! Singapore hotels are expensive, and I researched all of them on Tripadvisor, in all the desirable tourist visitor areas of Singapore as well as on AirBnB. If you have big bucks and want super-luxury, go there. Rendezvous had the BEST BALANCE of price and great location, nice sized rooms, friendly helpful staff and housekeeping, nice amenities (including a free Android phone for use around town), fridge, safe, pool, gym, good A/C, and overall well-appointed hotel. Don't bother buying their breakfast option...didn't try the food because there SO MUCH to choose from across the street to 500 meters away. Plus the Michelin Star hawker food places, why eat at hotel! There are 2 adjacent main subway lines and bus stop out front making exploring the city

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Location
desc: Great value for the price! Comfortable room with a central location that is easily connected with Buses and MRTs. I’ve been staying at this hotel for the past 4-5 trips to Singapore and it maintains the good quality.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and service
desc: Staff are always courteous and polite. Rooms are very clean and neat. Beds are comfortable, had a good nights sleep every night. Bus and Train literally at your door stop. Restaurants and Cafes walking distance.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lunch at Straits Cafe
desc: I and my family have a wonderful and delicious buffet at Straits Cafe.. Mr Marco and the rest of the staff have serve us well. Recommend to for those who love to eat buffet. Its Halal too. Its accessible via all transpotation mode

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding hotel at fantastic location
desc: Beautiful, well-run hotel. Excellent service. Great hotel. Superior room is 26 sqm, which is big enough for 10 days. Plus, it has a real bathroom with some space and, above all, no designer crap (like glass walls, sink in the main room etc). Location is outstanding, easy access to dhoby ghaut, bencoolen and bras basah mrt stations. That means you can go anywhere in the city in a short time. Staff are very friendly, and the service level is great. They gave us a late checkout and let us use the pool area and the showers there (flight departed at 2325).

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel
desc: Location was brilliant ! That is such a plus when you are navigating Singapore, so for this reason alone we would stay here again in a heartbeat. Food Republic right across the road is excellent for cheap and fabulous food, there is a 7-11 right near the entrance, and a Starbucks at the next corner for coffee and a light breakfast ( we did not use the hotel breakfast option). The room was so comfortable and the bed was divine. Beautiful toiletries provided. The pool was a little cool, but the spa was just perfect. Concierge got a taxi for us back to the airport for $18. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful place to stay
desc: Perfect location, friendly staffs, comfortable bed. Had just two nights here, but really enjoyed this hotel. Nice pool, quite and relaxing. A wonderful place to stay. Will definitely recommend this place

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay
desc: Stayed for 4 nights. Clean, good food, and excellent service. Staff were efficient, friendly and helpful. From check in to departure, the staff couldn’t have done more, to help make our stay enjoyable. The hotel is located in a prime position for MRT stations, making it easy to access all places of interest. We bought a three day pass from Orchard Station, and found it so easy to get about. Thank you Rosly, for going the extra mile.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore adventure
desc: The Rendezvous was a great choice for our Singapore base. Close proximity to Orchard Rd and all attractions. Transport of all types, bus, tour bus, MRT all literally at the door step. Very clean and comfortable rooms. Staff were great and very helpful.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable, Reasonable and Valuable hotel
desc: Located between bay side and city side. We stayed 3 nights here. It is very valuable rate, comfortable and large room. House keeping staff respond very quickly to my request, and always keeping clean our room. Bed and pillow are also comfortable. We didn't use inside restaurant at this time, but it looked serving delicious food and drink. We had a very wonderful time during our stay. We recommend anybody to stay this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb location clean and very nice
desc: I stayed in Rendesvouz for second time and enjoyed the stay. The room was nice with big screen TV, the room size is reasonable for 1 person to max 2 persons. Breakfast is very nice, got combination of local Singaporean food like Pao, congee, western and Malay's nasi lemak. The coffee is great.
