I also enjoyed the gym, small but nice, the pool with the hot jacuzzi. MRT entrance is right outside the hotel and short walk to Orchard Rd, Bugis or Esplanade.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic staff made our stay 5 star!
desc: Great location - right next to MRT station and walking distance to tourist must-do’s and hop-on-hop-off bus stop at the door. We stayed in clubs rooms and the club access added convenience and saved us $$ when we just wanted a snack night meal after busy touring days. Friendly staff who provided first class service, with hearty snacks and lovely cocktails 7pm to 8pm nightly. Breakfast was ample and varied. Housekeeping exceptional with our room serviced daily during our breakfast. Room had everything needed. The staff is what made our stay - especially the girls in the club lounge and the concierge guys who answered our endless questions and helped with tour and restaurant bookings. Thanks guys! We would definitely stay again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Defiantly recommend staying here
desc: This is a nice hotel in a very good location. Our room was quiet & the bed was comfortable. The water pressure in the shower was great, but there was no bath. The gym is of reasonable size as was the outdoor swimming pool, however the pool is often in the shade so the water is not as warm as some other hotel pools (not necessarily a bad thing). The staff were friendly & helpful, I would defiantly recommend staying here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommend staying here again
desc: It is a nice and convenient hotel.Lovely staff ，especially Mrs sofia was very kind and gave us outstanding services.We had a very wonderful time during this 7days. We recommend anybody to stay this hotel.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: On holiday
desc: The hotel was in a great location. Stayed in one of the club rooms. Would highly recommend paying the the extra for one of these rooms as it allows you access into the lounge were the cocktails and snacks are excellent. The staff were very friendly and helpful and couldn’t do enough for you. In particular Sofia who went above and beyond for anything you needed.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great holiday
desc: My sister and I enjoyed our brief stay at Rendezvous Hotel Singapore. Loved everything. Would definitely return. We were so glad we accepted the Club Rendezvous upgrade offer - warmly welcomed by the lovely ladies. Felt very spoilt.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, good value
desc: It's good. except tiny issue of bugs found in the room. the pool was good, and staff were very friendly. Breakfast was good as well but they charged a lot for my 7 years old daughter, the amount which is enough for the whole family to have a decent meal outside. You better get a good deal with them when you made reservation.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Great location to stay, close to everything. Public transport out the front and easy 10-15 minute walk to each ethnic precinct. Comfy bed and quiet rooms though housekeeping could be more consistent. Overall would still recommend staying here.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: This hotel has picked up its game
desc: We recently stayed here and used the Rendezvous Club.The staff who assisted or served you daily were exceptional. There was never a problem and assisted you in every way. The rooms we’re comfortable, would like to have a bigger chair to sit on as in previous stays but this is only a minor issue. The food was fantastic.This hotel is in the heart of Sinapore and you have transport both public and taxis at your door step. The Rendezvous hotel has lifted the standards of previous stays. gym good, pool clean staff great. Highly recommended

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Home away from home
desc: When in Singapore I always stay here and always in a Club room. Kathleen and Sofia and the rest of the staff in the Club Lounge treat you as a long lost treasured family member and nothing is too much trouble. They are extremely knowledgeable about things to see and do, unfailingly helpful and interested in your experiences and feedback.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay! superb location!
desc: Very convenient location in between both bugis and orchard, and there are great food offerings just across the road. Very cozy setting with huge TV screen in the room. Museums and heritage trails just round the corner as well

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Ureeka
desc: A choice location, a friendly staff, a comfortable bed and good facilities, this is an ideal hotel in Singapore. I had a three day layover in Singapore and found this is an ideal location to begin each day to visit the various places recommended by hotel staff to see. With the MRT just a few meters from the front door, bus stop immediately outside and taxis visiting on a regular basis, I found this hotel an ideal place to stay.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Tired looking room.
desc: The room was poorly presented with old furniture and fittings. Last time I was there I must have been in a more updated one. I think there must be different standards of rooms. I was disappointed in the service and product.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good motel, great location
desc: A little old, but fantastic location, right outside train station. Plenty of eating options within walking distance. Good service, nice pool & excellent air conditioning. Could have had a bit more luggage/storage space, but overall, very good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, near MRT, good service
desc: Good location, good service. Value of money. I enjoyed their hospitality here and staffs are very friendly. There is 7-11 beside the hotel and food republic opposite the hotel. MRT and bus stop just a few steps from door.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Flott hotel sentralt
desc: This a well placed hotel close to MRT with a nice acceble swimmingpool. ok restaurant for breakfast. Friendly staff and quick to respond I’ve stayed here many times and will come back next time in Singapore.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Meeting Spaces
desc: More often than not, reviews of a hotel would be under rooms,housekeeping or front office. Today, I am sharing my reviews about Catering Sales Team and Banquet FnB Team. I had my first event booked with my handler, Ainni from catering sales team back in April 2019 and have received great feedback from my clients, especially being on the ground of banquet team, Rajan and Mei. Leave your event with these people and you do not have to worry a nut about it. Rajan and Mei provides professional and close to the heart service. Ainni is professional and she goes all out for client-servicing. I have an event with them again during this past week and another 2 events in November. Will be a return customer if these 3 team members stays around and for Far East, these people are an

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic experience
desc: #top service,great staff and experience. We spent e days at the hotel. Close to the markets and shops. Most attractions by taxi were $10-15 per trip. The breakfast was lovely and plenty to chose from. Rooms were very clean and linens perfect. I found the pool great to get into via the steps as I cNt use the ladders. Pool towels available.Resturants available across the street, very convenient. Train and bus stops right outside the hotel for convenience

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay
desc: A very nice place to stay, centrally located. The staff is very friendly and willing to help along the way. They are efficient. The rooms are l nice and clean. Cost bead, quiet. There are a lot of places around to see, places to eat.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel!Great location,Great Service
desc: The Rendez Vous is a small comfortable hotel with good facilities, great service and an excellent location to visit Singapore . The staff are very helpful and attentive, with no long queues! The rooms vary in refurbishment but are all very spacious, clean and useable with big comfy beds! The pool area is also excellent and you cant get a better breakfast in Singapore!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Feedback
desc: I had a good experience staying with this hotel. It is only 8 minutes away from Plaza Singapura which has all the things I required. The food provided is also halal so it is really very convenient for me to stay there. May be the hotel might consider installing a water hose in the toilet for higher level of cleanliness for the toilet user.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, average facilities
desc: This is in a great location, just a few streets away from The Raffles and nice restaurant area Chjimes. Right on the train line as well. Didn't eat in cafe as looked very ordinary and limited options. Found an OK cafe Kith just near hotel which was good for breaky and coffee. The rooms were OK - no fresh air or balcony so a little stifling. The pool was ordinary with hardly any seating or lylo's - it was really pathetic having to sit on the ground. There wasn't enough toilet paper and had to request more a few times. There was no directory/room service or information available about the hotel or Singapore. The concierge was absolutely clueless about eating establishments - we wanted a different cafe for a European breakfast - he suggested Toast Box or Starbucks!!? We wanted an

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: GOOD!
desc: There are two Rendezvous Hotels in Singapore. Another one at Orchid Road. I went to the wrong hotel first, but the staff there kindly told me how to get to another one by taxi. The hotel reimbursed my taxi fare to me. Amazing! I think it is not going to happen in other hotel groups.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value for money.
desc: Good location right across from the jetty where the boats leave for the island tours. 3 bed suite was a good size and very comfortable. Pool great and staff very friendly. Would definitely recommend and would stay again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Centrally placed
desc: We stayed in a Club room and would thououghly recommend. Staff were fantastic and accommodating. Hotel is centrally located with a MRT station nearby and other in walking distance. Shopping hub of Orchard Road walking distance as was Little India

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very enjoyable
desc: Central to everywhere we wanted to go. Clean, pleasant and comfortable. Staff are very nice. Facilities are good, pool, Jacuzzi, fitness room along with conference facilities. Rooms serviced daily and the recent reno has upgraded all rooms to a very high standard. MRT (transport) on the doorstep. Only downer buffet food is very geared to Halal, so don't expect any bacon on the menu at breakfast.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Central location, good rooms
desc: Conveniently located hotel close to public transport and walking distance from the national museum, a park and restaurants. Modern, clean and comfortable room with tea and coffee. Iron and board very practical. Good stay. Lack of working space if you are not in a "Club" guest. Wifi was good. Nice library to chill and have a drink.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Value in the City
desc: Celebrated my husband's birthday here with our 2 kids. Great location as the next morning I had a meeting just near by. Not the newest hotel in town but very comfortable and clean. Service from check-in, club room, restaurant and bell boy was warm and sincere. It is nice that we (locals) are treated the same though many westerners at this hotel. Paid a little more for Club benefits and it's worth it. Any time we needed a snack (eg, after a swim), we can just pop in. Cocktails are served in the evening, and that made the man very pleased. Breakfast came with the hotel rooms complimentary and it was very satisfying. Hubby loved the seafood porridge. On a Saturday, there's acrylic painting session at the lobby. The little ones enjoyed the art session which had them engaged and

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent in location
desc: Excellent location, wonderful services, fair in price. The hotel makes us have a good experience overall. MRT is just a minute away. It is easy to access many places by MRT. Travelers can also experience the downtown by walking. Next to the hotel, there are many restaurants and coffee shop. Never be bored.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation in the city!
desc: Great staycation in the city! It was clean and definitely value for money. We stayed there for a night. The bed was really comfortable. Swimming pool was a bit small so we did not go. Breakfast was great!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Always good
desc: Always enjoy coming to this hotel. The location is amazing, the atmosphere is quite good, the service is excellent and the rooms comfortable and reasonably well appointed. Pricey like all of Singapore but better than most other

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Staycation
desc: The hotel staff were respectful, friendly and served with passion and smiles and they were club lounge staff: Kathkeen, Sofia, Daniel, Kiki, Dayang and Dhivyan not forgetting Hotel Manager Douglas and Front Office Manager Pushpa. They were just like family members who were easy to talk to. The room was clean and linens perfect. It has comprehensive facilities of a gym and swimming pool. Easily accessible to public transport with a nearby train station, museums, shopping malls and many and varied F & B outlets. I will bw back again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff and great hotel
desc: Front office and concierge was really friendly and helpful. Room was clean and quiet. Great location - so important! Sofia at Lounge was really friendly and warm. All in all, this hotel is value for money and we would definitely return for future stays. Thank you, Rendezvous team!

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Hospitality
desc: Excellent service right from registration till the end of the stay. Accessible by public also. The food is nice. My daughter loves the room so much.We are definitely coming back for another staycation.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First time visit but will return
desc: Chose this hotel after researching many due to our usual hotel being closed for refit. Value for money, this beats all other hotels easily. Whilst this hotel is listed as 4 stars - it is a little long in the tooth but everything works, it is the staff that make this a good choice in Singapore. I always look for a club room when here, they are a little more expensive but they offer so much more value. They offer breakfast even if you book a room only and you use the club room throughout the day with soft drinks, coffee, fresh fruit etc. They also offer cocktails, alcoholic drinks and a good selection of snacks for a couple of hours every evening. Again, researching this before my trip, I found this lounge to be listed in the top 10 in Singapore on a website. Unfortunately I

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean hotel, awesome location
desc: We upgraded our room to the club room. Room was alright, comfy and clean. Club facilities are not so extensive, the lounge also closes quite early at 11pm. The breakfast is pretty decent at the Straits Cafe. Awesome location, very close to malls and also public transport. :D

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great locationa
desc: Great staff, clean and tidy facilities, fabulous club room and awesome location made this hotel an easy choice for our accommodation on our recent 12 day stay in Singapore. Highly recommended and we will be stay here again next time.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: The location of the hotel was very convenient to everything! Very short walk from both Bencoolen and Bras Basah MRT stations, you could go everywhere on the MRT. The MRT is a cheap and easy-to-use method of getting around Singapore. There was a food hall type place only 1 block down from the hotel. There are many other nearby restaurants. You can walk to the main shopping area on Orchard Rd from here in 20-30 minutes. The rooms were a good size and well air conditioned. Good shower in the bathroom. I made use of the nice pool area, although it did get a bit crowded at times. The staff were all friendly and courteous. I enjoyed my stay and would chose to stay here again.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stopover
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights on our way back home to Australia. Booking club room was good idea as food and alcohol is expensive in Singapore. The girls up in club were just delightful. So relaxing at night. We had washing done, to travel home and there was no charge. The hotel is well positioned for train and taxis easy to get. The Uber type taxis available too. There is coffee shop and small supermarket beside hotel and cheap food hall over the road. Easy walk to shopping. We had breakfast in club and in main breakfast area. Both were excellent. Staff so helpful. Wifi is good. We look forward to revisiting.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good friendly service
desc: Hotel was centrally located in Singapore and facilities provided were very good. Staff were courteous and friendly and breakfasts provided were of a good standard. We have now stayed at this hotel on 4 occasions and would be quite happy to return there in the future should we undertake further international holidays.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money not so good but location is good.
desc: Our room did not even have kettle, coffee or tea. Housekeeping was not consistent in refilling basic stuff like towels. Our bed sheet had some sort of small blood stain or grape colored stain. overall value for money is not that good but location is good.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore vacation
desc: The hotel is in a great central location and is a great value for the money. The MRT and bus are right outside the door. It is a great place to stay if you plan on using it as a home base and plan on spending most of your time out and about. It is close to many attractions either by foot or by public transit.

hotelname: Rendezvous Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing stay
desc: The hotel is located on the busy Bras Basah road opposite to the national museum and has a bus stop and MRT station right in front of it. Our stay was absolutely fantastic as with an upgrade the staff provided us with complimentary breakfast and free hop on hop off bus tour of the city. The rooms and washrooms were very clean and the staff was very nice, courteous and helpful. The hotel complex also has a commercial centre with a 7 eleven, KTV, massage parlour and a few restaurants. Highly recommended.
